title: Convenience at its best!!
review: We’re staying at a hotel in Phuket for a month long vacation. But hotel prices for food are drastically higher than any of the restaurants. Kids don’t want to leave poolside and we were forced to overpay for meals - ordering from hotel, Food Panda really helped out!! Once we discovered this Service - I couldn’t believe that it’s possible!! Not only there is no delivery charges, there is almost always coupon available to use (on top of already lower prices of meals!). Delivery is quick and food always arrives hot, on time and in great condition!! Drivers are very polite and nice and although happy to receive tip - never expect it as a must! Now my kids can play at the pool all day, we get great food delivered straight to us and we do not pay insane prices of the hotel restaurants!! Thank you Food Panda! We will definitely continue to use this service when we go back home!

title: The most embarrassing customer experience
review: Dear FoodPanda, Thank you for copying and pasting over and over prewritten emails without even reading what your customers say. With extreme disappointment I have to say that I have been served with the poorest and the most embarrassing customer service ever possible. As a senior executive of a company that makes of customer experience their priority, you are proving to know nothing about your customers and so your business. The order was cancelled because of your mistakes and 2 days later you are still copying an pasting the same emails without even reading my messages or understanding what happened. This is simply unacceptable and unfortunately I don’t have any more time to waste with you. I am going to block this payment and do whatever I can to get my 200HKD back, not because of the small amount, but because it’s a matter of principle. I can promise you that you have lost me as a customer forever. Your business won’t suffer for it, don’t worry, but the way in which you serve your customers have been proven to be embarrassing and ridiculously wrong. Since you don’t read the feedback or requests from your customers you won’t probably understand or learn anything from here. What a shame… Congratulations FoodPanda, I can certainly say that you have given to me the worst customer experience in my 44 years! Good luck, G

title: They don’t want to refund you fully in Bangladesh
review:
Once , Some items were missing from one of my order. When I asked the delivery person, he said , he will bring it tomorrow. (Funny proposal, isn’t it? ) So I asked for a refund, The agent wanted to refund me less than half the amount of what i lost and said , its the best he could do. I kept asking him again and again , how much did I lose? (As i could not check at that moment , i did not know how while i was chating with an agent )No matter what , he would not answer me. But later i was able to check and kept asking him , why will i be refunded less than half ? How was that fair? He kept saying its the best he could do and wanted to leave again and again( he did not though) . But I kept telling him that it was unfair . Maybe after 15 to 20 minutes (could be more) he refunded me the full amount. 

I went through a harassment with that. I wish i could hold that agent accountable for what he did. But foodpanda has no Customer Care Number in Bangladesh . I guess , not refunding the customer fully and also claiming the remaining money from the restaurant later is a new way of making some more money for food panda Bangladesh.

title: It’s really bad
review: First of all, the app is saying that certain restaurants do not deliver to my address but when I change the street number to two blocks away suddenly the restaurants become available. Second issue is, after adding the items to the cart and want to checkout, the app is saying that the items are no longer available (my guess is they are to busy at that time and can’t deliver, but I don’t understand why they wouldn’t just say that). After 20-30 minutes, when I try again, I’m able to checkout and place the order (they might have some free spots available). After all of this hustle, I’m just happy that I’ve managed to place the order but to my surprise, sometimes, the order gets canceled when it’s close to arrival time. After talking to other users, it seems that they’ve stumbled upon these issues as well. I can get over the fact that they don’t have a group order, or that I need to walk two blocks from my address to pick up the order, or that I need to try multiple times to place the actual order, but the overall app experience and their delivery system is just bad.

title: Customer Service Leaves a lot to be Desired
review: If food is running late then all they say is sorry. The message that tells me this comes through to me via text about 50 times. Another issue is restaurants accepting your order, you wait, then 10 minutes before the food is meant to arrive Food Panda texts to say “[restaurant] just closed, sorry about that”. You’ve then wasted your time, and no repercussions on the restaurant as far as I know. Also, they dish out coupons like crazy but only for new customers. I was asked by their employees to rate their app 5 stars on this store in exchange for vouchers whilst visiting the Expo at Impact Arena here in Bangkok. Got my vouchers and now I find out they’re only for new customers too - the employees saw the app on my phone and I told them I’ve used the service multiple times. Talk about tricksters! Customer service didn’t want to help me when I told them neither. I’ve changed my rating and will start looking into Grab Food and similar apps available here. Good concept but poor customer service and loyalty to those already signed up.

title: Worst CS ever
review: Because of the quarantine I use Foodpanda several times. And I must thank those riders. Though sometimes the package got leaked or my soup ruined. I never complain. It s the time. But I got really mad this time. I ordered my food Foodpanda estimated its arrival about 45min later. Then I got called in an important meeting. My rider came early about just 20mins. I couldn’t leave. I asked him could he wait or if he could come back 20minutes later I will tip him nicely. Then the rider started blackmailing me and asked for the equal amount of money as my food. Right at that moment the dispatcher called to cancel my order. I asked the dispatcher was there any solution he offered nothing but to cancel my order which I have already paid. I lost my food the day and my money. Not to mention I was cut off by the dispatcher whose English I tried so hard to understand with patience and kindness. And when I contacted their Customer service, three times! And they never give you any solution. And blame it on you! Your blackmailing rider your useless unqualified dispatcher! And the trouble I have to starve for! Thank you food panda and wish you hell

title: Amazing! Full of Variety and Options!
review: So the app is easy to use, highly ascetic - who can refuse a cute panda? And most importantly- it’s more than a small array of restaurants. From food to essentials, with stores that have actually given you a great array of options from their stock vs typical basics that won’t always satisfy your needs. It may not have play by play tracking but having approximate times with more options to serve you better makes it far superior to its competitors. Icing on this fantastic cake (I may just order one after this) is that the app does incentivize consistently- you don’t need to spend over a hundred dollars constantly to get a paltry benefit like 5 dollars off. No general amounts and purchases can easily reap you discounts more routinely and simply add to the convenience of it all. So in all- 10/10 I certainly recommend.

title: Dissatisfied with FoodPanda
review: what happened last night and this morning had obliged me to post this review. their customer service and support (no answers to emails, no phone number to call, restaurant phone number shown in the app doesn’t work, bpo chat representatives are based in india and are disappointing)are totally useless. i believe it is worth campaigning not to use this app. why? the cust serv rep sent me a phone number to call to direct my concern to the resto here in the phils. i told them it is not working. after a few seconds, they just confirmed to me that yes it is really not working just after they called. hahaha... so pathetic... their recommendation and action? nothing but a one word “sorry”. i haven’t had any assurance that they will do anything for the issues because they said they got no control to their affiliated restaurants... huh???
developerResponse: {'id': 11328194, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:49:09Z'}

title: Good order functionality, terrible customer service.
review:
When things go well, there is no problem.  However, inevitably, you will receive an order with a missing / wrong item. It seems FoodPanda does everything in their power to avoid having to offer a refund - from discretely responding to inquiries via email (instead of through the app where the original message was sent), to requiring you to make a choice on type of refund, and finally, once I provided my choice of refund, it was never sent. It seems these processes are built to make it more difficult for consumers to get a refund.  It’s been over 2 weeks since my order and I still haven’t received a refund. 

Can’t complain about how well the food ordering function of the app works - because it works well.  But after my experience with their customer service, it feels they intentionally give customers the run-around with the intention of making it as difficult as possible to get a refund.

title: Customer Service needs to improve
review: The foodpanda app has no contact options which is extremely problematic since I’ve had trouble with multiple orders. When I tried cancelling my order it would give me the option to cancel my order and then say that it couldn’t be cancelled because the restaurant had accepted my request. It gives no option to contact the restaurant directly or foodpanda representatives in case of any trouble. What kind of service is this? Once you order you’re trapped? The chat option has also been removed. When you open the website on a browser it magically has some sort of contact number hidden somewhere but on the app it’s nowhere to be found. Even tracking the order is extremely inconvenient because when we ask where is my order their response is we don’t know. What is even the point of having a help centre in the first place? Please fix this issue.

title: Horrible App Update!!!!!
review:
July 5, 2021 - The current update is working well and I have had no issues with it. I’m glad they brought back the ability to see where the delivery driver is located, so I can be downstairs waiting when arrive. It’s not real-time tracking like it was a couple years ago, but it updates pretty frequently. 

19 Apr 2020 - the current app update is HORRIBLE, do not update! They removed the ability to see where the rider is and they removed the ability to move the map around. You cannot even scroll around to see where the exact location of the restaurant is anymore, HORRIBLE!!!! All this and we still have to deal with made up times that keep changing and getting pushed back if the delivery isn’t running on time.

title: Shady drivers, abominable customer service.
review: This is a SCAM.  Please stay away from this service! My orders have been consistently late and the GPS never shows the real time location of the drivers. I put up with the mediocre service they provide, but just today they went too far. I always wait for the drivers 10 minutes before their eta because I had already heard stories about them leaving after only a couple of minutes so I decided not to risk it. However, today the driver picked up my food and on the app it appeared he did not even come close to my place. I waited in the yard where all drivers know where to hand the food. I saw drivers pulling over and handing the food but mine never came. He had the audacity to cancel and now I can't be refunded because he "tried" to reach me. The customer service is no better really. They don't listen to your concern and just repea the same sentences again and again. Pretty distasteful experience. The app is so laggy and doesnt even have in-app mesaage capabilities.

title: Amazing Service!!!
review:
Okay, so before I begin let me start off by saying I found this app by searching for a way to order food from outside of the country of origin.

I’m an Amerikano with a Filipina SO and I wanted to try and order her food. Came upon a good opportunity to cheer her up with a milkshake and took it. Had never used the app before and actually ended up putting in the address wrong. Capital One worked internationally much to my excitement, and I messaged the rider about correcting the address and they used my correction and got it there very quickly. From the other side of the world, I was able to experience the joy of getting my girl a milkshake to cheer her up. Thank you so much Foodpanda, thank you thank you thank you!

Will definitely be using this app again!

title: Should improve the apps further
review:
I read reviews that foodpanda is always late. Normally they r late because the restaurant side delayed the food preparation. I have tried to order from stores stating 30mins but 30mins become 45mins, 1 hour in few times. The 1 hr wait from 25mins at off peak liked 11am was the last straw. I never ordered from that restaurant anymore. 

However I feel that the apps only show the real updated time of the whole delivery. On the real time tracking, they should also put the time order was placed. So we know the time has been changed (few times) to show the change in delivery timing. When I’m a new user, I keep on wondering why is it forever 30-35mins. But time had actually passed by. 

Once I have also placed an order for something near, the driver took a big detour to elsewhere. Although stated as reach but he personally called me to inform that he will be late. I’m ok with this. Sometimes if on the way and only 5-10mins extra I can wait. Plus there’s communication from driver. At least I won’t be left hanging did he went wrong route? 

Overall I only use foodpanda n their services r still not bad. Just that I don’t know how to read reviews left by myself n others. Not v user friendly apps.

title: Would give 0 stars if I could
review:
I am in Thailand for 6 months and enjoy walking around, trying the cuisine. Of course, this becomes exhausting and today, I slipped and sprained my ankle getting off the ferry. Decided to give this app a try and it failed. While I do not blame the driver, the restaurant or even the customer service agent, this app is faulty. It auto populates your location. And so for some reason the address was way off when it did so even though the map location looked correct. The driver calls me, asking where I am and I can only respond in English though I tried the words for Hotel etc. and I said the hotel name and everything. So I contacted customer service and they asked me to meet the driver at that random location that I have no idea how to find. 

At that point, I said keep the food and the money. I didn’t even ask for a refund. The app is broken. I would have liked to use this app for my travels but cannot and will not try it again.

title: Left starving
review: I waited for 2 hours in hoping my food would be just mins away. Just to find out my driver took 2 hours just to get to the restaurant and the restaurant closed on them. I dont understand when there estimated time of arrival to me was 10p but they barely got to the restaurant at 10:15 and surprised that the restaurant was closed. So with it being past the time of estimated arrival to me, all other restaurants were then also closed. So left with no other choice but to starve over night in hopes just to find food in the morning. I WOULD NEVER use this app again!!! I might as well just called the restaurant itself to have placed my order and paid more for delivery fee then to be left starving over night. I would not recommend this app unless you want the chances of being left starving at night. BTW I was being very nice that I placed my order at 8p to give them plenty of time to get my order to me. I’m very disappointed in the service of this app.

title: Absolutely disgraceful customer service and a terrible experience
review:
I tried to make an order to this new version of the app and picked the name of the building. The app doesn’t show you further details or the map. Once the order went through it showed a map and I realized the location registered wrong on the map.

I immediately messaged them (since there is no longer a telephone hotline) and got no response. Then I saw my messages had been deleted. I tried again and finally got a message saying it was ok and the rider would be redirected to the correct address. Then one hour after my order had been created I got a phone call saying that they would not deliver as it was out of the delivery zone, and said it was all my fault because I had input the wrong address. Their app is actually at fault because it went to the incorrect address to begin with. Furthermore, although they refuse to deliver they have still charged my credit card and won’t refund for a few days.

Their customer service rep refused the idea that their system had any problems and said I should have chosen the district correctly to begin with. Problem is their app doesn’t allow you to do that!

How can they charge me money for something they refuse to deliver? And to have us wait an hour before informing us the order wouldn’t be sent?

Horrible upgrade and terrible customer service.

title: Deleting the app.
review: Been using this app for years, but for some reason it seems to be getting worse. Using this app always causes to eat lunch at 3pm or dinner at 9 or 10 because it’s ALWAYS. SO. LATE. It has come to the point where the wait (and not to mention the extra money for delivery charge) is not worth it. Just now we ordered our lunch at 12, the app saying it would only take 45 minutes to get here. By the time it was 1pm, there was no update on the status of our order. Upon asking customer service they said there was nothing they could do to track it. Next thing I know I get a notification saying that the restaurant JUST THEN started to prepare our food, the time when it was supposed to be arriving. When I checked the status of the order on the app, the ETA had changed from 1pm to now 2pm. Ridiculous. By the time I’m done writing this review, our lunch has still not arrived. This will be our last order using Foodpanda.

title: Wrong address delivery
review:
This is very disappointing since it’s my first time to
Order from foodpanda, I ordered a food for a friend since I liked to treat them for my upcoming birthday however when I placed the order and waited for how many minutes and even my friend was waiting infront of their house nothing came up and suddenly the foodpanda app was marked as DELIVERED which unfortunately never came to my friend: i spoke to an agent name Muhammad and we had a long convo and after telling me he will do his best to help
Me resolve the issue even if I’m still
Asking questions to him he ended up the convo and marked it again as issue RESOLVED which has not been resolved at all since my friend back there in the Philippines hasn’t received the food that I ordered. So calling all the foodpanda delivery department I do hope you will take action on this matter and rest assure it will not happened again. And this will be a lesson for me from now on.

title: Foodpanda is a fraud.. scam!!! they are thieves
review:
Foodpanda is the worst, every time i have placed an order they have messed up and then the customer support is the worst It is so inconvenient, and mess around with the order a lot and they have a lot of complaints mostly people in my workplace have stopped using this app
1. you place order and then keep waiting for it and when you check why your order hasnt arrived they tell you 'it has been cancelled'
3. sometimes the thing you order is just incomplete and which feels more like a fraud because you pay money for it
2.you have to wait for hours and hours for the support to respond back on your query and when they do they just say oh sorry heres your voucher which is convenient for them but it’s not worth our time and money 
i have a request please dont use their app, they are a fraud they scam people on a big scale and we should report this app to FIA

title: Best alternative to uberEats
review: Most (perhaps all) menus are available in English, unlike GrabFood. For this reason, Foodpanda is the best food delivery app in Bangkok now that uberEats is gone from Thailand. I have never had significant problems with the functionality of the app. One complaint is that the app doesn’t accept my Amex or MasterCard for some reason, so I always use PayPal. Cash on delivery is also an option. In rare cases when my order is late, Foodpanda has proactively sent a voucher for discount on future orders. The tracker of the delivery driver is good but not quite as accurate as uberEats was. That is a very minor gripe though. Overall the app is great and I use it a lot.

title: Terrible customer service
review: Foodpanda is very slow. All my orders are late. Today I had to cancel an order that was over 2 hours late and still had a 30 minute “estimated” delivery time. Their app says to use live chat or contact by email to cancel and when I tried both, the email said it would give a response in 48 hours and to use the live chat, i waited a while for someone to come on to the live chat to cancel the order. They were very rude and ended the chat before even ending the conversation, I presume because they do not care about their customer experience. The first person ended the chat and another representative entered the chat just to end the conversation with thank you and have a nice day and immediately left before I could finish typing thank you which is extremely rude. And now here I am, 2 hours and 20 minutes later with no food and my family is getting ready for bed.

title: Installed and removed the same day
review:
Great service.. It only took almost 3 and a half hours before I was able to get some food at my door. 😏 My first order was cancelled 15 mins after it was supposed to have arrived, and my second was cancelled after waiting for 20 minutes. Customer service chat did provide me with 5 ringgit to towards my next order, but I had to pointedly request compensation.. 3rd order arrived on time.

When I asked why my app indicated that my order was prepared, picked up and was on its way, I was told that the delivery person simply refused to deliver because it was too far away.. Um, c’mon if this service is going to work at all, this company is going to have to create reliability in the system. Right now, it’s a mess....  Hopefully they will address these critical systemic weaknesses that are absolutely essential for a time-sensitive service where people are waiting to eat.

title: Order cancelled and money not refunded
review: I placed an order and after checkout the restaurant closed. My order was cancelled but my credit card was still charged. After a few days waiting for the refund I contacted customer service. They said to wait 2 weeks. So I waited. After 2 weeks, I checked my credit card and still there was no refund. I contacted customer service again. They kept giving me a refund serial number and saying that my order was refunded. I gave them my bank statement and showed them images of the cancelled order. (The app deletes order history after a short period of time). Each time they reply to my request it’s a different person and there is no phone number for you to call. It is so frustrating. It’s been a month since my cancelled order and I still haven’t received my refund. I will never order through foodpanda again.

title: Chat Interface Laughably Broken
review: Horrible customer service. Chat interface redirects you to an on demand call center in India, no matter what country you are currently in. They also do not notify you when an employee messages you back, which enables them to shirk the responsibility of your complaint when you don’t respond immediately, instead opting to close the chat and mark it as resolved. If you have a complaint involving missing food, good luck getting your money back, or really getting anyone on the line to care. When you do get someone on the line, they say because they are in India they can’t help with your case, and ask you to email the company instead, even though they are the recipients of your question? And Vivek kept calling me sir. I am a teenage girl with a very feminine name. Point is, if your chat interface doesn’t work, then just list the email option to communicate instead of wasting my time.

title: REFUND SCAM !!!!
review:
Foodpanda is good but their refund is a scam !!! I 
Made three orders , but due to rain and rider unavailability they cancelled my orders AFTER debitting the money from my debit card , and promised to refund BUT it’s been more than 20 days , everytime I contact they lie and make false promises , same scripted lies “ it’s in process , department is taking concern seriously , u will get it soon , we have started reversal “ but it’s all lies , the bank has confirmed and checked many times and they have not even started reversal process from their side , foodpanda takes money within seconds but when it’s time to refund , their finance department is a fraud !!! and on top even after multiple chats with support and email , they don’t do anything and keep stalling ,, I ask to get in touch with manager , they give excuses , no one calls their email support doesn’t reply to emails , FOODPANDA PK IS A FRAUD WHEN IT COMES TO REFUNDS ....

title: Very disappointing to say the least
review:
I say it again. Time wasting. Abdominable service. 
Would give 0 star if I could
Prepaid my food via credit card. Apps says the driver has arrived but is no where to be seen. Customer support is not able to give proper answer as to why the food is gone missing / just the driver has gone missing / unreachable. What kind of food service makes people pay first, make them wait over 50 minutes just to be told the driver is not reachable and will refund my order. No apologies were given. Did the driver pick up my order and got an accident/ ate my order? Plus the app did not let me order via cash payment just because there were 2 cancelled orders when the driver clearly couldn’t find my place and I was unable to pick up a phone call while working. The type of service they offer is abdominable.

title: Great food service
review: My wife and I live in Chiang Mai, and we use Food Panda about 1–2 times per week. Overall it’s a great service. Sometimes the app is frustrating because it will “forget” what you are browsing in the app if you switch to another app for a moment, which happens to me a lot when I need to use my Thai dictionary when writing special order instructions. But the food almost always arrives pretty quickly. If there is a problem with your order, a very nice lady from Food Panda calls and explains what’s wrong — “the soup is not available ka!” — and offers a solution. I’m very grateful for the app because it’s so convenient.

title: Quick service
review: I think it depends on restaurants therefore I don’t need to wait too much time. Just only 30-45 minutes. Mostly I ordered coffee from cafe so fast service that I got. Keep going like this but I have to suggest one thing for delivery man. It happened on my second time’s order. He asked me my address number. I think it shouldn’t be like this. This app will be using not only locals but also foreigners. As a result of this, please look for delivery man at least who can read English numbers. 🙂 I know it’s related in  your budget to look for delivery guys but mostly Myanmar people can talk 👉broken language 😁

title: International Credit or bank card refused
review:
We had very nice experience with foodpanda during our visit to Pakistan, especially my kids enjoyed a lot and were very happy to have fresh and delicious food just one click away !
However we couldn’t pay by our card because our bank card were international VISA card so we have to keep cash with us.
Now we are away from Pakistan and I am trying to order food for  my mother who is very old but I can not order because card not accepted. Please please open this option for international customers so we can serve our loved ones. Jazak Allah

title: An occasional joke.
review: I am utterly surprised on how bad their service it at times. Firstly, as always, the food is ALWAYS late. I’ve never had an order that was early, or on a timely manner. I once spent a lot of time ordering food from my family, and as soon as I was about to press “Place Order”, it just said that “This restaurant is unavailable at the moment.” Or whatever. THEY WAIT TO TELL YOU AT THE END. I’m pretty sure they do it on purpose, to see their customers get frustrated. I also ordered from another restaurant, only for it to be late by 2 hours. Yup! 2 hours! But the worst part is, that they waited 2 HOURS TO CANCEL MY ORDER. I waited 2 hours, only for my food to get cancelled. COME ON, WHAT?!?! And not to mention the User Interface. Their app is so broken. It doesn’t respond, it crashes, it lags. The regular.

title: Cold Food
review: I have past orders where they sent me something different than I ordered and I let it go. This time was too much. The food was finished being prepared and the driver picked it up. Drove past my apartment where he stopped at LKF for more than 15 mins. I tried to cancel my order and was told if I did they would take the “pay by cash” option off my app. And reassured me that my food would still be warm because they use insulating bags. I told them that’s fine but to cancel the order. When the driver did finally arrived, he kept calling over and over again. I was like ok maybe I’m over reacting, maybe there’s a reason. Picked up my order, the food was cold and ice cream was melted and spilt all over the plastic bag it came in. I wish I hadn’t picked up and paid for this waste of food. Will definitely be using Deliveroo whenever I order.
developerResponse:

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for a immediate response.
"	', 'modified': '2019-10-18T09:43:34Z'}

title: This App needs works. I like the Delivery Service
review:
This App is annoying. 
2 Major flaw’s that have not been addressed.

1- Random address the app selects each time I open the App. I have a profile with a delivery address, this address has been delivered to 25+ times, But each time I open the app it selects a random nearby address(?).
- Why have a profile if it’s not used? If you don’t pay attention the food will be sent to a wrong address.

The Pizza, KFC’s app’s don’t behave this way.

2- Previous order.
I tend to order the same things. I can see my previous orders but cannot select them for reordering. This feature is available in other food delivery Apps, either as a reorder or being able to save favorites that can be reordered.
Having to reenter the order consumes extra time reduces the ease of use and creates a poorer user experience.

These are two simple flaws that are a major annoyance and are easily fixed.
Fix these two flaws your user experience will be greatly enhanced.

title: No more service in my area
review: Food panda used to deliver in my area (Somewhere in PJ) and even though they weren’t very timely with their deliveries, it was still convenient. I could order ahead of time and my meals would arrive by the time i’d want to eat. I would also excuse all the times when it was peak delivery and I couldn’t order anything because I felt that perhaps they didn’t have enough delivery drivers and ok lah I’d let that pass. But then, I opened my Food Panda app one day and no restaurants available to me at all!  It’s been months now and I just tried again, you know, for fun, and still no deliveries available :( I don’t live very far away from major malls and eateries so I’m very disappointed that I can’t use this app any more. I have since moved on to Grab. Thank you Food Panda, it was nice knowing you.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328564, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:04:01Z'}

title: What a terrible service!
review: The app simply does not work! We make a $60 order for a special family meal and nothing comes... we later find out the food was delivered to the wrong address and thrown out. We try to contact/chat with someone through the app and go around in circles trying to get our food or a refund, until finally someone agrees to call back. The call comes back hours later when my wife is sleeping (she works remotely on US time from Singapore) and so she misses the call. Now, when she tries to continue the chat the next day she is blocked on the app. The Food Panda people are deliberately controlling the app to take money from people without fixing their mistakes and doing what they are supposed to do: deliver food! We, as a family, will never use the Food Panda again!

title: Horrible customer service. Incompetent support staff
review: I recently made an order with Foodpanda. The order I received was incorrect which is not foodpanda’s fault And I do not blame them for this. I contacted their support team To try and get a re-delivery. I was told by one person that a redelivery would arrive in 30 to 45 minutes. After waiting this time and hearing nothing I contacted them again to which I was told there was no re-delivery made and that the restaurant I ordered from is now closing so all they can offer me as a refund. I waited 2 1/2 hours with no food and didn’t receive what I asked for. I believe it’s completely ridiculous that I was told that a redelivery would happen and apparently that staff member did not even submit the request. I’m actually curious if I will even receive my refund.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328225, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:50:28Z'}

title: Tolerable
review: I only really like this app because I can use cash to pay. The food is OK but yes often late and their tracker system doesn’t really let you know how far away the delivery person is. When they finally arrive, I get a call... when I would have been ready and waiting if the tracking system worked better. The selection of restaurants is good but almost all of the menus are in Chinese and with very few options in English. And since I live in Taiwan this is not uncommon but with other apps the menus are offered in English. They’re often late and I really hate that it takes so long to update the system let us know if the order has even been accepted.

title: Awful
review: Foodpanda is the worst delivery service. I would rate it zero stars if possible. More than once have I had food delivered over 2 hours after I put my order in. Customer service is horrible. They do not care that your food is late. I’ve noticed that when you complain that your food is late still in the processing status or preparing status and you want to cancel, immediately your order is changed to getting delivered. They do not compensate you for your lost time or late food. They do not solve any of the delivery issues. I will use the other services even though food options are not as great as food panda. Most awful horrible experiences. I’ve deleted their app off my phone but want to warn others of their crap service to customers and lack of responsibility.

title: Untrustworthy
review: I have used foodpanda frequently and now I’m really disgusted with them. Two weeks ago I ordered from the restaurant and food panda reported it was on its way here and then about eight minutes out it said it was canceled by the restaurant. I called the restaurant and found out that restaurant does not use foodpanda. It took several emails the food panda before they admitted they made a mistake. Yesterday I ordered from a local restaurant and was given 25 minute delivery time and it was closer to 50 minutes. Today I orderedFrom the restaurant and they said when they were one minute out that it was canceled. Screw you food panda you’re idiots and I hope your company loses a lot of business

title: Even Payment Decline, It Still Takes Time to Cancel Order
review:
I’m not sure why your app keeps giving payment decline error with credit/debit card payment. Sometimes, even when the payment is successful, it gives error notification in-app but says the order was placed from the mail notification. I got super confused at times.

Sometimes, when the payment is declined, your app still proceeds with the order and it takes the app 20 minutes to cancel order which is inconvenient. Your app is supposed to immediately auto cancel order upon unsuccessful payment to prevent duplicate orders in case if my 2nd or 3rd attempt is successful.

title: Best food delivery platform in Bangladesh.
review:
Foodpanda has the most intriguing food order system in the country. UI in both their app and web Is very simple and easy to use, enhancing the user experience. Their delivery men are also quite professional and knows the neighborhood well. Till now I never had to guide them to my address for delivery; whereas in other competing platforms, I had to guide the delivery man every single time.

Just one feedback- bring dark mode in your app, using the current white version sometimes cause eye strain.

title: Review
review: Foodpanda is terrible: no real customer support; their GPS is completely wrong- it identifies my address somewhere else thus confusing the poor riders; my delivery address is clearly indicated in Thai language, I live on a main road, next to the only hospital here, with my condo name & number clearly displayed- yet foodpanda doesn’t pass this information to their riders; taking orders then cancelling- refund process very inconvenient for international credit card holders; sometimes certain restaurants are available then unavailable- they refuse to offer services to foodpanda until they have settled their outstanding balance, which they are slow to do. Please improve.

title: Worst customer service
review:
Ordered on a daily basis for months. Useful service and great deals. Just don’t order if you’re hungry or risk getting screwed over.

I’m based in Malaysia. Recently tried some new restaurants. Turn out to be a self fulfillment services (no indication in the app saying that). Delivery expected to arrive in 2 hours. Reach customer service and manage to cancel that.

Second encounter, there’s a promo from Dominos Pizza. 30mins later I got a cancelation notice “due to technical difficulties at the restaurant”. Reached out asking customer service why, same reason given in template. Told them it’s horrible to have restaurants doing this, another template reply. Told him “thank you for being uninterested”, got a reply “sorry you feel that way”. Chat terminated and my account banned.
developerResponse: {'id': 11325910, 'body': '"Hey Grumps, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:04:18Z'}

title: What happened?
review:
My hanger is forcing me to write my first review to save others from expecting too much from this app.

It used to be so good before. And earlier, I tried to use it again (from Bangkok) and in the span of pretty much 3 hours, I’ve had two orders cancelled and one that is taking 1.5 hours to arrive??! After the 1st cancellation, the app said I could order within half an hour so I did. It said the food would arrive at 21:03. So I waited. At 21:04, no food, but an email that says that that my order has been cancelled. If you could send a notification instead of an email, would have been great. Third and last order I’m waiting for... ordered at 21:11. It is now 22:27. Still no food. I’m giving up. I’ve been dealing with this since 7.30pm.

I recommend everyone to go to ubereats if you suffer from hanger like I do.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11343361, 'body': 'Hey Taralulu,

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-19T11:15:02Z'}

title: Reliable!
review:
I have used Food Panda numerous times already and so far, the app has never failed me! The delivery was always on time, and if ever there was a delay, it would only be for a few minutes.

Tips: • Do not order if you are starving or feeling impatient. The preparation time is unpredictable and sometimes delays will be unavoidable especially during peak hours.
         • Don't rely on their chat services. It's pretty much useless.
         • Preparation time usually depends on the restaurant your ordering from. If you ordered from a restaurant with high demand, you'll probably wait a long time 'til your order is prepared.
         • Only order if you have time to spare and if you can still manage your hunger.

Overall based on my experience, Food Panda has surpassed my low expectations and has satisfied me with my orders. From the discounts to the friendly riders, I highly recommend this app!

title: Fraud, no food, no refund
review:
I have ordered maybe 4 times on foodpanda and only once had an ok experience. The first time the driver never showed, but foodpanda gave me a credit so i gave them the benefit of the doubt. The second time was fine. The third time the driver took an hour to deliver the food, with the gps saying he was “almost there” the entire time. Food was cold, I was too tired and hungry to complain. 

Last time they didn’t deliver my food and refuse to refund. They claim i cancelled the order, which I didn’t. My phone was sitting on the desk while my wife and I worked on a project together. Support has repeatedly refused to contact me. 

Foodpanda is fraud. If I wanted to deal with police I would file a report. They’re that bad. Hoping apple deletes the app so no one else gets robbed

title: Worst in class customer service.
review:
Worst in class customer service. If you have an issue on your order, dont expect to get help unlike in other apps...

I had ordered my dinner through them which was not confirmed for 30 minutes from them or the restaurant. The order was eventually canceled while my credit card was charged. Only available customer service channel is this online chat function in their app in which the staff never followed up with my questions and just left me hanging not knowing if i could cancel or get my refund. Sent them an email on this in which they said they will respond within a day- they did not. Only email they sent was a feedback form as if they have already closed my query. 

Have been a loyal customer but that ends today.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11351780, 'body': 'Hey Kulanard, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-20T09:47:15Z'}

title: Use Uber eats
review: I am trying to use it in Taiwan as one of the restaurants is on foodpanda only but not Uber eats. Poor app, no map tracking and hard to use. They do not allow US phone number but showed no warning when I register. Uber eats in Taiwan just works as in US. You can track exactly the status and show you where the car is. Well it’s probably not fair to compare foodpanda with ubereats due to their resources. I guess that is how startup in on-demand eco get killed finally. Sorry but I’ll use Ubereats whenever I can.

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:05:26Z'}

title: Convenient but poor customer service
review: App was easy to use and had decent restaurants. I keep having issues with their riders, however, because a few have been blatantly rude to my face. Riders have complained about how far my locations were. They told me I should just buy somewhere closer because they aren’t getting paid enough. They should complain to their management. I have no say in where restaurants choose to cater to nor do I even know where these restaurants are located. Not my fault they agreed to deliver to my house or workplace. Very unprofessional and audacious behavior. This happened in the Philippines. Not sure about other countries. Already deleted the app after 2 years of using it because I am fed up with these impolite, ill-mannered riders.

title: Many errors in ordering
review: Have met ordering errors which resulted in cancellation many times after a long waiting time. More than once I received notice that my orders were canceled because the restaurants were busy; Other times I was informed the cancellation without further details. In most of these cases, I got texts after waiting for a while and by then too late to make another plan. The online customer service only checked order status for me but seemed unable to tell me what actually go wrong. I hope this issue will be taken care soon.

title: Bad Restaurants Ruin the App
review:
I was able to use the app well when I was in Islamabad. In Lahore, however, my orders are frequently cancelled, including ones where someone calls and confirms that the order will be delivered within a certain time. It is incredibly frustrating to order food and wait, have someone call and confirm your order, wait more, then the deadline passes and you have no food. Then you go into the app and suddenly there’s a cancellation notice. 

If it was a one time thing, I’d understand. However, this has happened multiple times with multiple restaurants. So there are two problems: bad restaurants, and bad notification. 

Save yourself the stress. Call out for pizza. They’re pretty good at following through.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328270, 'body': '"Hey Eealee, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:52:37Z'}

title: RIDER STOLE MY MONEY AND FOOD
review: The rider cancelled my order but I didn’t get a refund because he claimed I was “uncontactable” when fact of the matter is that it was the driver who’s uncooperative! The directions to my house as well as the house # are indicated in the notes plus I contacted the rider thru chat and repeatedly gave him the directions. No reply from him and no calls either. I reported it to their support but they refused to refund my money because they’d rather take the word of their lying rider than their customer. I trusted this app and saved my card info to pay for my orders and this is what you’re doing? You refuse to provide a refund? I cannot trust this app anymore THEY ARE A SCAM! Rider would lie and say the customers is uncontactable and just steal your money and food. UNFAIR AND UNACCEPTABLE!

title: GLITCHY APP!!
review: I’m using FoodPanda in Myanmar. Although i selected “Current Location” and clicked “order now” after selecting items, it shows “Please Select Location” It works when i uninstall and re-install the app but i can’t be doing that every time i order. It really waste my time. When i reach out to their page on messenger, They always tell me to go stupid live chat which is not easily accessible via application. Live chat should be just right there (BIG BUTTON) and not hidden. Please tell your software developers to fix the glitch when ordering. Also there are no images of food in most restaurants in Myanmar location of FoodPanda. I want to see what food i’m getting and make better decisions not just names. Thank you.

title: Perplexed and at a loss
review: I had a couple of food ordered delivered successfully so I started to use Food Panda more. Today an order was placed and then delivered according to the app. But I never received it. OK so there could be human error by the rider, but here is my main problem with the app: the order tracking function is useless. It just brought me back to the home page. The rider should have contacted me to confirm my getting it, but the app does not have that basic function. So it is a risky app! Not good.

title: Worst customer service chats ever!!!!!
review: First, if Foodpanda rips you off and then ignores your emails, just file a dispute and chargeback with your bank! I’ve tried working in good faith with these clowns and now I’m done with it. Don’t waste your time on them and make sure you keep good records as evidence. Absolutely horrible customer service. You can’t call them, whenever you chat them, they tell you to email them instead. You email them and they do nothing but send cut and paste canned responses, completely ignoring your problem or question. I predict this company won’t be in business too much longer. New competitors are entering the market everyday and I am eager to try them because FP is so aggravating and frustrating to use!

title: 25% of delivery drivers hate your guts and will sabotage deliveries or call you names
review: Title says it all. 25% of delivery drivers absolutely hate their job and you cannot report them or do anything about it. These people also have your personal phone number and address. If you get one of these lunatics, you will get them again some time later. Imagine a tantrum throwing man child who knows your address and and contact info and keeps coming to your place at random. This is my experience with foodpanda, and there’s nothing you can do about it apart from stop using foodpanda. Problem is foodpanda has a virtual monopoly, so you have to use it or go out there and risk covid.

title: Take long time to deliver
review: They should include more Japanese restaurant, specially SAMDADO (if not added yet). Regarding delivery time it should not be more than one hour in Dhaka city. Sometimes I receive messages like “it will take little longer to deliver your food....,” “Order pressure is high in your area.....” which is good for the business but not so good for the person who is hungry and waiting for the food. As the business is good and growing fast, I expect they should cope with the pressure by investing more or deal on their own ways. However, overall service of Foodpanda is satisfactory.

title: Easily one of the WORST apps you can rely on!
review: 9/10 of my orders are bound to get cancelled due to some bs and then I just have to create tickets and contact representatives with 10 to 20 brain cells who can only refund me after a 1000 days as ‘policy’. In the meantime, I didn’t get the food I paid for and have to rely on other services (Grab is a more reliable option these days, not even going to lie). I was thinking of ordering just now BUT THE APP CRASHES WITH A ERROR THAT SAYS ‘Incorrect email or password’. Like, hello? I just ordered yesterday? Until all these issues are fixed and they step up, it’s gonna be a trash service. For real, guys. I wish I could post screenshots with this post to really stress the lack of commodity in this paid service.

title: If you want to eat, look elsewhere
review:
I’m lucky if my order isn’t cancelled on any given day. Until FoodPanda sorts it’s vendor performance, available service times, and terrible customer service, I’ll find food elsewhere.

Update: the app has slightly improved, but customer service continues to be a joke. Order at your own risk. Lucky if you get the right order... if you don’t, you may not get a refund.

Second update and final before deleting the app: good panda has left my family hungry more times than I can count on both hands, and they NEVER try to correct the problem. It’s a miracle that they are still in business with the offensively bad order fulfillment rate and an even worse customer service.

title: Best to good to bad to worst
review:
I used to use foodpanda a lot and I loved it as they were always efficient and got my order to me as quickly as possible with great customer service. As I continue to use foodpanda I noticed that the service got lousy and customer service wasn’t as good as it used to be. Now food panda gives me a headache every time I use it my order has been canceled three times for no reason and I was waiting for that food for more than an hour. I’m only telling you guys this because I really like food panda and I think you guys can improve. I just hate to see this great service go downhill.
I hope you take note of my comments and I hope to see a better and improved food panda in the future.

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:20:35Z'}

title: Love this app
review: I honestly don’t know why all the negative reviews! If it wasn’t for this app I wouldn’t have able to order food for my family in the Philippines. The drivers are also super quick! And the costumer service is amazing!  I had a problem where I did not indicated that I wanted non spicy chicken. The costumer service got on it right away and correct the order. Thank you for having this app! I can finally order food for my family across the world!

title: Ridiculous Wait Times And Service
review:
Ordered from Pizza Hut through Food Panda and they dragged it for 2 hours which was 4 times the expected time of 30 mins. After continiously stalling for two whole hours they offered a “pity” token to cheer me up. The outlet i choose was 5 mins from where i live in Phase 6, Dha and they used traffic and congestion as a transperent excuse or “lie” as at the end they told me that the problem was on the restaurant’s end as they hadn’t prepared the food. Pathetic.
Update: The same deal when ordered directly from the same branch of Pizza Hut arrived in 15 mins.

title: Delivery boys
review:
They have trained little more to navigate address on the net rather than ringing customers 4/5 times for a delivery.
Also they must be trained to address their customers by calling sir / madam which is normal practice but they call vai / vai or uncle which is not correct.
Day before yesterday my food reached me dead cold from Mad Chicken company and it was wrapped in a paper envelope which was fully wet.
By chance the bag was polythene which prevented foods fall off. It was real bad.
In delivery food this type of packing never should be used.

title: Poor Customer Service
review: The food received through foodpanda was stale. The buns were not fresh and fries were as cold as drinks. I got a complaint registered and some from customer service said we do not compromise on quality of food and someone will contact you soon and refund the money. I sent  reminder as well but there is no response. It looks that first set of people do respond but second set of people who have to take action don’t respond. That is very sad and unprofessional
developerResponse: {'id': 11326088, 'body': '"Hey Wais, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:12:00Z'}

title: Foreigner Friendly
review: I’m visiting from the states and have trouble buying things with my card. The cash on delivery option helps a lot. The deliveries have never been  mixed up in any way, the drivers have never had trouble finding me. The only criticism I have is being I seem to only ever have big bills I’ve had some trouble with getting proper change from the drivers so I try to have small bills as often as possible.

title: Improvements needed.
review: Loved the app before the ridiculous update which has made the entire experience bordering on the terrible. The photos are definitely not photos of the food that the restaurants deliver, the interface has become  ya too lengthy after the incorporation of photographs on the main page, the customer service is off the point when being chatted to with the usual reply being *somebody will get in touch with you*!! Improvements necessary to ensure that the app doesn’t lose out on its appeal of ensuring convenient food delivery!

title: A good one
review: I will definitely give honest review cording to me this is a great app I have ordered I think more than five times from this app yeah sometimes it makes problem for me like riders I get some problem to explain them where my house is but the food and everything is really good but one thing that happened me once which I think is really bad is that my rider forget the food half of my order at the restaurant like seriously but other than that I think this is a great app and I can prefer it

title: Perfect App for the foodies
review: I’ve used FoodPanda ever since they started here in the Philippines. Thanks to this App, I have discovered a lot of restaurants in my area, not just the usual suspects (McDonalds, Jollibee, Pizza, etc). Now they have PayPal option too for payment so travelers like me do not have to worry about local currencies. Thank you FoodPanda for adding Gastronomical adventure to my short visit here in the Philippines! You’re helping local businesses as well as travelers. Keep up the good work folks!

title: Refunds are a nightmare
review: 30 after I ordered some food, the restaurant cancelled without any apparent reason. I received an email apologizing and saying I’d receive a refund soon. 2 days later nothing. I contacted support and they said it would take up to 78h (which is funny because they charged me in less than 10 seconds). Days passed and I contacted them again. Same answer but with some funny insights into their process. Apparently I should receive an email that I’ll have to take to the bank in order for the money to be deposited. They managed to turn a simple refund into a real quest. It’s been over a week and still nothing. Hope no one ever cancels your orders. Good luck!

title: Perfect!
review: The first time I ordered from Food Panda was about a year ago. Took a long time, multiple texts from confused driver, not impressed. Tonight, I ordered again, from a wonderful Thai restaurant. Yes, it took longer then what the app said, but that is not something the app can control, depends how busy the restaurant is. This time, the food was amazing, no texts, the driver showed up exactly when expected, I was able to track on the app. Wow! I am now a believer!

title: Freezes all the time and GPS for driver is not accurate
review: The app is very frustrating to use. It crashes and freezes all the time and the vouchers hardly ever work. Also it is never accurate with the location of the driver. Most of the time it says the driver is further away and then I will get a call from the driver saying he’s been waiting. Very inconvenient for the driver. Also the hours of operation of the restaurants should be listed and the restaurants should be required to put a description and picture of every item

title: Update should make an app better r8? Bt foodpanda does it the orher way :)
review:
After the last update, the app stop working. It tries to locate my location, and fail and show a msg “ ERROR! Unexpected error occurred! Retry?” I have tried so many things and fail to use it. I have even try to delete the app and reinstalling it! Restart my phone and what not! I thought my phone was broke! I am a regular customer of foodpanda service! And this last 2 days is a horror story for me. I can’t order anything neither, I can fix this! What kind of update is this! You guys should test the update yourself fast then push it to the public! 
Lastly, plz fix this stupid update and make it work.
Thanks

title: No way to contact
review: It was late, and we were tired. We had no food to prepare dinner, so we ordered dinner. Just when it was supposed to be delivered, our order was “cancelled” because the driver could not reach me. I had my phone available. I try to contact them immediately to meet them downstairs, but there was no way to contact the delivery driver. They call through the app, so I had no missed calls showing or any indication that they were trying to reach me. We had to have cereal for dinner.

title: Worst Service
review:
I have never seen such ignorant support of any service around the world but Food Panda Customer Support. 
I ordered and they cancelled it without letting me know , while i called their support, i dont know who’s that ill-mannered and ignorant attended it and behaved so non professional and told me they cant deliver the order to my adress as it is just 50 meters far away from their delivery point . 
I will give 0 star and -10 for their cheap customer support and behavior.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328544, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:02:40Z'}

title: I love it.❤️
review:
It’s completely user friendly and there have more Resturant’s and grocery shop. Everything is completely fine. 
But try to add NAGAD on Payment system because right now NAGAD is the biggest mobile wallet in Bangladesh even also bKash. You have already added the bKash payment system. If you’ll add the NAGAD and others options on the payment system it’ll be more before and more user friendly.
Thanks 😊

title: SOFTWARE ISSUES
review: I ordered McDonalds the first time. It said it will be in my place in 30 mins, give or take. However, after I exited out of the application and then went back to it, my order does not show and it is only seen in the history of my previous orders. I had to reorder McDonalds. BUT the first order of McDonalds showed up to my door and I requested to cancel my second order. Then the same thing happened: I went back to the app after exiting it, which was after I requested for the cancellation of my second order. Care to explain food panda?

title: Great Service!
review: VERY happy we finally have Food Panda in Korat (Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand). Great selection of restaurants. Very fast and courteous drivers. I had a small issue with one of my orders and I contacted Food Panda customer support, they resolved my issues right away and gave me a credit (voucher). Well done! I recommend Food Panda to every I know and I use it myself almost every day. Sometimes two or three times in a single day. Thank you so much for coming to Korat!

title: Works fine in the Philippines
review:
Order review was fine. Paypal was fine. Order came ahead of schedule and was everything I ordered. 

Have had bad experiences before but I think it’s more on the Delivery service than foodpanda. I’ve gotten discount codes for late deliveries also. No real complaints. Would be nice if the places didn’t use plastic and so much of it but that’s the curse to gift of not having to leave the house. Overall Satisfied.

title: Horrible location services
review: It took me half an hour to get the app to acknowledge the location I kept selecting again and again, and even then, the name shown on the map was incorrect, this is going to cause so many problems in the future, every time I’ll order something the rider will get confused and I’ll have to explain it to different individuals every single time. It’s not my fault that you guys can’t work out your location settings, where my house is being shown as some random cosmetics location, it really is appalling. You should do something about it so that you don’t end up losing more customers in the future

title: Terrible service with no explanation
review: All kids of stores are inexplicably “temporarily closed” day after day with no explanation. When we call the stores and they tell us they are open and sending out orders with food panda as we speak so it must be our phones. Well we used our computer and three cell phones with no luck, so it’s not our phones’ fault. Would you please explain why you are providing services to only some people?? I see your riders out by our building so it’s not our location. Are you always short on drivers but don’t want to admit it?? At least tell us what’s happening. We are definitely switching to using Uber Eats.

title: such potential ruined by incompetence
review:
i cannot believe i waited an hour (15 minutes after the supposed ETA) for the app to tell me it’s only now preparing my food - and minutes later have the app tell me that the restaurant had to cancel my order.

no one even bothered to call earlier? all i got was a message saying the food will arrive. beyond that, nothing. next thing i know the order’s been cancelled. what amateur BS is that?

title: “Help Center” was far from it
review:
i tried to change my delivery address and the support guy literally wrote “LOL first time?” and then proceeded to say, nope can’t change it. also, the interface is worse than just about every delivery app on the market, and you have to log in every time again and put in your details any time you try to order something

deleting it now

title: Stop Duping Customers- Worst Service of All
review: I have never been so irritated in my experience of food orders. Foodpanda app doesnot provide any details regarding which areas the service would cover. They are more than happy to take your private info (such as phone no and email) to create account and take an order as well. However, after 15 mins or so a driver will call and say we don’t offer service to your area. “You should have done proper research before joining our app” - this is what I heard from the driver. Then why the hell did you take my order if the area isn’t under your coverage? Stop duping customers foodpanda. You don’t even deserve a star.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11449852, 'body': 'Hey Shadesofhappy , 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T14:22:34Z'}

title: Not as good as Grab Food (Grab App)
review:
I would like more options to filter and sort restaurants.

I would like to zoom in and out of the map that shows the driver’s location.

Most importantly, I need to be able to tip the driver from within the app.  I can’t do contactless delivery with this app because I need to give cash to the delivery driver.  In the Grab app I can tip the driver directly through this app.  I rarely carry cash so I always have to choose Grab because I have to use cash to tip the Food Panda driver because I can’t tip through the app.

title: Foodpanda is full of 💩
review: Seriously I have deleted and downloaded almost more than 5 times, hoping that the service would get better. It never does in fact it gets WORSE. There has not been one time where I have not faced any problems with delivery from this app, you people are seriously incompetent. What kind of service are you running?? I had to wait for my food for THREE hours which is absolutely ridiculous. NO REFUND no COMPENSATION or nothing not even on the delivery fee. Your excuse was that it was raining. It had already stopped raining an hour ago and food STILL hasnt arrived. This is the last time I'm ordering from this low grade company.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11340547, 'body': 'Hey Syima, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-19T06:49:49Z'}

title: Good Service, Pestering App
review:
Ordering food for delivery is really fast. Faster than Grab which is why I switched. 

But the reason I only gave it three stars is because everywhere I navigate in the app there’s another pop up offering something, or messages taking over the top half of the screen asking to upgrade to pro, or even open a different page than I requested advertising something else. 

It’s becoming really annoying to navigate that I’m actually considering going back to using Grab.

title: The app s customer service has gone downhill
review: I use to love this app, but there customer service went down the hill. So let me tell you what happened, I ordered food which was suppose to arrive in 20 mins and did not arrive in 60 mins, during which I contacted help center three times during which I was assured my food would arrive (different time every time ) anyhow I asked them to cancel the order after 40 mins or so, they refused to do that. I was stunned. Anyhow by the time my food arrived it was freakishly cold and I had to throw it away, I contacted the app and there response was that we got busy so we can’t help you, not our fault.

title: Seems good to me
review: I’ve used this app for various restaurants in Hua Hin about 5 times in December 2018. Have not had any problems. Food always arrives in reasonable time, and they deliver inside my hotel to my room door. Interface is clean. Seems like all menu items might not always be available, but I would think that is on the restaurant owners since they would have to supply that information.

title: Worst food delivery service ever
review:
Do yourself a favour and download Cheetay instead. I’ve been a long time customer of Foodpanda (over 380 orders), But I’ve had enough. Never again will I deal with such rude and unprofessional customer service. Multiple times they’ve completely messed up my order, Cancelled randomly after 1hr of waiting and shown complete lack of responsibility (completely refuse to accept their fault). 
Cheetay on the other hand, has a far better customer service (with helpline) and much better and smoother delivery. Save yourself the headache of having to deal with the foodpanda customer service (which is chat only).

title: Unethical business
review: Today I have given order of 5 items. But the restaurant Hungry max delivered 4 items out of 5. But delivery man taken 5 items bill! When I box out the food than I found only 4 items. I called the delivery man and he shown apology and requested to wait. After 30 minutes later I called again and talked with restaurant manager he said he send again it and he laugh! But he didn’t do that. I try to complain by chat with foodpanda, some one sahadat reply me a little bits and advice to reorder the item! But it’s already 4 hours has gone but they didn’t send my food nor send back my 160 taka! What a service it is!
developerResponse: {'id': 11327207, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:06:55Z'}

title: Clear and precise
review: Compared to the rest off similar apps this is by far the best one. It shows exactly the price with no additional fee(apart from delivery fee which still will show you before you even click on anything) by the time I check out. Just wish there are more restaurants and café specifically for vegan category otherwise I would have given a 5*.

title: Food ratings
review:
Food ratings are useless! Why do they ask for star and comments when I can’t read other people’s comments. I want to know why a restaurant is 3.5 Star and not 5. I want to see individual ratings for recent. 
Had 2 read experience. The food is not as advertised and delivered late. I can’t even warn people how bad the food is. Restaurants will abuse! If they have a high amount of high rating, any new rating will not affect it. Meaning they can do quality at the beginning and then cost cutting rip off food later. Typical bait and switch of food places. I need to see all comments and also filter for recent comments
