If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-20T09:51:04Z'}

title: Cheater food panda
review: I order food from restaurant approximately 2 months. Many I order food with vouchers and many with out vouchers but every time the restaurant provided disgusting food . Specially they cheating, there some manu name special Briyani or packages those are same as normal packages and also in this special packages they provide lowest quality food and small amounts. I see the restaurant place , which is very disappointing. I overall mark this restaurant food 3 out of 10 and restaurant place 1 out of 10 . Food panda also cheated us . They can’t not provide us good restaurant. Also many good restaurants cancel their dealerships with food panda

title: Great convenient service!!!
review: Great app, has been a life saver during pandemic! Easy to order and so far the delivery items have been better than promised. Overall we are very happy. The only reason for 1 star less, is the delivery people never have change. Not even for 100 taka, when I’m already giving 100+ in tips. So it’s the delivery people who are costing the 1 less star

title: Ordering from Website
review: Ordering from the app on my phone is great! Would have given 5 star but had issues with ordering online from your website. Items were not being added to my cart and keeps giving me an error, issue was never resolved. Customer service just kept sending emails informing me issue is resolved. Just gave up after so many emails without a resolution.

title: horrible customer service
review: ZERO STARS orderd food , delivery couldnt find our address. they have cancelled our order however they still charged me. They said the delivery guy would not answer the phone. I asked for a refund. They said they would ESCALATE this matter to ther managers and would either send me an email or call me.. 3 chats later they still have failed to send me an email or call. 1. we dindt get our food delivery 2. they did not reply to me by email as said 3. they didnt even bother to call me when they found out i didnt get an email 4. there is no accountability. Call ur bank , report as a scam to get a refund

title: Foodpanda in Dhaka
review: Foodpanda in Dhaka has got worst these days.. They will say good will be delivered in 10 minutes, then they will take 45 minutes. If they time, they should say it clearly. Why lie? This is happening on a regular basis. Frustrating! 😓😓😓 Also, the rider never gets the correct address from system. They keep on asking for address. I wonder if he is actually a delivery man or an intruder!! 😖 Be careful guys!!!

title: decent app, could be improved
Worse deliver app system
review: Just worse, i tried countless times to log-in it kept saying wrong password and tried to creat new account it wont allowed even thi trying to change password. Im a generation Z person this app i can say its the worse out of all. Im in a country where it only has 1 app. You can’t even complain about food, no refund, nothing to make up for guess satisfaction when food arrived so late or then the order is wrong. Doesn't understand why the app developer cant see these problems, losing interest and driving out to eat is a lot easier than trying to use this app

title: Delivery time is horrible
review: When you’re browsing a menu in the app the estimated delivery time is 45 minutes. Once you place the order the estimated delivery time jumps to 1 hour 15 minutes. And the order arrives in almost 2 hours. There is no way to contact your rider or track where he is. Worst experience ordering food. Wouldn’t recommend this to any one. I ordered food from a Chinese place that’s 15 minutes away from my house and it took them 1 hour 35 minutes to deliver it. The customer service chat window within the app is a total waste of time. This service needs to improve a lot.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328161, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:47:46Z'}

title: Genuine Review
review:
I have been ordering food on this app here in Dhaka since lock down and the service has been great.
I really hope that all food outlets and restaurants get added to this app.
So far I have had 90% good experience and few bad ones where riders screwed up the delivery location.
There is room to improve and become the number 1 preference

title: Poor on iPad
review:
Dear FoodPanda,

I am much more willing to hand an iPad to my guests so they can select items than I am my personal phone.   Only an iPhone version is available and it is poor on iPad.  I often skip foodpanda because of this.

I have yet to find a pizza offering that allows me to select the ingredients I want a la carte.  Do you not make it convenient for restaurants to add a set of checkboxes for this?   I always have to call the restaurant directly and order Pepperoni + Green Peppers and skip foodpanda.

title: Average services
review: The services are good in the sense that the food gets delivered from most places that don’t deliver on their own. The services are bad in the sense that about 30-40% of the times the food is delivered later than what’s being shown as delivery time. I’ve had a couple of occasions where the wait time from 30 minutes came some to 11 minutes and then stayed at 11 for another 10-15 minutes. In such instances, food is often also cold when delivered

title: Weak design and service vs UberEATS
review:
Unlike UberEATS, Foodpanda doesn’t warn you if you are not at the delivery address.

This makes it possible to accidentally send food to the wrong place if you’re used to always sending food to your default location (e.g., your home) and then once decide to order food while you’re at another location.

I tried contacting customer service when I realized what had happened but had to try multiple times and wait a long time for a response. Eventually I got routed to a service center in another country and got a long distance phone call from someone I could barely hear. I would have gladly paid an extra delivery fee to change the address, but he told me they can’t change the address and won’t refund my money, so I ended up paying for a bunch of food that I didn’t receive.

I can understand why they have this policy, but they should at least build a user experience that doesn’t allow this to happen.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.

title: If I pay online they either miss product or don't deliver at all
review: My order with FOODPANDA online number "bbus-so4y" had a missing product eggs , and lastly My order number "bbus-80c0" not delivered at all, both payment was made Online and no refund or re delivery was made... First their help center told that rider accidentally pressed the delivery button but they will deliver in 10 mins but they never delivered. Killing my time for 2 hours hyvrepeatedly taking time. Now they are saying they would not refund or redeliver... It is unfair and as if they are stealing my money...  I don't pay online anymore it's not safe with Foodpanda BD

title: Can’t order and late food
review: A fine app but needs a lot of work to run more smoothly. Food is almost always later than the estimate, from 10-30mins. Many nights I open it I can’t even use it with the message “It seems like a lot of people are hungry right now!”. I don’t know if this is more to do with my city of Kuala Lumpur or the app, but it’s very frustrating to not be able to order most of the time, and when I can it’s going to take a very long time to arrive.

title: Taiwan foodpanda
review: Idk what they’re doing here but food panda is basically consistently terrible with their customer service. Maybe they need a better hiring system because literally almost everytime something goes wrong or people don’t check the order notes or the time keeps extending again and again. Uber eats barely gives me any issues and the only reason I order from here is the restaurant I want only has an arrangement with food panda. But literally so annoying this app and the service.

title: Convenient
review: Foodpanda has always been convenient. They could improve by warning you before a restaurant closes. I do hate to place an order and then 30 minutes later, find out that I have to find another option before they close as well. It would also be easier to have more pics of the food for all restaurants. The delivery people are very friendly.

title: Really Addictive
review: I didn’t realize how much I would like this app. I got it originally since I had just moved to a new city and didn’t have a stove to cook yet, but I found that it was extremely affordable to get food delivered and there was lots of good restaurants available so I have used it so much already! It’s much cheaper than riding a tricycle to a restaurant myself!

title: Captive with awful
review: Food panda under estimates delivery times every. Single. Time. Which ok, they want to seem more efficient than than actually are. Recently they have begun to take orders for restaurants that are actually closed and inform you an hour or more later. This is extra fun because now all restaurants are closed. In my experience they never keep the promise/ contract that they make. In the Philippines, we are a relatively captive consumer. They clearly take advantage of this. I’m be had much more success with Grab or any other alternative. After a year plus of frustration, go elsewhere

title: DON'T SPOIL YOUR APPETITE
review:
They are unresponsive towards your complaints, i ordered and waited for an hour, kept on asking help center for any information, ended up ordering by direct calling restaurant and getting my order within 30min.
This happened not once but twice, first time i paid via card and it was ridiculously difficult to ask them for a refund.

title: Customer service is BAD
review:
I have ordered with food panda for over a year. Now the application one day says they don’t deliver to my address. 
I contacted customer service but they basically said to find another address to deliver to?

So strange the customer service is terrible.
I spent over 30,000 baht in the past with food panda. Now I just switch to foodio or eatathome

title: Love/hate
review: I love this app and business because it makes my life more convenient. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because one almost all my orders I have had my food late. Whether it be the restaurant or the driver, the times should be more accurate. Although they do give vouchers, sometimes it can’t make up for being 2 hours late. Food Panafa is not reliable especially if you are planning a gathering with friends. The food might not be here on time. **embarrassing**

title: Worst customer service
review: Customer service wont refund ur money even if u show them proof that u didnt receive ur food and will make u return for the same issue and they wont even let their supervisor talk to u via live chat (they even promised a specialist will contact back after 30 mins) but no one will reach you back / help u on ur issue making u go circles until u give up. Worst customer service ever! They don't know or I bet they don't even have a "first call - resolution" policy. Don't provide a customer service support / live chat if ur company won't even resolve the issue!!!

title: The Worst App!
review: This app is the worst. You can place an order and a bug in their software will simply cancel your order while you’re waiting for your delivery. You’ll be told something such as “you were unavailable to accept delivery”. The customer service is atrocious and you cannot reach a human being. Finally, if you take your chances with this lousy service, NEVER pay in advance by credit card - only cash on delivery. If you use a credit card you’re unlikely to ever receive your delivery and then good luck with the refund process. Avoid this app.

title: Pathetic customer support
review: One of my order items was missing and when I asked the rider that did you check the order before picking it up? He said that’s not my responsibility and our job is just to deliver the order, the restaurant verifies the order. Then I asked the customer support agent to call me as I was really frustrated but they don’t even bother and continued to chat with me. I wonder a company like FoodPanda don’t even offer phone support to resolve customer complaints which is very frustrating. Time to delete this app and move on to other options.

title: Buggy App, Late Riders
review: In the first 6 months of 2019, i feel like foodpanda app and service has gone down considerably. First the app is always freezing. Second, while browsing or booking food, there is always a sudden surge and then the restos suddenly close especially at lunch or dinner time. Third, the riders tend to be late even up to 1.5 hours. If the app cannot fulfill the service, then notify the customer sooner than wasting his time waiting. Fourth, they used to give coupons for late deliveries and that is gone now.

title: Faulty Payment System
review: App kept saying that my payment did not go through. Tried multiple times with two different cards to complete an order. I am based in the U.S. and the recipient is in the Philippines. Both my cards are fine.  I figured it was probably because of my wifi signal as I was out in public. Finally, after 17(!!!) attempts, the order is completed. Guess what? Both of my cards ended up being charged for the single order, and they are saying that it’s up to me to dispute the amount with my card company! Ridiculous!

title: Refusal to assist with canceling order
review: I contact Food Panda Immediately after placing an order through their app because there was an issue with the order. The time it took the rep to even respond the status change to preparing and they refused to help me and the rep just stopped responding as I was explaining my issue. Why would an app have you contact a rep for simply canceling an order when it can be an option for the user to do themselves. I will not use this app again and have deleted from my phone. And wasted money in the process of using this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 11326399, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:23:41Z'}

title: Restaurant closed
review: I don’t even know why if a store is closed why would it show up on foodpanda app? I order something and waited for 50 minutes for my delivery. It shows that the restaurant is preparing my food, the delivery guy at the restaurant, and next thing I know my order was just gone without a text or anything, I have to ask in the app where’s my food then foodpanda tells me the restaurant was closed. Why was it on display in the first place? And nothing till I ask where’s my food then they reply. I don’t never rate app usually but this is beyond annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328168, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:48:00Z'}

title: Brunei's top online delivery app
review:
Atleast for me 😊

When Foodpanda was first introduced here, I was already excited because I find it convenient to find all restaurant that offer delivery in one platform which Brunei has been lacking for the online community. 
There were few options when they started but now, I'm glad to find more and more options to choose from.
Yes, the delivery sometimes takes more time than it was meant to and the food was not packaged well. I still use it because I saw improvements from time to time, something that let me to hold on a longer more. 
They even give voucher for my next order as compensation as well so, thats a double yes for me 😆

title: Waste of time!!
review: Ordered last night and waited an hour and a half for my food, come to find out they were missing a dish so they canceled my order. This afternoon ordered from the same place, waited an hour and 25 mins to find out they closed 30 mins after accepting my order. Of course they canceled my order again. I don’t understand why they can’t just reject the order from the beginning? Why do you we have to wait until the end of the order to find out? Just horrible! Larb Suan is the place I ordered. Food panda needs to get this addressed!
developerResponse: {'id': 11325869, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:01:38Z'}

title: Very Satisfied
review: Previously their customer service was the worst, but now everything is very smooth and easy to communicate, i simply love their service and the delivery man’s behaviour, I would humbly request everyone to tip them 50 taka extra as they work hard :) anyway thanks to foodpanda team for improving your service system.

title: On time delivery delicious food courteous driver
review:
Ordered through Food Panda Philippines. Got my food on time. I love that the food tasted freshly cooked and warm. I also love that I can monitor the status of my order and the exact location of the driver through the App. 
Chatting with customer service agents was also a breeze. Will definitely book again in the future!

title: App issues!
review: The order window keeps disappearing when I order something. Due to this, the same order was delivered four times at my place on the same day. Please look upon this, this problem has been there for weeks. And today my ordered food was not even delivered
developerResponse: {'id': 11325980, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:07:56Z'}

title: Highly Disappointed
review: Our order was received but the restaurant never started preparing our meal. It took over half an hour and the foodpanda assistant was no help whatsoever about the details of our order. 10 minutes later our order was canceled & I had no heads up or warning about this. Foodpanda assistance was very poor and no help at all. My husband and I are starved and this entire experience was just incredibly awful and unprofessional. So much problems with this delivery service and would never recommend such to anyone in the future!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 11351840, 'body': 'Hey Ashleigh, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

title: Terrible service, high fees
review:
They do the opposite of how a food delivery service should operate by charging high delivery fees for the worst service among all food delivery companies

Although they have a wide selection, which is why I really want to like the service, they make the food ordering process extremely inconvenient and unpredictable with unreliable delivery times and poor customer service. It is a gamble every time you order, with the only certainty being bad service and a high delivery fee. 

Until this company cares more about the customers, it doesn’t deserve any!

title: Excellent Customer Support
review: Really good app! PayPal payment method makes ordering food for my GF in the Philippines so easy! Only problems I’ve had were from restaurants messing up on the order and delivery guys spilling drinks but the FoodPanda customer support took care of things easily. Would definitely recommend to others and I will keep using it.

title: Slowest and laggy app ever in the whole universe
review:
This is just beyond imagination how an app can be so laggy and slow in this 2021 ?
Takes so much time to load.
Sometimes pictures of the food are not showing. If I compare uber eats and hungry naki with food panda. Foodpanda is not even in the category to be compared in terms of app development. 
Bogus.

title: Bad service
review: I tried to Bad service.  I tried to order from rodan and after waiting for 45 minute they cancelled on me. Saying they ran out of food.  You shouldn’t even be listed if you are out of food.  You should also offer discounts for making me wait 45 min and cancelling last minute!
developerResponse:
{'id': 11325313, 'body': '"Hey Customer, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
"	', 'modified': '2019-10-18T09:38:44Z'}

title: Good but not
review: I used to order food panda every meal I had when I had school. Now during quarantine I don’t order as much. Just recently, I had 3 wrong orders in one week and I don’t like paying cash so I pay with card. There were so many missing things in my order and I never got a refund on my card and they said it was already processed. Imagine 3 orders that were wrong. Money doesn’t come out of our as*es. It’s from hard work. I’ve been using Grab Food now and the drivers ensure everything is available before getting the order.

title: Frat but could be better
review:
I’ve been using this app for around 3 years now . It’s been a good experience but instead of minimum off days it tends to have a few 
Delivery timings on this app are lies . Never gotten an order on time for a while and it’s happen to got a lot worse over the years 
But most of he time it’s on point so I don’t have much to complain about..

title: BEST DELIVERY APP
review:
This is one of the best delivery apps I have ever used. Their food always comes before the predicted time and so it kills the hunger inside us immediately. I love the feature where I can text the person making my food. There are always good deals and recommendations. The food is never cold and always made fresh. 

Keep it up.
🤗🤗

title: Terrible delivery time
review: Food often shows up over an hour late and sometimes takes two hours when app says that it will only be 30 minutes. Food always shows up cold and delivery guys do not know where a lot of places are. Either get more drivers, or do something about this. Waiting over an hour for my food is not something I have time for, and I am sure others do too. At least they have fixed the chat to be immediate now.

title: No customer service
review: I ordered food from a 24 hours restaurant near me and waited for more than 3 hours. The food never came, and the customer service person refused to fully refund me. This is the worst service I ever experienced. They will ask you to email customer service if the online chat service guy can’t answer your question. Then they will reply your email with the same template saying they are very sorry for what happened but they are not going to do anything such as refund what they steal from you.

title: Address reboot problems,service awful
review: The customer service was slow and non helpful. They pretended to speak English and when I responded it was clear she had no idea what I was saying. Chat was even worse just kept sending the same message. I only use this in an emergency at one time it was ok has taken a huge step backwards

title: Very bad service!
review:
I’ve been using foodpanda lately a lot, There’s two major problems the first is the wrong orders, when you order something you get something else! I don’t know who’s fault it is foodpanda or the restaurants but overall very bad service.
The second problem is the delivery service, some delivery guys they tend not to bother to deliver the orders to the apartment they call for you to come pick it up outside the building, as they don’t want to waste time on delivering the next order.
Forgetting that this is the sole purpose of this app to deliver the food from the restaurants to your doorstep. 

I don’t want to sound so negative, the service dose the job on delivering food but the wrong food and bad service! So if you’re hungry this app will get you food ASAP but don’t expect to get what you ordered nor to get it to your doorstep.
My overall technical rating is 1 star very bad service!

title: Awesome app
review: I’m so pleased with this app. Foodpanda makes my life easier during this pandemic. I highly recommend it to everyone and it’s so easy to keep track my order and I always get a discount which is a huge plus for using it. Thank you so much foodpanda for delivering my grocery items & fresh, delicious, and hot meals!

title: Garbage customer service
review: Used to be a good app, now items are constantly missing from my orders. Customer service offers vouchers that are so low in value they’re practically insulting. Customer service interface alienates you as much as possible from actual people, half the time I’m convinced I’m talking to a bot. Total disdain for customers, company designed it so it is very difficult to get help when you need it. Cut out the middleman and buy directly from restaurants, you’re helping them more if you do that anyway.

title: No refund
review:
What is wrong with customer service? 
How come we don’t get a refund? Our order got cancelled cause the they couldn’t find the address. The thing was, the delivery guy only sent us one message and didn’t wait for us to respond. Then he cancelled our order. Now customer service is telling us we don’t get a refund. Another experience is that, they gave us a different order. If my brother in the Philippines didn’t call the driver, they we wouldn’t have gotten the right food we ordered. Overall, bad experience.

title: Great service while living in Bangkok.
review: Foodpanda was a thing like 5 years before the west caught on. It was the best app and most reliable app for ordering food. No ridiculous fees like Doordash or Grubhub in the US. Tipping isnt a thing but you can certainly give a good delivery panda a 20 spot for a job well done. Use it or go hungry, up to you!

title: Terrible
review: I’ve been charged several times for food that never arrived. I contacted Food Panda and basically they said they’d look into it and then never contacted me again, basically hoping I’d forget and they could sneak it by me. Also, the app is often inaccurate on time estimates and doesn’t even try for an accurate map experience. If you have the ability to use a different food deliver service such as Lineman or Grab, do it. Food Panda should be your last resort.

title: Late delivery
review:
Even after all the bad reviews I thought to try it myself. The delivery time shown prior to order placement was 45mins which turned to 60mins once I placed the order. And the food wasn't delivered on time even then. 
There's nothing given there so I could track my order. 
They really need to make it better or else should just drop it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11436489, 'body': 'Hey bajnshejnd,

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response', 'modified': '2019-10-24T04:29:18Z'}

title: Order got canceled in last minute
review:
I ordered lunch 4days in a row, and 3 out of 4 days they are late 5-20 minutes. The last day they even cancel my order in the last minute. 😠

I ordered lunch to deliver at 11:45 am for my boyfriend in different country. I ordered hours before the restaurant open and got the order cancellation at 11:25 saying they are out of what I ordered. I mean it’s okay to cancel but not okay to cancel in last minute. Now he has to stay hungry till the end of the day (no other restaurant near by). This is the service you will get.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328231, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:50:42Z'}

title: Worst customer service among the big three
review:
Our order got delivered to the wrong address even after clarification with the delivery person through call and text. Foodpanda refused to compensate us. Reached out to customer service multiple times but they refused to address the problem. We have not received compensation till this day.

Furthermore, I receive notifications from the app every day informing me of new vouchers to use. But they’re all unusable as they expired in 1970. The customer service team refuses to reply my emails.

title: Food Stinking
review: I ordered food from one of the restaurants through food panda. But i got stinky and smelly food and i complained to them. I told them to refund but they insisted me that they will re deliver it and it will be better. They did. But again food was stinking and they refused to refund saying it was redelivered so we can not refund back the money. So they were the one who made this policy they are the one who provides other choices and then they are the one saying they had such a policy. Lack of transparency and they doesn't comply with normal standards.

title: I am really shocked
review:
My first experience with this app, I order the food I wanted and payed for it in full! 
After 1 hour I get a message saying my order was canceled because the restaurant is to busy, I then took a bus to the place I ordered from and to my surprise the guy at the register was on his phone because it was so dead... the bus ride is 10 min away. 
This app is a waste of time and my friends say that the food always comes cold, save your time and use a different app for ordering this one is just gonna let you down!

title: Recent issue with how Delivery charges are shown.
review: Have been using foodpanda since a long time in India. Till recently the delivery charges used to be clearly shown on each restaurant's page. But recently the terms seem to have changed and now the delivery charges only show up only after adding items from a restaurant in the basket. Also there is no clarity when the delivery charges are applied and when they are not applied. This recent change is bad and hope foodpanda can rectify this at the earliest. Have stopped ordering from foodpanda for now.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11440117, 'body': 'Hey GoStanza , 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T07:36:18Z'}

title: A very good app
review: I am a frequent user since 2015. I find the overall interface to be quite appealing however I have one small request if you can accommodate it, please include an option to tip the rider when I pay with credit card . Thanks for hearing me out.

title: The worst of the delivery apps
review: Consistently late deliveries, missing items and a customer care team that is comically bad. I once had an order stuck in “Being prepared” status for four and half hours, with the restaurant refusing to pick up the phone, before Foodpanda Customer Service agreed to cancel and refund the offer. After hour #2 they said if I wished to cancel the order, I’d have to forfeit the full cost of the meal and delivery. They are that bad!

title: Very very bad and irresponsible
review:
1. Takes very very long to deliver (takes more time then mentioned)
2. Messes up the order and brings wrong food, but still charges more 
3. Does not compensate for wrong order and late deliveries 
4. Content is spilled in the box
5. Riders are irresponsible and brings someone else’s orders
developerResponse: {'id': 11326118, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:13:40Z'}

title: Horrible customer service
review: The WORST customer service in the food delivery game. If you have an issue and contact them, unless it’s a very minor issue they will not help. They copy and paste from a script from a few key buzz words you may send, but they don’t actually read and respond to your problem I’ve already lost 150 due to them not actually doing anything to help, and having to cancel charges now with my bank because customer service won’t respond to me 🙃

title: App notification issue
review: App is changed completely and it’s awesome the UI is so impressive and easy to use but i am having app notification issue from last 3 updates i have tried open it from my profile but it isn’t working for me, tried reinstalling the app but it couldn’t help either.

title: Favorites?
review: Food delivery is great, app is okay, when it works properly. Most restaurants need better descriptions of menu items & it would be best if you could click on items to see the expanded description. Also, it would be so much better if you could save your favorite restaurants. Currently, you can only look at past orders & try to remember what was good, what wasn’t.

title: Delivery estimates are often off by 30-60 minutes
review:
Food panda is terrible. The last 3 times I used them they had a relatively short delivery time estimated but I always get the “we are running behind it will be another 60 minutes” message.

They don’t have an option to cancel the order or even offer partial refund.

I reached out to customer support when the hour estimate was delayed another hour. Two hours to wait for food delivery???  Unacceptable!  They refused to let me cancel the order.

{'id': 11438071, 'body': 'Hey crohana, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T06:29:30Z'}

title: Grab and Lineman are the way to go
review: I used to love the easy interface that foodpanda offered but the longer I used it the more problems I faced. The long drive times the drivers getting lost after sending them multiple ways to get there. It wasn’t a one time occurrence and after multiple times I give up on the app customer service just blames you and doesn’t offer any apology or discount for there own mistakes avoid food panda

title: NO SERVICE LATE NIGHT
review: i would just like to say that the app is great and the money back stuff is good but sometimes or most of the time they won’t show restaurants at all and it’s annoying  cause all those restaurants are delivering but they don’t show and it’s very annoying and also u guys should bring the live chat service 24/7 again not only when u order

title: Waste of time
review: I have tried to order several times on numerous days but can never get the required text message. I have global service so this makes no sense. I’ve tried to chat with someone multiple times. Either super long wait so I end up ordering something off a restaurant website or they sign off when I don’t respond within 30secs. Quite annoying to go through the whole process of choosing a meal and then not actually being able to order it.

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:21:57Z'}

title: worst app
review:
among all the food apps i have tried, this is the WORST!!!!! DO NOT BOTHER to download. if it’s possible to write a review WITHOUT putting any star, i would not put any.

if in case you are enjoying the app, good for you! however, don’t bother chatting with FATIMA KHADIM when you need help. she’s apathetic! you would despise the app during your chat with her. so, if you love the app, end the chat if she’s the one online.

first time for me to write a review here in Apple App Store ‘coz i wanna warn other users considering to download this. do yourselves a favor: DO NOT EVEN CONSIDER THIS APP!!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 11327005, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response. ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:56:21Z'}

title: Ugh
review:
The only reason I even rated this delivery service a 2 is because it actually is working (Deliveroo has been down for the past 3 days) and the driver was kind.  
The selection of restaurants is mediocre at best. The actual time updates the app provides are completely wrong (I’ve been at 1 Min from delivery for the past 25 Min). I’m finding the entire process to be very frustrating. By all accounts, just cook at home or go out to eat.

title: Please pass my appreciation to Burger King CEO 🙏
review:
Yoooh this is the best thing I’ve ever had today!
I just broke up with my boyfriend just to enjoy my Burger King meal in peace 🤗 and trust me we are not getting back together again because your Burger King is more sweeter than my relationship right now🤞…
Burger King I salute you ! Keep it up 💯

title: Poor customer service and hopeless app
review: Too many glitches in the app. Cant take picture while on chat. Can’t see the cancel option is when searching for photos because it’s white on white. Called help line but nothing positive. Receipt from restaurant was for less amount but rider asking more because foodpanda want the charge extra for delivery. Should have ordered from restaurant directly. Overall it has never been a single good experience while ordering from foodpanda.

title: Rude, borderline bullying customer service.
review: Fraudulent transactions, unfulfilled promises of refunds and cheating algorithms are the hallmarks of this company. Today an options popped up while trying to use the app where I was supposed to give it a star rating for the App Store, I tried multiple times to give it two stars but it kept going to four stars automatically, so I had to come to App Store and give it two stars manually, which is too generous after their app trying to trick me to get four or five stars.

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response. ', 'modified': '2019-10-24T14:21:51Z'}

title: Worst food delivery service in Bangladesh
review: Shows that they are preparing my food for 30 mins and suddenly shows they are currently not available due to high demand, wth man? Then i keep refreshing till they come back online only to see that my order has been cancelled adter waiting for 45 mins, terrible experience never using again, and would advise everyone else too! Not worth the hard time, rather go the the restaurants in person, would be way much less of a hassle :)

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:43:11Z'}

title: Big Orders - Special Notes
review: Using food panda is my favorite tool to order quick group meals. Be sure to utilize the special notes section for all of your personal quirks. I have used them twice already on this trip and knocked it out of the park each time. Right on time even during the busy New Year festival.

title: Worst service I’ve ever experienced
review:
Writing from the Philippines here

Food Panda either under hires, under pays, or under trains their staff because 90% of my orders are late, and customer service never responds or gives vague answers. I’ve even caught them lying to my on the status of my order.

It is clear that management is in this business, not to provide a service that is reliable and consistent, but rather to make a quick buck. Please, don’t spend your money on this company. Companies like these deserve to go bankrupt and close shop.

title: Excellent
review: So good only problem is when you put the exact location it puts on a different directions. I have to manually locate the place at the exact place otherwise the drive is lost

title: WORSR DELIVERY SERVICE EVER
review: order a pizza from dominos last night and the app said my order arrived. When asked about the order they said I need to contact dominos. When contacted, they said my order never reached their system and when tried to contact foodpanda they never give a proper answer. Next morning tried to get a refund because I was charged for a nonexistent order :) now when I reached out to foodpanda again they placed my order again when I never asked for them to do so. Absolutely disgusting.

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:48:41Z'}

title: A great app for ordering food cluttered by a bad interface
review: I love using FoodPanda to order food from restaurants. But lately the app is getting more and more cluttered with other services, and to make things worse, it pops up screens that keep me from doing what I came to do… order my dinner. I’m hungry, and the app is trying to upsell me something I don’t want. Every time. It’s annoying.

title: FoodPanda across the miles
review: I am from California and my husband is in Singapore. FoodPanda allows me to order food for my husband all the way across the miles. Through FoodPanda I can make sure my husband gets his meals even when I am far away. Thank you FoodPanda. I highly recommended.

title: They Never Refund
review: Placed an order to KFC through Foodpanda. KFC is claiming they never received the request for the order. I never received my food. After showing it as “Preparing” for 6 hours they finally updated it to “Delivered” inside the app. Does it make sense that a food item will be delivered after 6 hours? Anyway, I had already paid through credit card. There’s no way in your app to lodge a complaint, I’ve reached out to you over messenger and email, only getting automated replies.

title: Awesome
review: Service is fantastic but the only thing that needs to be changed is having some restaurants such as McDonald’s and KFC accept vouchers . Plus voucher deals should be applicable without a minimum spending of 500. If you wanna compete against Eat Mubarak then this is one way you can do it

title: App is great but service isn’t in Khulna
review: I have used this app both in Dhaka and Khulna. It’s not satisfying in Khulna for me. The delivery is super fast but the delivery boys keep calling. They can’t locate a simple address most of the time. Sometimes the food quality isn’t good enough but foodpanda keeps ties with them.

title: Worst. Blames Resto when the service fails.
review: More than once, the order would go through until the very last minute (after 45-60 minutes!) then cancel, claiming that the restaurant didn’t have the dish  available. On all those occasions I called the restaurant directly and it was available for delivery. Told the restaurant the app made them look bad. Gave it several chances but will no longer trust the app if it is this unreliable.   Ruined evenings after waiting so long. Awful app.

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-20T09:54:54Z'}

title: Horrible customer service
review: Made an order paid by visa. Driver did not come and cancelled the order after it was paid for and was sent out for delivery. He never came to my street. I tried to contact customer service and got a notification 15 minutes later that it will be reviewed and I will be contacted in 24 hours. When my Visa card can be charged instantly I don’t see reasoning for it to take customer service 24 hours to review a claim. If you use this app DO NOT USE WITH YOUR VISA!

title: My experience
review: So far, foodpanda has been better than any other ordering app in Bangladesh, in my experience. Even though they have messed up a few times by getting late, they are usually always on time and deliver good food

title: Do NOT install this app!
review:
I tried ordering three times, i waited for 2 hours each and the order got cancelled . 3rd time, the driver could NOT find my address even though I directed him using google translate and easiest English anyone could understand - when the other delivery services such as pizza company, kfc and mcdonalds have no trouble finding my home so. 

Totally horrible and time wasting! Anger is the only thing this app brought me. 

Do not try this app , go out there and get real food and be happy.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328116, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:45:22Z'}

title: Report a problem option
review: When a restaurant forgot to sent me an item, often they forget to include an item..there should be an option to complain about it immediately after receiving and checking the good packages.. please add such options.

title: Delivery scammers
review: Please be careful especially if your in the Philippines. If you electronically paid with a credit/debit card. They will say thing as “your payment did not go through but you order is on the way just pay in cash and your bank will be refunded 3-5 business days. Not true because customer service told me 30-45 days, and if food panda says other I have taken screen shots saying it. All in all foodpanda please background check your delivery people.

title: App doesn't work
review: I placed two orders successfully. Third time I tried, payment failed. Tried a different card, payment failed. Tried a different shop, payment failed. There is no "live chat" customer service in this app, even though all the documentation and FAQs say you can use "live chat" to contact customer service. There is no support email address in the app. I had to hunt online to find a support email. The app developers and the company management is clueless about UX.

title: Delivery tracker
review: I have enjoyed your app but I feel the delivery tracker in your app is very poor you need to update the delivery tracker it tracks deliveryman very slowly it must be very very fast and you should make the app to add the picture in the menu so costomar can see what they are ordering

title: Thank u...
review:
Thanks, food panda for being there when things go wrong... it’s lockdown and risky for us to go out but ur there to make things convenient and easier to grab our food orders.  
We get to have our orders on time and even earlier as expected ❤️

title: Great Concept / Great Food / Lousy Technology & Service
review:
It’s a great concept when it works.   Consistently I have issues with: 

1) Changing delivery times, increasing in scope 

2) Foodpanda G.P.S. / Status not working correctly 

3) When you need to cancel / update an order, the “bot” service tries to stall you until the restaurant begins preparing and too late to cancel. 

4) Chat is Bot technology, still in its infancy 

5) When there is a delay, they blame it on the restaurant, several times I had a driver who made multiple stops before my house (probably picking up and dropping off other orders. 

Again, when it works, its quite convenient; but still hit or miss and undergoing a learning curve.

title: Consistency on giving food late
review: The option and availability of food from different restaurant is great but seriously the delivery is so goddam late all the time. I order food online because I’m lazy to go out. But the restaurants that are barely a mile away from my house take minimum an hour to come. Why are your delivery system so poor. It shows 50mins but it’s never before 50mins.

title: Horrible!
review:
First time they cancelled my order with an app notification after 30 minutes. I was relying on them for dinner that night. Had to stay hungry the whole night. I deleted the app that night. 
After almost a year, I tried food panda again. And they again cancelled my order after 10 minutes. Though the app showed the order was accepted. This time they called to let me know. 
There are other options. Try anything else but this one.
developerResponse:

title: No way to directly communicate by phone.
review: No call Center number, no call option with the delivery man. Every one is hiding behind the app. Only Charing option which is worthless and time consuming. Worst is when ur waiting for your delivery and the delivery man delivers to a wrong address. Because the delivery man never calls unless you select cash on delivery and no option to call him either. If you use online payment, you may have to face the hustle. Poor app.

title: App Stopped
review: I used to order food by food panda. but i don't know why like 1 month ago, I cannot logg in or use food panda app. I thought it's because of my ph's version so i even upgraded my phone version and install food panda again. But still app stopped with unexpected error message . This time i reinstall again and try again. Lukl i can login and place order. I hope food panda team will find solution soon and hope to use food panda more often like my old days...🤗

title: Cannot search shop and their menu effectively
review: While we search for a shop, it doesn’t appear even that shop is already available on foodpanda. And show menu more simpler please

title: There is no date and time that order should be deliver
review:
I have placed so many orders for my dad from other county. Sometimes I wanted to have a preorder and forgot when I did order. When I checked the order placed email there is no date or even time when the order should go. Pls update so everyone can see the date and the time for preorder. 

Thanks!

title: Cant Update Phone number
review: i've change my number from account then saved. it showed saved successfully. but when i goto account again it shows my  old number

title: Charged my credit cars many time but did not deliver
review: Foodpanda charged my credit card several times and never delivered food. It is better not to use card since the company does not refund when food isnt delivered.

title: App is a cheat and terrible cust service
review: Careful using the app the new interface cheats you of ordering 2x. When you click the item and when you click customise, you thought it will just customise the order but adds 2x. And the view cart separated from pay button is another cheat, normally ecommerce sites ask you to review order before paying but with new interface when you click pay no review anymore directly pay so be careful when using !!!! Customer service is a farce!!! Full of BS!
developerResponse:
{'id': 11351849, 'body': 'Hey mlalainev, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-20T09:54:26Z'}

title: There is a bug of the system
review: The team is refusing to address a bug in the system and charged me because of that.  One SINGLE order has been placed and for unknown reasons 2 orders were delivered at the same time with the same same to the same addresses for the same customer.  The team is not willing to address the issue and asked me to pay for system’s flaw.  No idea how people can run business like that.  I will not be using the app again.

title: A good initiative
review: Foodpanda is a really useful app to have for times when you’re hungry but don’t have the energy to pick up a phone and order food. A few swipes shows you a sizeable variety to choose from. Highly recommended.

title: Prompt delivery, works as advertised
review: Extra star for being one of the few delivery services in Thailand to accept PayPal. Food was delivered within an acceptable range. No issues with the order. Will definitely use again.

title: Good
review: Good one. But take care of the size & quality of meat potion. Increase more baby products. Otherwise I love their service. Thanks. Btw, why there’s no voucher given to the customers. Guys, there’s loads of competition in the market. Tbh, you gotta be more attractive in terms of discount dealings..

title: TOP NOTCH!
review: This is the second time I’ve ordered for my mom.. I live abroad and it’s super convenient and efficient!!! Now we can easily share with our loved ones back home ♥️♥️♥️ and so far no additional charges for international credit cards, too!

title: Great app, needs improvement
review: Food comes fast. Only issue is if you’re an English speaker. The address finder needs improvement. Every time it can’t find my place or sets it to the wrong address, then I have to put the right address in the notes. The chat feature is nice. Definitely a great app this one thing just needs fixing

title: Trash Experience
review: this has been happening since a while now and i have been nothing but patient with them but enough is enough. this is full crap and trash service. its been so many times that i make the order and order does not get accepted, if i call the restaurant they said they didnt receive it, if i call foodpanda they said that they are trying to call but no one is receiving the call. Obvious LIERS. such a pathetic non professional service. its just trash
developerResponse: {'id': 11327056, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response. ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:59:15Z'}

title: Customer service at it’s worst!
review: If anything should go wrong with your order, don’t expect help from the customer support. Customer is not King at Foodpanda. With more than 100 orders in Thailand it’s time for a bad review. Orders get canceled if not enough drivers are available. If items are missing you will not get a refund. Not even a voucher is offered to get a free delivery or something for your next order! Support chat tries to get rid of someone as fast as possible. Disappointing!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 11328495, 'body': '"Hey Django, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:01:04Z'}

title: Thanks for letting me use it From USA
review: Great app overall for delivery in bangladesh , just need some improvements on where the driver is exactly on real time location, and also need more easier eay to communicate through online with delivery driver

title: Major delays, poor app function make this app and company pretty much unusable
review:
Foodpanda’s functionality has decreased significantly in the past 3 months. Orders take an hour to an hour and a half, despite 30 minutes at the time the order was placed. Drivers are ALWAYS delayed or just don’t show up to he restaurant. And the food arrives cold. 

The app will not let me pay with credit card, or add a new credit card, and only lets us pay with cash half of the time. Meaning half the time, the app just doesn’t accept payment. Which means I can’t use the app. 

Customer service can never actually fix any of the above problems, after contacting them numerous times about each. 

For all of these reasons, the app has essentially become unusable.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328553, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:03:06Z'}

title: Horrible business
review: So my order was accepted and after waiting 40minutes they notified me that the restaurant closed and they cannot accommodate my order anymore. This has happened several times to me. This is the last time you’re going to starve me.  You should close for good Food Panda!

title: Almost Best
review:
The only request I’d like to ask for now is that the customers should be able to view a closer look at the items with much bigger size and realistic condition. 
Everything else is fine at it’s best.
Yet the user interface isn’t much impressive.

title: DO NOT TRUST IN APP RATINGS
review:
The app decides when you can leave a review and when you can’t.  I’m sure by coincidence every time a driver really screws up or the restaurant YOLOs my order I can’t leave a review.

I literally got nothing that I ordered and what I ordered was awful but even after contacting them I was unable to leave a review.

This has happened several times. If you can’t find reviews for a restaurant elsewhere consider twice before ordering, they might be fixing their rating.

title: Credit Card Payment Method Not Working
review: I was able to pay with my credit card once. After that I wasn’t able to make payment with card once. Every time I tried it shows Error Occurred. Only cash on delivery works. Please solve this issue

title: Restaurants cancel orders on a whim
review: Food panda offers no recourse when restaurants unilaterally cancels food orders.  This happens often.  Very unreliable.  Basically a crap shoot whether restaurants process your orders or not.  Until reliability of providers improves, I strongly recommend you not rely on app.
developerResponse: {'id': 11326112, 'body': '"Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:13:22Z'}

title: Best food delivery  app!!!!!
review: Food Panda offers a wide range of restaurants within our area for ordering food with their fast delivery system. I've always got my food on doorstep within their given time Frame. Very satisfied with the service of food panda!!

title: Terrible
review:
Always late. ALWAYS. Often cancels orders after waiting 30-40 minutes. Almost never offers any compensation other than a refund. Customer service reps do not care whatsoever about your frustration and will offer nothing more than insincere “apologies.”

Do not use this app unless you have no other way to get food (i.e. you are imprisoned somewhere) and don’t wait until you are hungry to order, plan 1-2 hours BEFORE you actually want to eat.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328607, 'body': '"Hey Zandar, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:05:20Z'}

title: Can’t choose more than one of any sides
review: You need to allow for me to choose more than one of any side. I’m forced to choose something I don’t really like. When I order your 2 whole chicken it only allows me to select 1 hotness. What if there are others who prefer more or less spicy. I can’t do it. As I’m ordering 2 chickens obviously it’s for many people with many different spicy levels.

title: Lack of human rights!!
review:
Absolutely garbage behavior towards their employees paying people less than bear minimum.
Their HR needs to do something about this, otherwise more people will be boycotting the app.
It's high time you guys start treating your people right.

title: Third Class service
review:
I would never recommend this to anyone. I Ordered food from the app and vendor didn’t show up on time and then he canceled my order and foodpanda blocked my account for not receiving the order, even though I received the order that was so late and gave him the tip as well. 
Tried zillion of hours with there support to convince that I received the order but they are not ready to listen anything and really non professional support..
developerResponse: {'id': 11327118, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response. ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:02:03Z'}

title: Not Concerned About Customers
review: I have used this app several times with many errors including food arriving 30 min late, cold, poor GPS coordinates etc. Each time customer support gives me a voucher and each time the voucher doesn’t work. They promise to get back to me but still haven’t heard back 1 month later. UBEREATS is far from perfect but SO much better than foodpanda. Don’t waste your time with them.

title: could be better service
review:
i placed an order last friday and was eagerly waiting for the food to arrive to feed my family and guests. we skipped the meal my mommy prepared in favor of this order even if there was a scheduled delay of an additional 45 minutes but to our surprise TWO HOURS later nothing arrived. whar happened? 

i sincerely hope that the orders taken should arrive every time.

title: Its horrible and bit good.
review:
I am using this app since last 2 days. What i have found. 
- Their payment is spam. What amounts you have seen in the item the real amount is bigger (excluding vat, service charge) 
- Offer available when you apply the offer nothing changes. 
- Food item available, when you tapped food item is not available.

title: Issue with “challenges and reward” option
review: doesn’t show “challenges and reward” option in my ios device ( version 14.6). Reinstalled it several times but still same issue. It also doesn’t show the “floating panda icon” in the app. Please fix this issue in the next update.

title: Unresolved matter !!
review: My first account got hacked and I wrote to the food panda team for help. Till today ( been 5 month ) Nobody called to help me resolve and No email . Nothing . Customer service is pretty bad when it comes to that and I felt as a customer that I wasn't important . Anyways made a second account because I had no choice as some vendors only sign with Food Panda . I'm now only paying with cash in case my other cards get hacked too. Unbelievable !

title: The front doesn’t know what the back is doing
review: Customer service, riders, restaurants— lots of room for errors. It’s so easy and convenient but don’t expect a smooth experience every time, especially if you have guests, or want the pizza to be flat in the box, or want the whole order to arrive at the same time.

title: Searching Problem
review: I am professional webdeveloper but unfortunately you need to change query in search button . The problem is when i was typing restaurant name  without completion my name search label show me there is no restaurant without touching search button i hope developer understand that thing
developerResponse:

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.

title: On ads there is OFF on app nothing
review:
1- Almost every week i see % off on foodpanda but on app there is nothing like that..
2- Late night orders are accepted & cancelled after few minutes
3- Still I appreciate its one of its kind, when in Pakistan there is no other option to eat foodpanda gives few options at least.

There is always room for improvement, keep good work up

title: I 💙 FoodPanda X Kumu 💙⚜️
review:
We promoted FoodPanda on Kumu early 2020, and when I got the chance to go back to the Philippines, FoodPanda has been a lifesaver!

Affordable delivery fees, friendly riders, and GREAT FOOD! I can’t wait to see more and more eateries join the FoodPanda chain, so we can have more options!

title: Terrible
review: Service is terrible. Food orders never arrive. No idea what the status of the order is ever. Sometimes the order gets cancelled and they don’t even tell you that it has been cancelled or why it was cancelled. Honestly terrible. Last night we waited two hours for our food and it never arrived. They said they couldn’t find the driver? Total disaster. I never give reviews on apps, but this one has been so bad I felt compelled to warn people. It really is bad.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.

title: Estimated delivery time LOL
review: I placed an order for food at 8:20 the estimated time was 30-40 minutes until it arrives. I was in conversation with a representative at 9:30 when the food hasn’t arrived and was told the food will arrive at 10:05. I then told the representative to just cancel my order this is unacceptable and was told that is not possible. Your service is the worse service I have ever used. I hope this review helps others so they would avoid this app.

title: Food never arrived very frustrating
review: We waited over an hour for our food. We then called them and they said our delivery was in the way and would arrive in 15 min. 25 min went by. No food. We called again and they said they tried to call but couldn’t get through to us so they just cancelled the order. No where on our confirmation did it say they would call us. They gave no explanation, just said you can order again and still have to pay. :(

title: Fix your location precision
review: I the pick-up option to buy food closed to home but was directed to a pick-up location 6km away. I only realized the mistake after placing the order; then the customer service refused to refund on the wrongly placed order. Your location precision was off and I paid the price ??!

title: Good app. But...
review: Foodpanda app is great for ordering food items. But since I am on a tablet device, I feel the need for a tablet version of the app. Using a mobile app in my tablet with blank spaces both on the left and right sides feels somewhat awkward.

title: Lifesaver for overseas family
review: Thank you for this service!! Highly appreciated from overseas.  Wish a lot more places can post their availability here.  Hopefully Robinson’s or SM groceries be available here soon too. Thank you again

title: Got rid of their support because they were so awful
review:
Seriously just amazingly incompetent. And now they’ve removed their support and only have an endlessly annoying help center that takes you to pat answers and has no actual support when they inevitably screw up as they often do.

Update: now their internal map feature seems to be incorrect for my location. And their drivers are incapable of understanding that.

title: Be careful!!
review: I ordered from the same restaurant every day for 3 months. Never any issues. Than one day the driver couldn’t find me and didn’t use the app to contact me. I was available and driver never contacted me.  He canceled the order and Food Panda refused to refund me!!! I couldn’t believe it. After 3 months of daily use.. never any issues.. they are going to be that stingy?? I don’t think I can use them in good faith if that’s how they treat their customers. Unacceptable.

title: Worst app with worst service
review:
One of the most pathetic food delivery app is foodpanda. They have zero customer service and the app has no basic user friendly options.
I am wondering that these guys are there in the market since so long but still they are in this condition while hundred of other newcomers are doing way better than foodpanda.
In Pakistan as there is no other option, it is only option to use. I wish Zomato comes to Pakistan.
developerResponse: {'id': 11327107, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response. ', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:01:32Z'}

title: Food footage and Apps
review:
First of all I’m disappointed while I like to see food pictures and tap on food name it’s become order cart!! No picture seen!!! Without seeing footage of food could not understand the menu items and others decorations items.

Secondly search option! If I search Taco result comes Tacos Catering and they don’t have Taco!!!! LoL LoL. 

Please make more friendly and workable Apps. Until that don’t show and disturb by yours Apps’s advertising on online.

title: I use often
review: Not sure why all the gripe reviews. I use it a couple of times a week and really haven’t had a problem. Each restaurant tells you how long the delivery time is. Want it faster, to get it yourself or choose a place with a shorter delivery time.

title: Made me wait 2 hours for food that didn’t arrive
review: I ordered food that they claimed was going to arrive in 40 minutes, but after 2 hours they cancelled on me. Ordered food again, but the delivery estimate changed after the order was made from 35 minutes to 3 hours later. So I didn’t end up being able to get food from the app. App is also slow and inefficient. Stay away from Foodpanda and use another app instead.

title: First time order, slow delivery more than hour
review:
I have used Foodpanda for the first time but very disappointed. My order is #ju00-ooyi and I placed my order at 13:21. The App said it takes about 30 mins to deliver but now 14:25. It is more than 1 hour without delivery yet and I have no any update rather than “it will be deliver within 5 mins” since first 30 mins.

Do not use this app. Very bad management. Go to Grab or others instead.

title: Never takes card payment
review: No matter what it says, I could never get to pay with my credit card. This is really frustrating.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11340447, 'body': 'Hey Smashscion, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-19T06:37:42Z'}

title: Can’t be trusted to deliver your food
review: I have a high tolerance for forgiveness but food panda has finally broken that. All of my last several orders, over several weeks, have successful been accepted, shown progress on delivery, extended the expected delivery time, and then been cancelled. I thought it was bad luck at first but it’s now clear it’s the terrible, unreliable app/service. If you’re expecting to get the food you ordered and paid for delivered, good luck.
