Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:57:51Z'}

title: Easy and Excellent
review: Gave it a try and now find myself using it almost weekly. It makes ordering food for meetings a snap. One time they had to delay the order a few minutes and someone called me immediately to make sure it was ok.

title: Thumb’s up!
review: I’m so satisfied with the service. Yesterday, I thought the food would be brought to the point after 40mis I ordered so I went somewhere which was a bit far from the point yet within 20mins the rider contacted me and tried to get closer to the spot where I was.

title: Needs Improvement
review: My saved favorite restaurants that I previously ordered were no longer available in my area. I reached out to Food Panda and restaurants but they seem couldnt figure it out. Choices are getting limited. Used to like this apps coz I live in the US and I order food for my family 3-4x a week. Now I dont think I will be sending quite often.

title: Fails to load all possible options at times
review: This is from a new customer of foodpanda. The app seems like it doesn’t always work since I’ve been trying to use for the last few days, it keeps showing me no delivery options in DHA Lahore while saying there’s 328 restaurants near me. Hope someone can reach out to me in regards to his specific bug.

title: Request, from bd
review: Foodpanda should really add a beverage option. I’m lazy so I order food from foodpanda but I have to out anyways to get my self Pepsi or Coca Cola. The rider should accept request from the customer to get beverages too on their way, like do you get me???

title: Excellent speed and customer service!
review: Wow!! I wish we had a food delivery service with this level of customer focus on the US. Food arrives on time; if it doesn't, they normally offer up a voucher for next time. App is extremely easy to use as well.

title: Worst system ever
review: This is so frustrating, when I enter my address it doesn’t even show the right location. Then the drivers call me but they don’t speak English so they end up getting lost and I have to wait 1.5 to 2.5 hours for my food EACH TIME . Really bad system that the map is wrong and that there’s no communication system or translation the way grab has. When are you going to fix all the issues ?
developerResponse: {'id': 11326262, 'body': '"Hey Steph, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:18:38Z'}

title: Solid App and Excellent Service
review: I have had consistently positive experiences with the app and the service. Even when there is confusion around my order, the resolution is always fast and to my satisfaction, which is the most one can hope for.

title: Payment
review:
Hello, i live in myanmar,  I wanna pay for my friends who live in Pakistan.
I heard that foodpanda in Pakistan can pay with Visa card payment 
So, when they order foods, can they use my Visa card account to pay?
I’m worried I can’t pay cuz I live in Myanmar

title: Service Quality in Dhaka
review: Overall, it is good. However, there should be an option to order from multiple restaurants.

title: Horrible customer service
review: All I wanted them to do was fix my pizza and they couldn’t even do that a simple fix. They couldn’t do that. Your app need a better way of wanted to add an remove certain things that you don’t want. Instead of just adding comments on the bottom and at least have a better way of explaining it to the restaurant that you order from. Don’t want to ever use this app again.

title: Order location
review: Order location should be flexible as long as the location is on google map. Currently the application do not allow the customer to choose their exact location. So customer and delivery man have to make a lot of phone calls to get the food delivered.

title: Couldn’t use the 300Taka off voucher
review: I received a voucher of 300 tk off for guessing the World Cup teams right, later when I proceeded for payment- the voucher wasn’t working. There is not a single way to communicate with Foodpanda! No phones, no chat, LITERALLY NOTHING! Worst service
developerResponse:
{'id': 11440371, 'body': 'Hey Nazifa, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T07:45:26Z'}

title: First time and it's great (from Philippines)
review: It was my first time trying this kind of app and it was great. Delivered on time and even update me thru calls. I see the one-star reviews are from other countries. But here in Philippines (cebu) it works fine

title: Pretty Good
review: Some say this app is useless or whatever but we all have our own opinions and some experienced good or bad experiences with this app. It’s super easy to use, it’s self explanatory. I think that this is a great app honestly! Do recommend!!

title: Don’t recommend
review:
Delivery address form is weird, details are not saved, only the auto location is filled in after filling in all the fields.
After more than 2 hours I still haven’t received the order, the only contact details are chat and email.
After writing on the chat, an automatic response from an Ibrahim from Egypt was received saying I should “reset” my IP for the correct “Otlob Customer Care” service to respond.... I’m in Romania.. Europe..
developerResponse:
{'id': 11353739, 'body': 'Hey dark0n3, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-20T13:00:57Z'}

title: I GOT SCAMMED! BE AWARE!
review: I’ve been using their service for several months and there aren’t any major issues. Recently, I paid my food via Visa Card, unfortunately the order got canceled by the store and there’s no refund. I’ve contacted their customer service to solve this problem and they reply me with a ridiculous excuse “ You have to wait for 30 days for the refund”. A month passed away, I still don’t get a refund even a penny. (FOODPANDA CAMBODIA)

title: SCAM and POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
review: I’ve been trying to be nice I waited 18days since everytime I emailed them for follow up they always sent me the same message. Looks like they didn’t bother to process the refund. I’ve been expecting them to be more responsible since they are the ones who cancelled my order. I will never use this app again. Poor customer service didn’t get my money back, they can keep it! I do not recommend this app.

title: Not so good not so bad
review: Just because the cancellation process I give foodpanda 4rating . Customer should have get a 3 to 5 min time period so that if he changes his mind like want order something else he can. Or else Customer Rider And CS have to take the hassle to verify it then cancel it

title: The app is garbage
review:
After recent updates the app is  just garbage. Constant crashes on iOS 13 with iPhone X. Any sort of extended scrolling will cause it to crash, sometimes requiring 3 restarts to make an order. 

Add this to the chronic problem of FP suggesting only restaurants that pay it to promote and leaving other relevant and closer locations buried in search results. 

This company desperately needs competition. Maybe then they’d put in effort to fix the app.

title: Good Service Mind
review: Everything is hard to be perfect, but one thing I like about the app and this company is fast and responsive customer service. I chose the wrong address to deliver my food and after 5 minutes wait with promising agent’s word. I adore your service.

title: The best food delivery app
review: Free delivery and discounts? What else can I ask for? Sometimes, it takes a while for your food to get delivered. So plan ahead. Don’t order when you are just about to die of hunger!

title: No slide back option on the app
review: Where is slide to back option for ios. Bad app design. The back button is on the top left. Which is really hard for anybody. Please fix it.

title: No Challenges & rewards segment in Xs!!!
review:
I have two iphones. Challenges & rewards section is available with Foodpanda in iPhone 6 plus. But unfortunately it’s not available with Foodpanda in iphone xs!!! Please solve.

 When I sign in with Facebook or hotmail account, app doesn’t show any Challenge & Rewards section. Need solution ASAP.

title: They value their customers
review: I am satisfied with their service, convenient and reliable. When you have a problem, food panda immediately makes up for the existing mistakes and tend to your concern.

title: They can cancel order after 2 hours
review: I ordered food and the timer did reset when it was time for food delivery. The CS is horrible. They gave me a new time for delivery and issued a small voucher without apology as if a future voucher found fulfill my hunger. Then my order cancelled around the new delivery time. Now I have to find a way to get food. My orders have been cancelled earlier too. UNRELIABLE!

title: Map issue; delivery is very good
review: When you select an address on the map, it places a pin on the address. However if you zoom in or pan the map, the pin does not stay in the spot you specified. Very weird behavior. Delivery is excellent with the exact time specified.

title: One of the worst app
review:
First of all there is no helpline. You order the food and if there is a problem you can only chat and not helpful at all.
Secondly the time is almost always wrong, they will say 30 minutes and when you check after 25 minutes it will show 45 minutes. 
Lastly, they will cancel your order without giving any reason and leave you hungry.

title: Comment section
review: I love the convenience foodpanda allows me however i would really like a commenting section where i can tell the shop how i want my food e.g:withot tomatoes. Consequently, it would also be helpful of i could contact the delivery guy aswell to ask his whereabouts and all.

title: Worst food delivery app
review: This app gives you the worse food delivery experience. Worst, ever. I think they don’t have real customer service all they have is a chatbot that does not solve your problems at all lol. One time I got spoiled food and got only half of the refund, of which wasn’t a big deal for me at first, but I never expected this was the start of nightmare, especially due to their disastrous customer service. Worst of the worst.
developerResponse:

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-19T08:31:48Z'}

title: Sometimes Terriable
review: Service is fine, but some places have very little information on the menu options. Some places don't show photos or don't list what types of meat in the item, etc. I complained once, they only gave me a little 100 baht voucher. Don't get too adventurous with the options, stick to places you know and you should be ok.

title: No way to contact support
review: I’m having issues with your app and I would like to provide you feedback, but there is no way to do so.  How do you expect to make improvements to your if you block out input from your users?  Providing an email address or online form would at least provide the illusion that you care.

title: Please FIX the error!
review: I tried to edit my phone number in the profile section. It keeps showing the same old number instead of the new one no matter how many time I edited it. Please fix it!

title: Never any Resturant’s open near me
review: I really used to like foodpanda and I have been using it from like 2015 but nowadays there is never any restaurants open near me cuz “it’s too busy”. It literally busy from 10 am to like 10pm so I only have like 2 resturant I can order from because I am out of their “zone” or something. I live in Dhanmondi 1, not even a remote area so it’s frustrating.

title: Horrible experience
review: I don’t know how this has such a high rating when the service is so bad. So many times they don’t consult with the restaurant and confirm your order anyways. My past three orders in a row have been like this. Please try ordering from restaurants directly instead of using this app because food panda is simply too unreliable now. It wasn’t like this before, now it’s horrible for some reason.

title: Management is extraordinarily substandard!
review: People stay with Food Panda only because there are very few viable competitors. For someone with a great business head and a passion for delivering REAL customer service this is a golden opportunity. That being said, I must say this is the worst food delivery service I have ever experience. My only regret with this review is that I had to give them 1 star...a negative rating would have been far more appropriate!

title: Good when it works
review: This app has a lot of bugs. There were times I needed to reclose the app over and over before it would finally take my order. It’d be a great app if it didn’t have so many technical issues.

title: Horrible service! I deleted the app… poor customer service!
review: I don’t care about the money for refund! I’m just upset with your service, your delivery person did not do his job and lied! Instead of thoroughly investigate the issue, you take the words at face value and dismiss your customers! Foodpanda does not know how to treat their customers! Glad to know before I further do another business with you!

title: Difficult to use
review: The payment page kept rejecting multiple credit cards. I live in the US and wanted to order a nice meal for family members in Thailand. I was unable to use US credit cards and phone number (had to use Thai cell # to create an account). It was very painful to deal with. Eventually had to use paypal which I dislike. Will not order food delivery on this app again.

title: FoodPanda Enables Fraud Account Creation
review: FoodPanda enabled a third party to create an account using my email address and name with an unknown and foreign phone number, likely throwaway, in a foreign country with zero authorization. When asked to have email address removed they declined saying they require I provide the unknown phone number.  Requests for escalation have all been ignored. There is evidence that FoodPanda is supporting this in order to artificially inflate their subscriber count.

title: Try to delivered all over the city.
review: Assalamualaikum, i live in chittagong . I want to request plz try to cover all the area to delivered the food & shop . I guess ur service must available in city corporations area bu in my area most of the restaurants r not available . Plz work on it . Ur shop option didn’t work on my area. My request plz try to cover all the area in city . Thnq

title: Unsatisfied customer
review: Riders never have exact change for money. That is the reason I added my bank account. But until today I had 3 refunds worth BDT500 which I never get back. I think foodpanda make money like this from all customer. They should refund the money as a form of voucher. They should mention out of stock while ordering. Moreover new addition is extra delivery fees. I am frustrated with their service.

title: Good apps but buggy
review: I was placing orders and some items got finished before placing it. It showed me warnings so frequently, it didn’t even allow me to cancel those items... i had to cancel full order and select the items again... hope you’ll look into that...

title: FoodPanda is S$&@
review:
Incomplete orders...cancellations only minutes prior to delivery time, no reply from customer service. This app should be removed from the app store as it represents fraud.

UPDATE: LOL..it took them one year before they replied to this review. That tells you all you need to know.  Get in touch they said...obviously failed to read the part of my review that stated their customer service in Singapore failed to reply.  Why in the f^&* would I try again.

title: Upgrade App or Service
review:
The app says your food is picked up & on the way within 1/2mins right after ordering 

Then again after 15/18mins it says “ your food is picked up . . . “ 

Please do something :)

title: Credit Card Payment
review: In terms of payment through Credit Card always error. Should Update it

title: Food quality
review: This is my second time that i’m ordering food from this service. Previous day ordered a burger and cheese potato fries. The burger was good but the fries was really bad. Today i ordered a pizza. Hope today’s food will be good.🙂

title: Pretty good but expensive
review: I like the convenience of the app but most places give you a minimum spend, plus a little pricey for delivery fee when getting one item. Many places will have their own delivery team and it's just as easy to order from them.

title: Good when works
review: Had great experience the first few times I used FP but lately my orders have been getting cancelled. And this is not immediately but like 20 mins. after placing my order. So much time wasted when I could've been looking for alternative ways to get food!

title: Never Use Food Panda
review: This is the first time we have used Food Panda. We ordered from the Pie Hole, which is delicious. However, we only got a third of our order. When we got on the chat with the rider, the best he could offer was a voucher which did not even cover what was missing from our order. Needless to say, Food Panda left a horrible first impression and will not be receiving our business again.

title: 1hr delay and no one cares
review: Foodpanda has the worst customer service. There is no help or support in the app. Even after the food is delayed for more than 1hr, there is no way to reach out or ask someone at the help desk for support. They took out the function of submitting complains, because they would not exist if it was there. All you can do is pray and hope that your food will arrive before the next day.

title: The update has made the app horrible
review: This app used to be good and user friendly until the new update happened, it’s terrible! Not at all user friendly!

title: Does the job. Does it well.
review: I use it in HK. Works really well. Simplifies a lot of things. You can use your credit card in the app by scanning it. Can sort restaurants by delivery time to your location. Couriers are always prompt and polite.

title: Cancellation
review: Took order, paid by credit card, then the order was cancelled. Nobody calling to tell me how the reason and how money will be reimbursed. Poor customer service.

title: Deals
review: Ur deals aren’t that great and ur delivery usually takes too long. Additionally it’s a huge hassle because most places don’t send some extra change.. for that u should either give an option for, in ur app or discuss with all the different vendors. This is especially important for customers that have just 5K bills/ notes.

title: Great service but terrible drivers
review: I use the app quite a lot but I’ve had enough of the riders. They refuse to follow the address given and end up lost but yet they still complain about providing the “wrong information”. When they arrive and you aren’t at the door you get bombarded with calls and messages. I hope the management can address this issue immediately

title: Language
review: I don’t typically write reviews but I’m highly annoyed that the language the food is listed in is Thai. What’s the point of asking me to chose a language if the main feature of the app is basically useless because it’s still in that foreign language? Sounds pretty ridiculous, to me at least, since I can’t read it without screenshooting it and google translating every single thing.

title: Lifesaver!
review: I can’t cook for dear life and have 2 boys who need feeding, i tried foodpanda for the first time, mainly because we all had to stay home during the covid pandemic, and I LOVE IT! It’s so easy to order AND you can track your order, ITS A LIFESAVER!

title: So easy to install this App and easy ordering
review: I am happy to find this App though reluctant at first but the App is so easy to use and ordering anytime is awesome. I just arrived from the US and this come so handy. Love it!

title: I use all week
review: Food Panda is a pretty good service I use 3-4 times a week when driving home.  Most of the time the delivery is on time and still hot.  My only issue is that sometimes the drivers don’t have change.

title: Terrible!!!
review: If you place an order, expect it to be cancelled about the time it’s supposed to be delivered...if it isn’t, chances are somethings going to be wrong with it. The orders are ALWAYS late, and if you try to use their chat customer service expect it to be a 20 minute process just to get a canned answer of technical issues as the cause of issues. Terrible service, find something else to use...

title: Missing unit number in address breaks trust
review: For some reason the unit number is never shown. It’s not shown in previews, when you order, and in order confirmation. Did the restaurant get the right address? Will our food get delivered to the right place? We’ll never know, until we get the food. Customers shouldn’t have to guess This makes the app unreliable and delivery service untrustworthy

title: Foodpanda and burger shack
review: Absolutely pathetic service. Extremely unprofessional attitude and worst service. They took all the time in the world like 45 minutes to deliver my order from The Burger Shack which is less than 5 minutes drive from my place. When they served and I opened it to my biggest surprise burger & fries were cold like it was kept for quite a long time. Never using this app or restaurant again.

title: Worst delivery app out there
review: I quit food panda half a year ago because the orders were always late and the customer service was terrible. 6 months later, I decide to give it another go only to be disappointed by the first order I made. The order was late and the customer service still didn’t help me at all. What a terrible delivery service that doesn’t put customers first.

title: App good but really bad service !!
review: Today was the third time I wasn’t able to order or cancel my order. It’s either no driver or takes forever to confirm the order then eventually cancels. I use it in Bangladesh

title: Awesome…almost perfect!
review: Great app available in English which the major competitor does not offer. My only criticism it the inability to enter a different billing address from delivery address. Otherwise perfect!

title: Improvements needed
review: Offer system and maps should be updated

title: Order cancellations
review: I don’t mind having an order cancelled. I can go to other options.  I do mind it happening after 15-30 minutes.

title: Worst Customer.
review: I ordered food but the food was not deliver.  Contacted the Customer Service to see if they can provide solution to the problem.  And the letter they send their customers is computer generated.  Even the response they give on here is actually copied from the letter they send their customers via email.  No matter what the problem is they only send one computer generated letter to every body.

title: Convenient
review: Really easy to comprehend, navigate, and perhaps the most convenient app for ordering food. Their delivery service is excellent, mostly on-time, and would never fail to satisfy!

title: Unreliable. Terrible Privacy TOS
review:
They charge prior to ensuring that they can fulfill your order. I prepaid for many meals that never showed up, only to have the help desk assure that you will get a refund eventually. How does that help you in the moment you are seeking convenience?  Thank goodness there’s competition now. Grab food and LalaFood.

Read the privacy policy.  They don’t care about customers or providing good service.  Cut out the middle man.

title: Not Dependable
review: I live in a densely populated metropolis with literally hundreds of food and restaurant options. My colleague who lives 4 blocks away recommended Food Panda.  My very first order was cancelled by the restaurant due to technical difficulties.   I’ll count my luck that it is a blessing in disguise.  But I won’t likely use this app again.  Obviously it’s grown too big to enforce quality control of the restaurants it allows to operate on its app.
developerResponse: {'id': 11327239, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:08:20Z'}

title: Food bland a
review: Yes, your service is convenient. However, you screw over your delivery people and the customers. You jack prices up by 5 to 10%. You offer a limited selection of what the restaurant has to offer. If an issue occurs, the resolution is abysmal (unless you’re an expat, gotta make your Henry’s happy)

title: To upgrade the location
review: We can’t still choose right location yet

title: I like the app but please make it easily accessible to reach your customer support.
review: I have so many messed up orders and employees destroying the food, I can’t even complain

title: Ash
review: The service is good but sometimes the restaurant selection is not upto the mark. Sometimes some restaurant provide stale, and unhygienic food. They should keep a space for the customer to complain.

title: Useless
review: I stay less than 6 km away from so many restaurants but always “ sorry we don’t deliver in your area “ while I see the driver of food panda going past our place in various directions further than us.  Even you choose the pick up option it tells you sorry we cannot deliver to your area.  Just a useless frustration you don’t need.

title: Poor drivers
review: The drivers are really bad and egoistic when I don’t have change for 1 taka they are rude and sometimes they take 5 taka more when I don’t want them to and the app is laggy and bad restaurants except 2,3

title: Cannot use with new phone numbers
review: You cannot create an account if someone else has already registered your phone number. My phone is new and so is the number. So I try to sign up but it says my number is already in use.  I try to resolve the issue through customer service but they tell me I have to log on with the existing account which is not mine.

title: So far so good...
review: I've only used this app once before and the app wasn't working, it was missing my order but I chatted with customer service, she was really nice and helpful. This is my 2nd time using this app and so far so good.

title: Can’t update my new phone number.
review: I got a new phone number and I cannot replace my old phone number on my account. Do something about it.

title: Map is not working properly
review: The map in the app won’t pin my location correctly and driver always goes to the back of the house which is out of the Borey I live in.  It should be improved. Even I put notes to driver, but they hardly read.

title: Order issue or late order recieving
review: I faced problem of order getting late , restaurant not recieving order and delivery time is showing here Fix this please

title: Extremely Unreliable!
review: Food Panda is by far the worst food delivery service I’ve worked with.  In the past, they’ve double-charged me multiple times without giving a refund, have charged me for orders that I didn’t place, and have delivery times that are completely off (several hours).  If you need to use them, I suggest you use the cash upon delivery option.

title: Less options
review: Contact some more local restaurants in old city areas.. they also want to grow some business..

title: Click bait
review:
I Always Loves food panda even also now but some things disappointed me! 
1: They they follow special instructions like whenever I order Burger I write “ no lettuce please “ but they don’t follow that!
2: They Only have one Topping’s option which is Lychee jelly in ChaTime banana milk tea but, in the upper section it’s written you can add up-to 6 Toppings which is directly clickbait

title: Food at your fingertips
review:
Great service to deliver an unlimited variety of food and goodies directly to wherever you are. 
A bit of a wait but extremely convenient!

title: Easy to use
review: Food panda is where you can easy to find food and shops in Philippines. Also you can use the app even if youre in abroad.. highly recommend!

title: Phone number problem
review: I use foodpanda everyday but today when i was about to order they ask to verify my phone number i first give them the number by which my account was link but they say it is used then i use my own number in which they also say it is used and by that i was unable to order today 😡

title: Great service to get stuffs
review:
I have never used this service before until recently.  I have to say this is so convenient to buy delicious foods 
at food paradise of Taiwan.  I will definitely recommend this to my friends.

title: Problem
review: Facing new issue live chat not available  many times try but live chat not available

title: Searching specific vendor from the search bar
review: We want to search vendors from the search bar but nothing shows up when we tried to type there. The thing is we don’t want to scroll down and wasting our time to find the specific ones. Thank you.

title: Great service!
review: Food Panda has always been super reliable. Great service. Has been late a few times, but it’s Bangkok and traffic happens. Highly recommend.

title: Below average service.
review: I expected that foodpanda will provide a good kind of service, but they totally disappointed me. And sometimes their delivery man had stolen food from my order. Like once I ordered 2 French fries, and paid for that. But when I opened my food pack, there was one of them. I don’t know what is their problem. Such a cheat they are!

title: Great App
review: So far, my first order said 60 minutes to arrive and it came within 30 minutes of it being processed. Love this app! Could be a little clearer on the delivery charges however

title: This is good
review: The biggest issue with this app is no images of the items. Otherwise it is fast, suggestions are great and user interface is also easy.

title: Good selection of restaurants
review: We have ordered here 4-times now and we really appreciate that with one app we can easily choose from all the restaurants that we were ordering directly from before. App is easy to use and works well.

title: Very Convenient!
review: I can’t believe how fast it is to order from the touch of my phone to my loved ones in the Philippines who are currently in hotel quarantine. Kudos to my fellow pinoys!

title: Order cancel after 5 min
review: There is a option should be available of cancellation of the order in a certain time

title: Amazing app
review: Being stuck in quarantine would have been difficult without this app! Amazing way to have hot food delivered right to your door

title: It the best online delivery
review: It the best but u can order from only 1 restaurant my suggestion is can u upgrade to order 2 restaurant at a time and deluxe only 1 time that would be so grate :)

title: Food review
review: Foodpanda is so far the best and most secured food transporting source in my opinion and I’m extremely satisfied with their service. So I’d like like to give them a 5 star on rating.

title: App is a bit laggy.
review: Great service and amazing deliveries. Fast corresponding riders and always delivered in perfect condition. App is also well developed considering the visual appeal but is very laggy and doesn’t always work. So if you could please look into that.

title: Less quantity food
review: Whenever i order through FP i always get less quantity food, on the other hand if i order through other app i never face that. I think FP is taking too much comission from the restaurants, as a result we are getting less food. Sad!

title: Great
review: It’s alright the app is decent. Please add more shop option and more food variety of choices to choose that are available in the shop!

title: Very good
review:
Easy to use!Fast and cheap!
Don’t even have to go outside all day!
But one thing I would advise to add is to buy from different restaurants on same order!

title: 1st order at Cherrydrop Khilgaon by Foodpanda
review: It was my very first order, Food panda & Cherrydroup accepted my order & said they will delivered by 45 min. After 20 min they said sorry they are run out of Item. Very unacceptable service by Cherrydrop.

title: Kinda delay.
review: Need to check & upgrade the app, coz not really user friendly , tried to order since from last night but can't place order. Today also gotta try 3 or 4 time to complete this order. Pls upgrade more for the good. Will support more.

title: Works great with good Customer Support
review: Worked great for me, if anytime any issue comes up of late delivery or missed detail on order(the restaurant to blame) calling foodpanda always helped me solve the issue.

title: Credit card issue
review: Cant seem to order on credit card

Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T12:04:47Z'}

title: Credit card problem  2 times
review: It wouldn’t take my credit card

title: Disappointing
review: This app consistently cancels your order without explanation, sometimes an hour after you’ve been waiting. Often after ordering, the arrival timer actually starts increasing! So basically, they claim they can get your food to you in a certain amount of time, then either they cant, or they actually cancel the order without explanation.  Weak sauce.

Thanks for reaching out.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-19T06:46:28Z'}

title: Increase your restaurant range
review: Please add nicer restaurants distance so we can order from Gulberg from babu Sabu, Gulshan-E-Ravi areas. I order from you 4-5 days a week but could be more if you added P. F. Chang’s to be in range.

title: Utterly unreliable; full of glitches; horrendous service
review: On multiple occasions food never arrived. Other times food is late by 20 minutes or more. Problems always because of glitches in the app--sometimes restaurants refuse an order because they are too busy but the app completes the transactions and tells u the food was delivered even when the food was never prepared. The app is full of glitches. If in Hong Kong, use deliveroo.

title: Need cancel or edit feature, or hire more people for customer service!
review: They really need to either added the options to cancel and edit orders.  If everything has to go through customer service with live chat, they should at least hire enough people to handle the load.

title: It would get a five star rating but...
review: it doesn’t deliver to many places in Islamabad (like Isra University Islamabad). Also it would be best if they were to show pictures of the deals and give more details. Additionally they should have a review/feedback option of the food delivered.

title: Generally ok
review: Most of he time, I’ve had slow or poor delivery guys who have gotten lost. Food in Generally ok per the restaurant menus, again a few cold meals, but they will correct or provide discounts if you notify them and they can validate your concerns. The app is basic, but functional.

title: Lies + ALWAYS late
review:
Ordered a couple of times and they were all horribly late (not just 5-10 minutes late).

If you initiate a chat with their support staff you would be told that your rider is on the way, but in  reality they are just lying to you to keep you from cancelling the order because you can tell from the tracking map that the rider is still at the restaurant.

title: Horrible App
review: Had the worst experience ordering with them. Just placed an order and the restaurant accepted and then it updated that the restaurant is preparing the order. After 45 mins of waiting I receive a call from them saying that the restaurant doesn't have the items I’ve ordered. What a joke. Does it take 45 mins to realize that. Deleting the app now. Do not download the app

title: Unprofessional, disappointing & poor services.
review:
I am very disappointed with Food Panda Service.
This is the second time the incident happed back to back in 2 weeks with Food panda delivery service.

I placed the order and made an online payment, but waited for 2 hours to discover the order was cancelled. Why was the order accepted in the first place if there were issues with the restaurant. Moreover, I wasnot informed from Food Panda within 1 hr the order was placed. It was only when I enquired after 1 hr, I realized the order was cancelled with no information to the Client, which demonstrates how unprofessional food panda is in terms of dealing with the Client orders.

I rate your services very poor !!

title: Price conspiracy
review: Foodpanda charges higher than usual menu price. Please check with the actual restaurant before your order through this app. Delivery lead time has improved since I uninstalled the app last time,  but the price conspiracy remained to block this app one more time. Poor commitment by the management.

title: Big Waste
review:
I was ordering my food after foodpanda cancelled my order and charge my card! 

I tried to contact the customer service 
But they wont refund my credits. 

Food Panda app was open while waiting for My order. I didn't even receive a message from Food panda driver. They told me i am unreachable. How am i unreachable if they didn't even attempt to contact me. 

Service is useless if you keep on doing this. 

Paying my food without even receiving my food. 

Not enjoying this application if you keep this going. 

Getting money from customers who don't received their order is a scam. 

Food panda app is a waste!

Thank you anyway!

title: Exceptional service
review: I think food pandas team collaborations with restaurant make this as a wonderful experience. I loved the food pandas service and impressed with there efficiency. Thank you and all the best.

title: Too many bugs
review:
You will need to find reliable developer to bug fix all your app issues. Too many pop up errors as I was browsing and it’s frustrating.
Otherwise, everything else is ok.

title: Limited food options
review: Extremely limited options in my area.

title: It’s okay...
review: I come here to visit every summer and this summer my orders kept getting cancelled. I would check the app and it would say I didn’t order anything. I thought it was odd first but then i deleted and re-downloaded the app now it works just fine.

title: Tiny list of options
review:
They don’t have many shops and the ones they do have, are mostly ‘temporarily unavailable’.

It’s getting a bit frustrating to be tied up that way.

title: Easy access
review: System friendly n food delivered on time.  However, sometimes it’s already cold.

title: Worst app
review: When i first started using this , it was working well but now it is the worst app you can have . In my area everyday all the restaurants are unavailable . Like we can agree with sometimes but always ? And there service is very bad . They dont reply to chats . Very much irresponsible . Done with this app . Good luck . Hope you progress  later or just close the app thats it
developerResponse: {'id': 11327279, 'body': 'Hey there, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support. If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response or you may drop us an email for further assistance.', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:10:41Z'}

title: never on time
review: Can’t count the number of times my food has arrived late. Then they try to make up for their mistake and shower me with free food coupons but those never work either.

title: What you think?
review:
This option should come after receiving the food. 
Thanks

title: Ordering
review: I cannot order from two different restaurants at once and it’s not convenient for people.

title: Nice Service
review: Mostly deliever on time and also can check order status and the deliver man location on map.

title: Timing
review: Actually takes more than 50 mins in every restaurant order. Please make it quick this time

title: Credit card option not accepted
review: My credit card is not being accepted by the App. This is very inconvenient. Please fix this.

title: My go-to app for Food!
review: Foodpanda has always sustained me food-wise since my university days. Grateful for the good service and the wide variety of restaurants to choose from. Cravings satisfied!

title: Needs updating
review: Compared to competitors deliveroo and UberEATS there’s a lot to like in this app but even more that should be updated. This app should also show a good tracker to watch where the delivery person is. The checkout process is a little longer as well, using the pre-specified cc should take no more than 1 click instead of the current 3 or more.

title: Mobile number problem
review:
The bad side of the app is:
we can not change mobile number or we can't use previous number
We hope foodpanda will solve it quickly

title: Wth is wrong with you guys?!!!
review:
I ordered a burger which says, beef  burger with cheese and sauce.. it was 105 taka … trust me ek ta bun er bhitore 5 takar tika dhukay dise .. with cucumber, meo and local sauce dise .. where is the fuqing cheese?! .. 20 takar burgers 105 taka nise .. then I was like ok maybe kom takar order dsi tai maybe emon ashcy .. 
Ami r ek ta order kori pizza world dhanmondi  theke which was 260 taka , pizza world special burger
… then the burger came with a plastic box … taste horrible and no cheese on it .. I repeat no cheese on it… I’m deleting food panda .. sorry

title: Good but don’t care much about the delivery Restaurents provided
review: Most of the time we see the restaurant provides food less and not include some portions. Some times it’s cold And we don’t have that time to make the review.

title: What’s going on???
review: I’ve tried ordering on 2 established restaurants in Pattaya, Sila Coffee 2 Pattaya & Le’Maison Pattaya, both times being turned down. I don’t what’s going I’m on between FoodPanda & these restaurants, but the restaurants say they never received the order from FoodPanda. As I have no way to contact FoodPanda I assume they’re some Chinese firm that has no customer service & are only interested in themselves.

title: Best app
review: Best app to order food in Pakistan. Whenever I come here I order food from food panda. They have variety of restaurants available near me and I think this is the best thing. Love it❤️

title: Good for what it is!
review:
I see so many negative reviews on here that 
I held off on downloading the app for a while. However, once I started using it I realized that it works well! Food is delivered on time and the drivers are always nice.

title: Pathetic service
review:
**Bottom line, don’t use this service**

Ordered pizza at 8:30; arrived at 11:30 and it was cold. This food service doesn’t deliver on any aspect that you would expect a food service to deliver:

1. Drivers phone wasn’t working
2. Time to delivery 3 hours from order
Driver didn't have location; a basic feature of the phone
3. Called the number in food panda app for Broadway; got a message that phone is powered off
4. Emailed food panda; auto email response within 8 hours. Quite useless...

I took the order as i didn't want the driver to face any issues; however I definitely wont be using the app again. Thanks
developerResponse: {'id': 11326460, 'body': '"Hey Kasbati, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T10:26:31Z'}

title: Geocoder Problem
review: After the recent update on 22th July 2021 the app is not working with my ios 14.7 iphone 7 plus in Bangladesh . It shows Geocoder failed. Please solve it.

title: Simply Awful
review: This app operates on Food Panda time, which has no reality on real time. Time to delivery fluctuates up and down so nothing is delivered on time yet FP claims everything is on time, of course if you stop, or readjust your time you’ll never be late. Restaurants can CRM orders after waiting hours for delivery. I’m deleting this app.

title: Food Panda Experience
review: This is a good company so far. Thank you for this amazing app. Keep making it better and upgrade it. You guys are on to big things! 💯

title: easy
review: It's make may having schedule more easy and put me to next level.

title: Suggest to improve
review:
👆🏽Technical 
Cannot save my card to payment method after I chose to save my card

✌🏽Customer service 
Cancellation from Food Panda  around 30 mins after order accepted is such inconvenient as a Food Service Business

title: TERRIBLE customer experience
review:
First of all, you can only reach them through a chat box...

Below are two bad experiences of mine:

1. On a rainy day, (Grab suspended services for further restaurants) the app claimed that the food would arrive in 30 min. I waited over an hour! Could not get an estimate through there reps - super hard to plan my afternoon

2. Missing items - they can only refund you, no matter how crucial the missing item is to the meal. With that credits they could’ve sent another person to deliver the rest of the order!

They do more frequently have deals compared to grab. I guess you get what you pay for :(

title: “IMPROVEMENT NEEDED”
review:
Worst app there is to date. I literally had to wait 2 hours just to find out that I can’t place an order because at some point in life I had registered by mobile number with these guys and now I can’t find which email it was associated with, NOR can I recover it.

Now I need to purchase a new number first so I can have food on my table. Great.

Happy ordering.

title: Unable to install app after changing region to India
review: I have been trying to install this app but it keeps giving an error message that it is not available in US store . I am in India since last 8 months and also I have changed the region to India in settings. I have been able to install all the local apps but this. App team please fix this issue ASAP.

title: Covid-19 Quarantine Saver
review: This has been truly helpful considering the fact that we cannot step out of our hotel for the duration of our quarantine.

title: Good
review: I like food panda. I order again and again because delivery time is fast than others and price is reasonable and fair.

title: This app is a  scam for so many restaurants..
review: The fakest deals, it’s never true when the say 51 % sale or 45 % just to attract customers and they give maximum 15% sale and the value decreases when u spend more so better buy small small items multiple times at least u can get around 15% for some restaurants it better just calling and ordering ur self so..

title: Hard to register at first
review: Many glitches during start up. Credit cards hard to accept by the company. Must be that only Thai credit cards are accepted.
developerResponse: {'id': 11328454, 'body': '"Hey Joe, Thanks for reaching out. We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response."\t', 'modified': '2019-10-18T11:59:43Z'}

title: Pretty bad Food quality
review: I have been using foodpanda for couple of months now. And its been a bad experience. Food quality is pretty much bad if you order through Foodpanda ( Maybe because of Foodpanda’s high commision rate). Though Foodpanda is great for ordering late night but I would never recommend it to anyone.

title: Love it, but Need to add
review: Hi I love FoodPanda but just few more improvements needed add all restaurants take no for answer and make them all online payment and also add cancellation button relying on kitchen status. That’s all it’s my favorite app thanks

title: Good App.
review:
It’s a really good app. Works fine. Need to improve following:
Add more filter options (e.g. restaurant area)
The order processing status feature needs some good improvements & give real time updates. 
I recommend this app.

title: Late service with worst riders
review: Is there any training provided to your riders? If so then I’m wondering about the efficiency of the trainers. Possibly Foodpanda just don’t care about the customers in Bangladesh. Just doing business is all matters.

title: Good idea. Badly executed.
review: Writing this review while waiting for a delivery that I placed more than 95 mins ago. The information that the map gives about status and arrival time is pure fiction. I have used the app many times and the estimated delivery time has never even been close (always significantly late). DO NOT use this app if you actually plan on eating at a specific time.

title: Removed reward points without notice
review: They suddenly removed the reward points without me getting notified. When I called them they said they didn’t know what I was talking about, until I talked to manager who said they discontinued their partnership. Considering they not only charge service fee and also charge the restaurant a cut I expect better service.

title: Very bad service
review: The chat box in app is inconvenient and difficult to use. When I complained about my order that I didn’t receive, they told me they will reach out to me as soon as as possible but they did not. It was tiring to call them and repeated my case over and over again as they didn’t have records for my complaints.

title: Beware of Your Credit/Debit Cards
review: First time ordering from this app/website. Used my card and the next thing I know, there were “other” new charges aside from the Food Panda charge. It looks like they were able to hack my cc #s while processing the payment (Even though I ran it via Paypal). Smart, yes, but too bad for you, you won’t get me next time. 😼

title: Amazing
review: Like a caveman to fire I am drawn to the incredible ability to push a button and have a scooter deliver food, booze or groceries to my door. I get a pretty big kick out of it!!

title: BAD
review: Food Panda is the worst food service they cancelled my order and said they cant deliver the food and when I called and asked why they were so rude and said my house was way too far when its only 15 mins away from the restaurant and when I told them that they said they didnt have any deliverers why are you a food delivery service if you cant even deliver food?!!

title: Reliable delivery
review: The delivery guys are always fast and friendly and take good care of the food enroute.  Also love the app showing me how close the food is.

title: Great app and service.
review: Never had issues with anything using it from 6 months

title: Horrible service
review: Horrible service almost every time I order, taking much longer than advertised and food ending up cold or missing items. Delivery people claim they don’t have change and customer service never responds properly. Giving up on this one and moving to honestbee, much better selection and service.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11341501, 'body': 'Hey def323,

title: Best
review: This app is very convenient and the customer service is amazing. You could reach them fast and easy. Recommended

title: Information
review: You should call right after reaching the restaurant to confirm the order and for further queries. Thank you.

title: Order History needs to be added
review: There should be an easy way to see your order history and either reorder that or simply modify that order and order again.

title: Service & Functionality
review: It’s my second time to use this apps and I do found that this app is very convenient to be used for any ordering! There are a lot of foods, drink, products....

title: Review
review: Food panda should allow people from Mohammadpur area to order from north end and they should add more restaurants within this range .

title: The worst when it comes to delivery
review:
I've ATTEMPTED to order food through foodpanda twice and twice they weren't able to deliver the food! 

I waited for 1 hr and they finally just canceled because it's taking too long! The other time, the store was closed but it wasn't posted on the ad. 

Ridiculous company. Delete this app and spare yourself the trouble!

title: Nice App for Foodies
review: At times the menu items/sizes available at the restaurant menu cannot be ordered through app especially Chinese. For that the only option currently is to call the restaurant and place order directly.

title: Terrible service and staff...
review: The customer service and technical support is literally useless. They’re not customer service oriented at all, they prefer to say no and there are always long waiting times. They do not check that restaurants can understand English instructions on orders and they do not offer options to add an extra sauces or condiments.

title: Worst customer support
review: Had many issues with them in the past, most recent one is i am waiting for my food from 2 hours and still havent got it, theres no way to contact their support on call, you ca only email which they will reply after 1 day. Another day another bad experience with foodpanda

title: Good service!!
review: Its amazing to have a service like this. Getting served at home gives me the feeling that we are definitely developing in all the sectors.

title: Shopper should be trained properly
review: I use it for my breakfast everyday. I enter my address but some shopper could not read or understand it. They told me my GPS is not accurate. They should use the address I provide instead of using GPS

title: Taste feast
review: My tongue sweats more hope while putting order on food panda and they never disappoint my expectations. So keep my love and hope well watered.                                Best Regards                                           Rahman M Towfiq

title: Delivering during the difficult time
review: Do appreciated and thank to the delivery guys to help us during the stay home period.

title: Taking care
review: They always take care of my order keep it up food panda is best for order on line

title: Doesn’t always work.
review: When using cash, it keeps saying payment not accepted.

title: Most comfortable way to find food of your taste
review: We are using foodpanda in various countries and find always useful and great way to find the food of your taste.

title: Easy and reliable!
review: I've been using the app for 3 weeks it's amazing for when you can't get out to eat... and reasonably priced for delivery. Tons of restaurants to choose from in Chiang Mai!

title: Apps is always crashing
review: Every time I order its always crashing

title: Fine but lots of spam
review: I’ve used foodpanda for several years, but deleted it as they send 2-5 marketing notifications every single day. I don’t see anyway to make the constant notifications spam stop in the settings.  Too much is too much! Goodness…

title: Getting worse all the time
review: Terrible service! They accept your order even though they know they cannot deliver on time. One driver often would deliver to multiple address during busy times. Hard to cancel once you order and the same excuse given every time.

title: Easy to find your meal
review: This app is comfortable to looking for any kind of food and take it easy no waste your time

title: Everything at a door step
review: Quite feasible to order anything at anytime😃

title: Horrible customer service
review: They apparently don’t let their drivers know the customers delivery location on the way to deliver their goods. They also have drivers who think you owe them cash even when you used your credit card to purchase the items. Yikes! Way to use background checks, Food Panda!

title: Order
review: Ordering would be so much easy if menu have images

title: Easy to find whatever you want to eat!
review: Its very easy to find whatever you want to eat nearest to your place! Thanks

title: Not Getting the Shops Option
review: My app is updated but not getting the shop option. What to do ?

title: Obnoxious ads; Video ads force-pause music
review: Serving ads after the purchase, and they are absurdly implemented as when video ads pop up they pause your audio even when they’re muted. Who designed this intrusive garbage? Why do you take high commissions from shops, treat riders like cr*p, and still inject ads nobody asks for in the first place

title: Terrible!!!!
review: App is freaking slow and difficult to navigate. I had credit card payment set up but every time I place an order this payment method just disappeared.  Really wanted to use this app to order my food but had to use Uber eats unread.  Good job for turning your customer away by giving us a crappy app

title: Riders don’t know directions
review: Each order I place is delayed due to the lack of knowledge the rider has of the directions. There are numerous phone calls and vocal explanations; eventually a random person from the street is asked for the directions. In most cases I am the one explaining the direction to the stranger so that they can explain it to the rider.

title: Good Food Horrible Webdesign
review: Food Panda has good restaurants and I’ve never had a problem with the delivery. The problem with foodpanda is that it takes forever to just order your food and jump through all the hoops to get it sent. All the random requirements that you have to complete before you can order is ridiculous.

title: Yabadabadoliciously Easy!!
review: It made my boring evening into supercalifragilisticexpieldociouslu superb!!!! I can eat what I want now ain’t no qualms about that ! Panda In Da House! Makin my day into a rock and roll one y’all! Peace out!

title: Never ordering again
review: Absolutely terrible service

title: A little confusing
review: If move to another app when I am using panda. It will go back the homepage place instead in the restaurant page I am looking . So I have to search results again. Lost tracking.

title: It needs to fix a lot of things
review:
Firstly the app is super slow and user interface is not professional at all, they need to make the app faster
Secondly the riders are really ruining the experience, there must be someone looking at them, 
I used this app a lot despite it being slow but the riders are getting worse with time

title: Bugs bugs bugs bugs
review: Full of bugs, every single time and after every update, it’s so tiring I just stopped using the app. Can’t normally move through the interface, can’t find restaurants that appear and disappear every minute for no reason, can’t use the filter normally without getting bugged. It’s just tiring

title: Missing items
review: Bad customer service
So much disgusting service...you are suitable for this business....1st you need to know how to provide service to the customers....

title: worst food delivery app
review: Orders are always late, never accurate shows how long your food takes, and never updates on your food status. They canceled my order after waiting for 30 minutes and I all i got was a sorry message. Would not recommend  this to anyone. Don’t waste your time.

title: 好方便價格好合適
review: Best food mart in the universe where you can purchase any foodstuffs with economical price and free delivery. Highly recommended while quarantining in a hotel for 14 days with nowhere to go.

title: Review
review: Fast delivery and many special offers except the part that there is no Note function in the app. Please add this

title: Miruma Jannat
review: It’s a great service and only the real on time delivery service in Bangladesh. I would like to contact for Chinese market. Pls call me if you are interested in.

title: Good to order, influencing brand
review: Good. Would be better if you can mention the item of dishes with photos.

title: Convenient and easy
review: Step by step and easy ordering system.

title: Terrible customer service. Terrible app.
review: This company’s customer service is terrible. Orders get cancelled for unknown reasons after waiting a long time.  The app shows restaurants to order from but when you tap on one to order, it shows that it’s closed. Clearly it has some major product/tech issues.

title: Attempted Short Change
review: Please pay your delivery people more money as there was a recent attempt of not paying back change. This is in Dhaka, Bangladesh

title: Great App
review: Just used it to order food while traveling in Bangkok, very simple platform made it quick and easy. Good job!

title: Great App For The Philippines
review: I tried other food delivery apps and this one is the best one I like. Because it’s easy to use and clean layout.

title: Great local customer service
review: I find Foodpanda’s customer services are great.  It is responsive and from local too.

title: Satisfy food delivery process
review: I am satisfy with their service but I am Bkash payment issue in their application.  They should improve their application

title: Cancel COD or Credit Cards should be accepted by all vendors
review: All vendors must have the credit card option as payment method.

title: do not accept Cash payment
review: I chose Cash payment but the app always says that my payment information doesn’t right

title: Good and could be better
review: Easy to order and quick delivery but the search function is weak

title: Reliable!
review: When other delivery service companies are closed, Food Panda still delivers!

title: Too many ads!
review: Using this app is extremely aggrevating. It's very annoying to have an ad pop up while you're going through a restaurant's menu. Also, I don't like getting spam texts from Foodpanda. Most places deliver for free so just call a restaurant and order from it directly until Foodpanda gets its act together.

title: Frequent problems with payment processing.
review: I regularly have problems with payments. Credit cards won’t be accepted at random. Sometimes PayPal also. Works 85% of the time, but that’s annoyingly low for a function that every other app has zero problems with. I’m trying to pay you. Just make it work. /facepalm

title: Go food panda
review: What a relief that I don’t have to buy the super expensive food from the hotel… Thank you food panda we love you

title: Needs improvement
review: It’s a good app, the app its self is really great brings all the favorite restaurants to one place but the only problem is that it shows wrong delivery times (sometimes) which can be really inconvenient at times ie: somebody has friends over or was coming from somewhere tired and wanted food as soon as he reached.

title: Best food delivery service in Bangladesh
review:
I have been using this app for 2 years and they gave me a lots of unexpected discounts. 
Thank you food panda

title: Search is unusable
review: Arguably one of the most important feature on any delivering app is not even functioning properly on your platform, the lack of categories and the useless search makes the whole experience a nightmare

title: 💙 I’m Hungry Without You 💙
review:
🚩 Best Best Best 🚩
Just having satisfied customers is not good enough anymore. if you really want a booming business, you have to creat raving fans like me! 🤟🏻🔥
Best of luck 😉 FOOD PANDA 🐼

title: Good service
review: Foodpanda is user-friendly with a lot of food options in the capital city. Service is excellent

title: E a
review: Many shops are normally temporarily closed even a second after it say it was open!

title: Helpful
review: Saving the time especially when there is traffic jam outside..

title: Website problems
review:
Website doesn’t take orders from laptop and online phone call doesn’t work. Moreover it’s really frustrating how the address doesn’t upload on online even after you set an account 
.

title: FoodPanda review
review: One of the best delivery apps- always on time, no mix ups with deliveries and the website offers a variety of options.

title: Seamless Online Ordering in Thailand
review: I use the app almost daily, sometimes more than once a day and the process is so smooth. I couldn't live without my Food Panda app here in Chiang Mai, Thailand!! 5 Stars!!!!

title: Could be better
review: It’s a little slow & often the restaurants listed don’t deliver to me. Also, the minimum charges make it really annoying for one person to get food delivered

title: Customer
review: Food panda make sure keep up the quality of food made by home cooking

title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE.
review:
My food was over an hour late and I had to argue for 30 minutes with a customer service agent to cancel my order. He kept saying to give them more time but wouldn't cancel my order as requested. Eventually he cancelled and told me they wouldn't be refunding me. 

Horrible service, never going to use again.

title: Nice
review: Great transaction so far but kinda stumbled in payment method though. Online payment kinda not working right now

title: Won’t stop crashing
review: Fine food delivery app but it’s unstable. It keeps crashing while I’m looking at menus

title: Doesn’t deliver if you pay first
review: Do not order Pay first. Their riders do not deliver but mark as delivered. After contacting their agents will tell you that the rider will call and close the issue but the rider never calls. Your money and food both are gone. They don’t give you any phone number to contact as well.

title: Happy to avail
review: I’m very happy and thankful to avail of this new food delivery service in Bacolod. I’m not sure if they offer service to Silay but I hope they will soon!!!

title: Delivery didn’t take place
review: I have ordered multiple times from GPR and paid by my credit card. However multiple times my order was cancelled and my payment was not returned.

title: Busy
review:
To much busy. Improve system.
More importantly train your delivery boys, I think they feel uncomforted to deliver food. They should smile when they deliver the order. We expect them with good behaviors.

title: Refund
review: You guys have charge me two time and my without delivering my food please can you guys refund my money

title: App is very inconsistent
review: Often doesn’t work after you’ve chosen the order.

title: App works great!
review: After about 3 orders, no complaints. Has been delivered on time each time. The app is easy to use. So far, so good!

title: Fareng says, "easier than Grab."
review: I appreciate it being so english language friendly

title: Not as many selections
review: I find there are less options of restaurants over the past year.

title: Deliveroo is much better than this app.
review: This is one of the worst food delivery apps out there. Food is always delayed and  customer service is extremely poor. You never never never be able to cancel your order no matter what. Their selection of restaurants are good, but I decided to delete this app.

title: Life is easy
review:
Thanks
Good service 
Need option for something out of order,as like “please add some extra white sauce”

title: Address
review: GPS got the wrong location for my address so rider is having hard time getting the location right every time please work with the rider on getting it right

title: Location
review: Food panda should ask first the area address  for delivery and give restaurants that are able to deliver to address given by customer. My order was cancelled because my delivery guy was not able to cross location. Am so sorry for the delivery guy, hope he did not get charge for the cancelled order.

title: Menu and Potion
review: that would be better if we can see the actual pictures of food and potion of it.

title: Good app, just one problem
review: I’m not sure whether it’s only me, but I can’t seem to delete addresses which is very odd. A little help would be heartily appreciated.

title: The absolute worst food delivery app
review: Both website and app are extremely buggy, unreliable, barely functional. Getting customer support is pretty useless as well. Wasted an hour of my life trying to get food delivered today just because they gave me a voucher. Had to switch to another app instead.

title: Overall awesome
review:
we can get the food within a short time and also don't need to go outside 😍😍
Tnx foodpanda to make our daily life more easier 😍😍

title: Less informative
review: Sometimes, Order doesn’t process & there is no information showing in carry,,!!!! Frustrating

title: Overall good
review: Like the service and order tracking, timely order but was disappointed during Eid holidays

title: Essential Service
review: With most restaurants being closed Food Panda service is magnificent and essential

title: Terrible chat line service.
review: Food is always late. App does not provide real-time status update. People hired to handle chat services are always slow to answer. And when they do they give you nothing that's useful, ignore customer dissatisfaction and never acknowledged their mistakes. For better service, use Line Man.

title: No tip option
review: I was quarantined in a hotel, and it was raining heavily outside, I really want to tip the driver but there is no tip option like Uber eat, I think that is something you guys should improve in your app, that’s the reason I gave 3 star

title: Refund issue
review: I complained for refund and they said to refund my request but I did not get any refund even after so many months has passed… I communicated using the app chat. They responded but I did not get my refund…

title: Foodpanda Monopoly
review:
Foodpanda has been known in Pakistan for mistreating it’s riders and underpaying them. Not only company asks for a huge 30% commission from restaurants, along that they also charge the customer for the order delivery charges. But even after that their riders are underpaid, and are not allowed to raise their concerns at Foodpanda offices. 

Boycott their services people, they deserve this!

title: It’s good
review: It’s good but it can be more better if it’s delivery 24/7 hours and little faster as well 🙂 overall it’s good

title: Detail for food
review: It will be easier if I can read all the details of food when it’s a set. Sometimes I can’t read all of it.

title: Location problem
review: This very difficult to set the location, I hope you guys please work on this problem on the apps thank you 🙂

title: Terrible service.
review:
Order was made for the wrong address. I immediately called to cancel and change the address but they said they couldn’t change the address AND they couldn’t cancel the order.  So basically they took my money. 
Never using them again

title: Terrible service
review: This is the first time I’ve written a review, but it needs to be said that the service from a Food Panda is absolutely terrible. I waited an hour for an order and they canceled. Then ordered from another place and it took 1+ hours. Do not use this app. Use alternatives like Grab Food or Deliveroo, the service is far better

title: Late Service
review: Shows 1 hour to delivery which is already too much time but then delivers 2 hours later

title: Bad service
review: It’s a very bad experience ordering a food delivery from this platform, especially the service in Taiwan. No professional dispatch system, keep delaying the ETA schedule and it’s no use to communicate with the unprofessional online associate based in Asia or Taiwan. I am not sure if it happens in every country or just in Taiwan because of their inexperience and unprofessional.

review:

Such a unprofessional behavior.

#Bad services wasn’t expected

title: Good but needs improvement
review: The idea is good and it’s quite convenient to order almost everything available. But the app should have the option of editing or changing the order during a specified time interval.

title: Doesn’t even work
review: Every time I open the app it scans the area and shows an error then get closed! What is up with that?

title: Do not use this app!
review: Extreme delays, the food arrived an hour late. And help desk is not responsive to the point they will just ignore your questions. No customer service phone number you can call or to cancel the order. Bad app, bad service and terrible user experience overall. Save your headache and use deliveroo or other services.

title: Terrible but I have no options
review: This is app has the most variety in terms of available food, but there are so many ads it hurts my eyes and the customer service is not only difficult to contact but also incapable of actually helping with any issue.

title: Better
review: It can be more better if the map update

title: Service
review: The best food delivery system for customers.  Thank you for your service!

title: Delivery
review: It can be better but rider are humans too so everything else is great I love they have small dhabas too so yeah keep it up

title: Lacking essential feature
review: Ordered from a place that only cancelled one of the items as sold out when order was already sent. The app doesn’t allow to amend or cancel the order once received so now one of will not be eating thanks to your lack of feature.

title: GPS FOR RIDERS
review:
implement a gps trackable  function for food rider
so we can know what he doing and know his location where he would come from.

Another thing * tell the shop owner that put all of photos of all food recipes (not just words) on the app so we can order the food that never try before

thats all i can tell for now 

free delivery is very attractive for us right now

keep it up

title: Horrible Delivery Company
review: These guys are a disgrace. They don’t care about customer service or about the companies they deliver for. Unorganized and unprofessional to deal with. We need uber eats to come back and Grubhub to come here.

title: Worst
review: I’ve been waiting for my order for three hours tried contacting them so they asked me to wait thrice then they started leaving my chat everytime I contacted them its such a shame that if you can’t deliver something just say it instead of making people wait for their food for hours

title: Unreliable
review: They took twice as long to deliver the food and left the family starving. All we got was a reticent apology and a promise that they will do better next time - which of course there won’t be. Do not believe their wait times. Very unreliable and nothing you can do about it once you fall into their trap.

review: Let me express one words for Food Panda's overall services which is " Perfect".

title: They have to be a bit faster
review: The food sometimes doesn’t get delivered on time. They are usually late as per the given estimated arrival time.

title: Worst food delivery experience
review: I have ordered so many times from food panda and not ONCE has it been smooth sailing. There is always a problem, “a technical” problem or the driver goes to the wrong location, food takes too long to be delivered, food arrives cold, staff are rude etc etc the list really goes on.

title: Great but no drinks in Dhaka
review: Working really well in Dhaka, Bangladesh :) but could not find a way to order Cola or any other sodas to along with the meal. Maybe it's restaurant dependent but could not order a single time with drinks :(

title: This app is made for me 😂
review: I love just love this app! I can order any food and anytime ! Now life became more easier to have desired food ! In one word amazing ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Great App
review: This is a wonderful app with so many things to choose from take out food to groceries.

title: Terrible service
review: They will cancel your order for no valid reason and don't give you a refund. Happened to me not only once. When you go talk to the customer service they will all tell you a lie and they will give you a hard  time so don't even bother to download the app.

title: Great Service
review: Food panda is very convenient and always hot and ready highly recommend to anyone that needs food delivered at good rates.

title: Customer Service
review:
I like the customer service of food
Panda as one time my order was screwed and they took the ownership and resolved my concerns satisfactorily.

title: Good Deli Service in MM-Bad map accuracy
review:
Free Delivery in Myanmar (so far)
Good service 
Bad at mapping your home location, many errors and cannot pinpoint your location ~ it shifts back to wrong area near by

title: Not Satisfied with the Process.
review: Riders accept the request and sometimes even pick up the food but refuse to deliver it to the destination, the food has to go back and wait till the next rider accepts the order. This is too much annoying.

title: Delivery guy left without leaving PAID food
review: We have a lobby guard where he could have EASILY left the PAID delivery. He didn’t even at least let the front lobby guard know that he’s been waiting for someone to deliver food. Food Panda is not refunding. It’s stupid. It’s not about the money but the principle. You wasted food, my money, and my time.

review: I loved foodpanda a lot. But, this app became a crap now a days. The food prize increase after you add them to your cart without reason. Sometimes, the order get canceled automatically. Delivery time change to next day  with no reason also. The customer care service is the worst.

title: Excellent App
review: I love how great Food Panda works with Siri and I can track my food soooo easily! Love love it! Keep up! Oh, I like how to feature your promotions too! All the best, Food Panda!

title: Choices
review: Hope more choices coming up

title: Terrible customer service
review: If there isn’t a problem with the order, then the app is fine. Is there is a problem though, good luck with the customer service. Absolutely terrible and not helpful at all. There are other delivery apps that will offer more than this!
