title: Easy to use, food restaurant selection
review: Easy to place order and food selection is good. Perhaps adding new restaurant would be interesting option to have.

title: Cancelled my order and won’t return fund
review: Called and told me rider refused to deliver to my hotel because I gave the wrong address. The address was correct and I had the proof through my app but there was no way to reach out to anyone at Food Panda. And the rider basically kept the food to himself. Worst delivery platform compared to Grab and Deliveroo.

title: 5 stars
review: It is an easy to use app, quick, on time and I am always updated. Great service too! 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

title: Access sometimes doesn’t work
review: Why are restaurants listed as offline? When I try to select certain options I cannot.

title: Well Done!
review: Service is always up to the expectation. Keep up the good work!

title: More selection but rather pricey
review: Easy to use n more select, I think it is fast enough but rather pricey

title: Delivery times are unreliable.
review: The delivery times always get pushed back and it is so inconvenient when you have a schedule because your order can come 30 minutes late.

title: Add tip function
review: Reliable app, should add tip function for the driver to able customers to tip drivers directly

title: I couldn't order the platter
review: I wish I could order the platter online and not have to pay cash.

title: Keep up your good work!
review: We hope food panda service will long live.

title: Awesome!
review: I was able to place an order for my love-one from US to the Philippines. Thank you so much!

title: Convenience
review:
Convenient when you're on the rush.
Keep those promos coming!

title: Worst delivery service ever
review:
Man if I ever gets to meet who runs this company in Dhaka, I swear I’ll beat the crap out of u, then I’ll make ur guys to deliver ur crap to ur family !!! When u open an international food delivery service, make sure u deliver foods all over the city ! Or just write on ur forehead that u guys only deliver in so called posh areas of Dhaka !! 
Do ur job properly or F-off

title: Online payment
review: Would be helpful if you guys added bkash payment for Bangladesh

title: Free time spend with panda 😀
review: Actually I’m enjoying with the system of food delivery. Like always u sit  with lost of restaurant .

title: They don’t care about us!
review:
Stuffs are not committed at all! 
They are here to say sorry only. Served cold pizza and after complaining they just showed their typical process of complaining and said sorry. Though I have a few good experiences but their complain handling is worst.

title: Useless customer service!
review:
When everything goes according to planned the app works fine, but if you have a problem... forget about it! They will not help! They will not fix or even attempt to fix your problem! They only apologize for the “inconvenience”. 
WILL NOT USE AGAIN!

title: Wow!!!
review: This is so convenient because I can send food to my fiance even if shes thousands and thousands of miles away. ♥️♥️♥️

title: Food panda is the S*^%
review: I’m addicted to food panda so simple and now they have this discounts where it’s cheaper then to go to the restro in person hahah

title: Tip for curier
review: Please enter an option to be able to leave tip online for the curier....we don t have cash since everything is payed by visa

title: Efficient
review: The most simple way of ordering food is the other name of this app.

title: Annoying Notification Badge
review: I like the food service but this app will periodically show a notification badge when there is no notification. IT’S ANNOYING! This should be against Apple store policy. Will delete simply because it’s a shady engagement tactic.

title: Too late delivery
review:
I am absolutely disappointed with Foodpanda , they are always late. this is the second time that my order is canceled after I was waiting for the order for an hour. 
for cache back you should wait for a very long time. I will delete the app today.

title: Works with credit, made me fat!
review: Easy, fast and help was helpful. Thank you!

title: Regarding Order Cancellation by lame excuse
review: About cancellation without any prior notice and also refuse to refund. I have seen the delivery man locating near of my house. title: Delivery
review: Delivery should be fast as it’s now. Most of the time delays than showing time.

title: Good Service
review: It’s really better than other online food delivery services. You guys are doing very good. God bless you.

title: Sent to wrong address
review: The auto software kept changing the delivery address.  We thought we had fixed but order sent to another address.  Customer service refused to acknowledge their mistake and to even consider resending order.   Won’t use again

title: I can cook in less time than it takes to use app
review: Idiotic app. Can’t enter correct address. You can’t get food descriptions without adding the item to you cart. One of the worst user interfaces. It takes too long to make selections because of the ridiculous user experience.

title: Best app
review: Food panda is part of my regular life,,when m feeling like to eat anything food panda is there ,, so far so good

title: Complain
review: You don’t notify us properly about the confirmation of the food. You should communicate with us after you get our order

title: It’s a waste !
review: Bad experience always. A third class service in Pakistan. Living at Karachi and it’s been multiple times I have ordered from food panda and there is always a problem. Multiple times my order has been cancelled for no reason. Go to hell food panda . Waste of time and money

review:
After saying that my order had been ‘picked up’ and would arrive in ‘1 min’, I ended up waiting 1 hour, THEN it said my order had been cancelled.

This is after multiple experiences like this with Foodpanda and I am NEVER using this service again.

Really really bad.

review:
Thanks for making me download the app just to find out you don't serve my area. Is a list of supported locales -even if just major metros! really too much to ask you to include in the description? 

Second star awarded for at least being forthright about your (apparent) laziness.

title: Great!
review: Super super fast. Order is updated and easy to contact driver. Quick transactions.

title: Awesome
review: What a great app for food lovers ! One can enjoy food at his own resident taking from the city best restaurants in no time. Life is beautiful

title: My suggestion
review: Want to see food picture as well. That will help customers in ordering.

title: Poorly customer service
review: Second time i have an issue with the payment method. And yet i still haven’t get my refund as I made a payment but my orders isn’t being received or delivered and I have to make new orders to order!!!!! This is so ridiculous. Will never use it again!

title: Excellent app
review: Customers support proffesional quick and friendly - lots of promotions I’m happy to use their app

title: Brilliant happy !

title: Did not get all my refund.
review:
Restaurant cancelled my order and due to time
Difference. I didn’t know till I check my phone in the morning. I ordered a day before US time for my family in the Philippines. They refund but did did not sent the whole amount. 

Deleting this app.

title: Too many adverts, popups, distractions
review: This app feels like a casino gambling app which a ton of popups, irrelevant adverts, and numerous distractions. Why ca t a food delivery app just stay true to their core mission and make the best possible app focussing on security, fast  response times, rich database and clear & concise menus?

Every time , when order any item restaurant give us poor quality, and bad food. It a monkey business.

Monkey business.

This happened several times. if you are thinking of downloading this please dont... this is a scam...! !!!!!!

I waited an hour for food only to be cancelled upon, while customer service was completely insincere AND tried to pin the blame on me instead. 

I'm never using this again (try Dahmakan- their service is first world!) and urge others not to, too.

review: The service overall is pretty good. The app is not optimized for repeat orders or quick transactions. Best case is to know exactly what restaurant you want to order from before using the app.

Please fix it!

title: Worst delivery app ever!
review:
This is by far the worst delivery service i have used. Every time i place an order, it doesn’t get received by the restaurant until a person from their call center calls me to confirm whether i actually ordered!!!
This makes zero sense.

title: Poor experience

title: Review App.

Update your app. It’s a little dated and does’nt fit on iPad etc.

To be able to order from more than 1 place.

Foodpanda malaysia has a horrible customer service. Ordered breakfast, came at lunch time. Talked to a customer service representative and she has a ‘I don’t care’ attitude. Just copy pasting generic response. 

You will not sustain your business if you think it’s fine to lose 1 or 2 customers.

title: Terrible experiences with Food Panda
review: They have gotten our orders wrong multiple times and didn’t reimburse us for items that were not delivered. I finally deleted the app after one of the drivers delivered an order to an address that I didn’t live at and called from his mobile demanding that I let him into the building without saying who he was or where he was from. Then he just left the food there. I told him it was the wrong address, but he just hung up on me. I spoke with customer service, and the guy suggested i go to the other address and pick it up myself. The other address was even further away from my house than the original restaurant and I had no access to it. So, not only did they not deliver the food to me, which is really what their service is supposed to be in the first place, they also refused to rectify the situation. They refused to deliver the food to me and refused reimburse me for it. They moved the food even further away from me than it originally was at the restaurant and then had the nerve to tell me to go and pick it up myself. Not only that, but the restaurant was then closed, so I couldn’t reorder the food. I have had countless issues with Food Panda getting my orders wrong also, or taking my money for an order and then saying the restaurant ran out of supplies and couldn’t make my food and they would reimburse me for it but didn’t. They have wasted countless hours of my time and a lot of my money. At the end of the day, I feel it’s better just to go get the food myself and not pay money for nothing my stress and headache.

review: အရင်ကဆို ကြေးအိုးတပွဲစားရဖို့ လူကလဲ မသွားနိုင်တဲ့အချိန်ဆိုရင် ၂ မှတ်တိုင်ပဲ ဝေးတဲ့ခရီးကို ဆိုက်ကားခ သွား/ပြန် ၂၀၀၀ နဲ့ ကြေးအိုးတပွဲစာကျမဲ့ ပမာဏကို ၂ ပွဲစာလောက်နဲ့ ဝယ်စားရတယ်။ food panda ကြောင့် အချိန်ကုန် ငွေသက်သာပီး သက်သောင့်သက်သာ ထိုင်စားရတယ်။ order တင်ပြီး ဘယ်နှမိနစ်ကြာမယ်ဆိုပီး ချက်နေတဲ့ပုံလေးက အိမ်က ထမင်းဝိုင်းမှာ ထိုင်စောင့်နေရတဲ့ ဖီလင်ပဲ ...မိုက်တယ် 😋🤙

title: Terrible customer service and experience
review:
Refused to delete my account after multiple requests. 

Repeatedly changed their customer service protocols to provide less transparency and accountability. Including: discontinuing phone support; discontinuing chat support; discontinuing driver geolocation throughout the process; denying access to customer-service managers; replacing all customer service representatives with the most basic and useless FAQ that I’ve ever seen.

Customer-service representatives – when they existed – could take longer than Foodpanda’s notoriously slow deliveries to answer a single basic question.

Customer service representatives  – when they existed – repeatedly lied about why deliveries that were late, blaming restaurants for Foodpanda’s own logistics failures, thus defaming  the restaurant brands.

The Foodpanda app blatantly lies about the expected delivery time during the ordering process in order to secure sales. Then is chronically late. (A bait and switch.) 

Deliveries are substantially later – in terms of both duration and frequency – than any of its competitors. (Or its algorithms are so broken, that they shouldn’t be in the tech industry to begin with.)

Rates being charged to restaurants (by the entire delivery industry) are obscene and unethical, especially  during a crisis wherein restaurants are struggling to survive

Three deliveries are put on a single bike ensuring the last two are indelibly cold when delivered an hour later

Since Foodpanda refuses to offer anything close to customer service, they leave their poor, underpaid drivers as the frontline of defense against [rightfully] irate customers.

The insultingly piddly 30 baht vouchers that you think make up for thousands of baht of late, ruined food – caused by Foodpanda’s negligence – are insulting. 

This app's high rating is surely gamed, as I know nobody in Bangkok who doesn't hate this service (with a bit of a monopoly). Thankfully, Line Man, Grab and some others are beginning to offer alternatives...

title: Check the restaurant reviews first!
review: Food Panda In Bangkok had a restaurant with the same name as a favorite restaurant of ours. We ordered pizzas, but the site seemed to take a while to process it so we called the restaurant directly and they said they did not work with Food Panda. Confused we contacted Food Panda who told us the pizzas were on the way?!? The pizzas arrived in pizza boxes with no logo and they tasted awful. Upon looking closely at the restaurant reviews in Food Panda we found that the pizzas came from a completely different restaurant with the same name. There were some bad reviews claiming the same bait and switch. Oddly enough, the "good reviews" came from the same people (with the same wording) more than once. Hmmm... I did try posting a review of our negative experience, but I don't think they were happy about me mentioning my annoyance at Food Panda for not clarifying that the restaurant they advertised wasn't linked with the REAL one.

title: Bad password reset mechanism
review: So, the normal operations of the app are fine. However, trying to reset your password sends you to your email (you can't reset it in the app), which sends you to the webpage, where you get a password reset dialogue. No problem! Yet. Then, after you've seen the password dialogue for a moment, it disappears under an ad for the app. You know, those annoying "try our app" wallpapers that appear when you access a website on your phone? Thanks, but there is a REASON I am trying to access the website on my phone. You can click "go to website" but that takes you to the homepage, and you can't get back to the password dialogue. So, since you can't reset your password on your phone, you have to open your computer, go to email, click the link, then finally reset you password, then get your phone again, re-enter your new password and only THEN are you logged in. Of course, that means that you can only do it when you have a computer around, which kind of kills the point of mobile technology, and mobile technology is what the app is for! It also stinks when you have 20 people standing around asking why food panda isn't working and why the pizza will be late...

title: Warning! Buggy outdated app but far worse service
review:
App is clumsy and super buggy. Took 10 minutes to charge my order, never confirmed and only realized that he order actually succeeded when I received an email.  Would have been better if order never happened.

Delivery times are a total fraud and when you contact them they blame everyone and everything except their terrible service.  This time it took two hours to get the food. So very very happy to have alternatives.  Feeling super ripped off.

title: Lousy service!
review: Yes the service not the restaurant's fault! Ordered at 7:30pm.. Food arrived cold at 11:00pm!  I called the restaurant directly to followup on that order around 8:30pm they said they gave it to the rider already at 8:20pm. So from that time between 8:20pm to 11:00pm what happened?! Did the rider black out or something?! The restaurant is around 15mins without traffic from my place And 30 mins to okay 45mins if heavy traffic. So no excuses! And yes, i did call the hotline, at 10pm, and they made me hold for around 10mins just to tell me that they would call me again because they had to reach the rider that was delivering my order. And NO! They didn't call again! And then i just gave up waiting for it. It arrived at 11pm, the food was very cold! Very bad service from foodpanda. and it is not the first time that i ordered through this app and even from that restaurant through this app. Previous times the food arrived at least an hour  late tops or it was on time. This was the first time they didn't call either to verify the directions first before delivering so we assumed they understood the delivery instructions we placed. So disappointed!

title: Very poorly executed
review:
This app/website/service has an equivalent in virtually every developed country.  I have never seen this service so poorly executed.  Delivery times are almost always off - often by as much as 3 hours.  Food panda will consistently be wrong about menu items.  They both leave off much of restaurants menus but they will also list many items that are not available.  Further more they will list many restaurants as closed that are open.  If you leave notifications on in the app you will constantly get notifications suggesting items from nearby restaurants for lunch or dinner - but they have never been food.  They always suggest items from the drinks menu: water, sprite, etc… Their customer service is usually fairly prompt to answer the phone with a person but they are rarely competent or helpful.  Yes, it offers a service that allows you to forgo calling a restaurant yourself but more often than not you will end up spending more time talking to a food panda customer service rep than you would the
 restaurant.

title: Lost my money, running around for the past 2 weeks
review:
Foodpanda is good till you face issues. I ended up paying twice and I requested for a refund. 

1) Foodpanda asked me to check with Dominos
2) Dominos asked me to contact Foodpanda
3) Same thing repeats
4) Live chat option is pathetic. I ended up explaining entire issue from bottom up multiple times to new customer care agents as the chat times out and there are no alerts on the phone screen when the agent replies back to you. If you don't respond under 2 mins it goes inactive. You have to do this all over again. 

There was no ticket number to refer back to. There is no process. 

5) No agent from Foodpanda is prepared to take up ownership. When they finally agreed to take ownership, they promised to call me in 2 days. The call never came. I contacted them again. They asked me to wait for 5 mins. Then, chat went dead saying I've not been active. Now I have to explain the entire thing to another agent. Kuldeep didn't call me back. The guy before him promised me he would call back. His name was Sadanand or something. 

Pathetic service. I don't recommend this app to anyone, especially ordering pizza with dominos. Directly contact Dominos. 

I've wasted many hours on this issue. I just want my money back, which seems small compared to the time I've spent getting it back.

title: Great app
review: Pops panda has been an awesome app to have available! It has especially been a huge help to me while I've been sick all week stuck in my apartment. Really easy, and hassle free. The only thing I have had issues with is sometimes the Menus on the app don't sink up correctly with the menus in the stores. For example, salad concept's menus are missing a few salad toppings that we order all of the time in the store, which is frustrating. We have tried writing in the comments of the order to add specific things that aren't showing up in the menu, but it's hit or miss with whoever is working. Altogether though really useful app and very easy to use! Thanks food panda!

title: Took my money but got no food
review: Both the app and food delivery service is horrendous. There are only 9 outlets showing on my app and only 2 of them serve actual food!!! The rest are coffee and drink outlets. Seriously, why call yourself "food" panda if you don't really deliver anything but drinks. By the way, I live in Klang Valley!! But because I was desperate today, I placed an order anyway from one of the restaurants (out of the only 2 available). Boy did I regret it. I paid via credit card and was sent a text message that my order was confirmed. After waiting for half an hour I receive a call from Foodpanda telling me they can't deliver to me. No reason given! Just "sorry we can't deliver". Took my money, made me wait 1/2 hour and then nothing :( Stay far far away from this scam

title: 2nd poor experience with Food Panda
review: Today I placed an order and received a confirmation text shortly. Then almost 2 hours later I received a text and a call from their customer service that my order has been canceled due to problems with their system. After waiting 2 hours for my food, the best they can do for me is apparently canceling my order. They even had the nerve to charge their service fee after causing this inconvenience. I hope they have more competitors so they will be motivated to improve their system and service. This is my 2nd poor experience with Food Panda already.

title: Frustrating, but useful
review: I use this add weekly so it's definitely doing a lot of things right. Weaknesses for me include no optional toppings changes (ie. no onion) to pizza orders and locality problems - my regular restaurant doesn't show in my results list even though it's just 2km away; it only shows in my reorder list. The reorder feature is great, but because my optional toppings has to go into the comments/notes for my order, each week I have to manually add those comments and get a phone call to confirm the price changes. I'd prefer if reorder worked, optional toppings was available, and therefore price was automatic and phone call didn't need to happen.

title: Thank you for saving my life
review: I was in the forest🌴 and suddenly I came across a tiger🐯. He was going to eat me 😱but I told him that I am not his meal😡and he said aren't you the human I ordered from foodpanda🐼 and I said Nooooo!😮 Then he was like I am so sorry to have scared you and then I asked him where can I find food🤤 and he showed me this app🤳🏼 ever since then I have been enjoying the service of foodpanda and also very grateful✌🏼 to them for saving my life👍🏼. I mean seriously what if the tiger🐯 ate me. Cheers 😏

title: Best for the hungry
review:
Love this app for the wide range of choices in Taipei. Would've starved if didn't have this. 

I do wish that since I have the English version that all not some of the menus are available in English. Hard to order from restaurants I'd like to try when menus are in Chinese. Also if they can add the ability to order from multiple restaurants at the same time would be great, I wouldn't mind paying additional service fees. If possible, open later than 9:30 so I don't have to always eat mickeyDs after that time. Otherwise keep up the good work.

title: Ordered at 7:22pm, order arrived at 9:26pm
review: It was my first time using this app, and it will be the last. The dispatcher told me that foodpanda experienced internet problems, so a lot of deliveries got delayed. He even showed me a text message from their office stating that. I would have at least appreciated if i was informed that order will be late, instead of waiting so long for the food without a clue where it is. The live chat was helpful, but still did not give an accurate estimate. They mentioned 10-15 minutes, but food still arrived in 27 minutes from that time they mentioned that. If youre hungry, Jollibee and Mcdo are still more reliable with their delivery times. If youre willing to take a risk on your dinner arriving to you on time, then use food panda.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11437473, 'body': 'Hey Christopher7779 , 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T06:00:03Z'}

title: No customer service
review: Placed a simple order and was missing one item. Attempted to contact food panda right away via their contact number - no answer - then attempted to contact via calling back the phone number that notified me the order had arrived - no answer.  I then attempted to email them - received an automated email and that was it.  Few days later I sent a message to their Facebook account and received a response and a phone call apology.  That was it - problem never fixed.  Have deleted the app and won't use this service again.  It's ridiculous for a customer service business avoiding communicating with their customers and not ensuring the customer is satisfied with the service.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11341096, 'body': 'Hey shanemetzger, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-19T07:44:51Z'}

title: Room to Improve
review: There service is good most of the time but sometimes they make huge delays and get order wrong. They should compensate customers in case of delays or mistakes only saying sorry does not make customers loyal. Restaurant selection is limited with many popular restaurants left out. Menu should have food pictures. Delivery pricing should be smarter. They charge the same whether I live a block away from the restaurant or other end of Dhaka.

title: Just mediocre- much room for improvement
review: This app is very rudimentary and isn't anywhere near what food service apps are in the United States. It takes 5 clicks to accomplish what could be done in one. It's not obvious the first time you use it how certain functions work. The actual food panda service is very inconsistent and meals often arrive like warm instead of hot. They need better insulation in their delivery bags. Glad to see the payment in the mobile app has been fixed- it was broken for over 2 months and you could only order from a PC which is absurd. Food panda lost a lot of money from us during this time.

title: Made my life so much easy!
review: Having a long distance relationship is the hardest part and not being able to take the love of my life on a date during special occasions is totally heartbreaking! but with this app, I was able to find an alternative.. I could get her lunch or dinner and have it delivered right in front of her door without any hassle at all. thanks a lot FOODPANDA. You made my life so much easier and convenient for both of us.

title: Very poor service
review: Order food at 4:36pm and it's now 6:18pm, yet no delivery. Called the customer service and they don't track their delivery guys. He told me that he'll have to call the delivery personnel to check the status. Unfortunately, checking ain't bringing back the lost time. Even the customer service was not assuring. The process should have had a system to know that the food has been delivered and should be triggered by the delivery guy. It's not rocket science. If something is not delivered in time then proactive measures should be taken once the system automatically tracks and raises a flag on undelivered services. Poor management, poor service and very poor customer service.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11341060, 'body': 'Hey Isaac, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-19T07:41:13Z'}

title: Life-Saver
review: OMG! Man this is a life saver over here, when you don't want to take a taxi to go to places you'll go this app, and order and you'll see it at your door in less than an hour. American food on demand! When it comes to their service it is great. Just make sure you put in the right address or they'll send your order back and you'll have to do it all again. I wish they would get better with this but hey!!! Great app.

title: Very useful all
review: Foodpanda makes our life easier. Specially in a city where traffic jams are big headache and takes too much time to go to your favourite restaurant . Just order the meal on your way to home from work and the meal will be ready when you reach your home! This app is very good, useful and convenient. It informs us about the latest deals and offers. Just keep us up to date ! Good work !

title: Remarkably poor service
review: Delivery times are vastly inaccurate. When you try to contact the customer support through the message app, they will tell you they are calling, after waiting for 2 minutes you are booted from the chat. Attempts to contact a superior are in vain. The staff responses are obvious canned messages that rarely apply to your situation. After you point it out they simply ignore you. 60 minutes for delivery. Cancelled the order after 2 hours and 30 minutes and no driver. And the moron monitoring the phones hung up on me. If I could give it less than one star I would. I wish there was a negative star system.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11437504, 'body': "Hey Apryl'sboy,

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.", 'modified': '2019-10-24T06:01:43Z'}

title: Great, could be outstanding
review: Very user-friendly and intuitive. Would be nice if it saved your favorite restaurants in a special tab, and the search function seems to only pick up what's in the name of the restaurant. If the search terms extended to the menu items, you could save some time looking through menus to see if for example the Indian place you looked at had the type of naan you wanted or if you needed to look somewhere else.

title: Too cool!!!
review: Awesome app- love it!!!  I got so tired of ordering pizza or McDonald's and kfc for my children on nights were school projects just take up all your time leaving me with exhaustion and little time to whip up a great meal. But now with this app. Not only am I able to get a great dinner at a decent time but also a much healthier one too. The kids will appreciate it, that's really what matters! Thank you for this app and to all the restaurants involved!!!

title: Love this app - gets food in my belly
review: I'm pretty terrible at cooking or procuring food for myself- so this is pretty much a god-send. Love the options of paying with card or cash. The restaurants are pretty legit. And customer service is on-point - one time my order apparently arrived late, and they sent me a super apologetic email and a voucher. I then mis-used the voucher and they immediately replaced it for me. So...yeah - 5 stars all around!

title: Meh.
review: Compared to the Food by Phone app, which wasn't really that easy to use, Food Panda is quite difficult to navigate. I'd like to be able to easily search for the cuisine-restaurant-location without digging through many layers and filters. And, I would like to see the full menu from each restaurant. Finally, the app offered a 10% discount which expired last year.  Please keep your app up to date. On the bright side, your representative telephoned immediately to confirm my order. Now waiting to see if food arrives within the hour, as promised.

title: Unreliable, Bad Service
review: There is nothing like arriving home from work, ordering food, and having food panda call you back in 30 minutes to tell you they are too busy to make any more deliveries. This happens about 50% of the time in Bangkok.  If they ever do accept you order, it will arrive in an hour and a half later.  It's better to get take-out on the way home from work, than to rely on Food Panda's spotty service.  Don't risk it.

title: Pretty Solid App
review: I was in Bangkok for awhile and a few times tried this app when I was busy or didn't feel like going out. Overall, pretty solid experience. App is a little clunky but overall comparable to US counterparts (DoorDash, etc) and the one order that had an issue (very late) foodpanda took care of for me. Will definitely use again. Also, read the restaurant reviews closely. Some of them are definitely inflated.

title: Check their website to see
review:
Check the website to see if food panda is available in your area! 

I love the service! The app works great!

Suggestion:  if you could add special instructions for each item in basket (ex. if I order 2 hamburgers but want one plain, it can be confusing to explain in a small comment box)

title: Worst service. Stay away !!
review: Stay away from this app. You are better off calling the restaurant directly. They took the order and an hour later, got a call from the restaurant saying the food will not be delivered because they don't get their money from food panda. I had already paid the full amount while ordering. I then call food panda which took ages to pick up and then no apologies but instead blame me for not being patient. They said the restaurant was very busy and will take more time and I've to wait. All in all I never got my food and they took my thousand bucks
developerResponse:
{'id': 11341223, 'body': 'Hey Jignyo, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-19T07:55:17Z'}

title: good but can be better
review: Aesthetically pleasing. Quick and easy to navigate, up until the infuriating address part. It takes away the ability to customize your address and immediately tries to locate and pinpoint where you are, which can be a good thing for more well-known places, but not really. I hope the ability to edit the address that the app automatically keys in for the user will be added in the future.

title: Absolutely hungry waiting
review:
We thought we would save the hassle of travelling on a weekend and order food in instead. As we were getting a bit hungry, we chose from restaurants that had the fastest delivery time stated, 60 min.

An hour later, I call food panda as my food had not arrived and am told that I needed to wait another hour as their drivers were not available due to Ramadan.

Having to wait 2 hours for dinner which would arrive at about 9 pm is really no joke. They should have indicated this on the site, or told me the estimated time on the confirmation screen.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11437838, 'body': 'Hey Supersadgurl,

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T06:16:30Z'}

title: Your favorite food at your fingertips
review: A simple program that gives you access to every restaurant in your area. Don't want to fight traffic, then this app is for you. Sick and need bed rest, FoodPanda delivers it to you. With cash on delivery, you don't need a credit card or online purchasing enabled. It's the greatest thing since sliced cheese.

title: Terrible app
review: By signing into this app you opt in (with no possibility to decline) to their SMS spam list. They then message daily with unwanted offers. I've contacted their live chat support inside the app 4 times now requesting to be removed (btw, the SMSes keep coming even after you delete the app) and they still haven't removed my number. Each time they promise it will be done anywhere between ASAP and up to 4 days. But after 2 weeks I still get their messages. I've re-downloaded the app, re-logged in, and changed my number. Hopefully this helps...
developerResponse:
{'id': 11343966, 'body': 'Hey r.keller,

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-19T12:26:19Z'}

title: 'Filtered' Restaurant Reviews?
review:
They seem to not publish reviews that they don't like (or are perhaps paid not to?). So good luck ordering something based on the ratings/reviews within the app. Our 1-star review of a restaurant we ordered from never got published... and when I asked about it (via their in-app chat) I was told that a review takes weeks to actually show up -- but reviews done days after my own being seem to be present for all to view... Doesn't add up!
The app/service has potential - but what use is it if you can't trust their reviews?
developerResponse:
{'id': 11439991, 'body': 'Hey Sarvajanik, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T07:31:49Z'}

title: Food options and service
review:
The app serves the purpose but alotttt more can be offered in terms of the options available and the deals section has to be improved. The only thing one can see is the biryani deal with pictures. Hopefully they'll ameliorate over time. 
Best of luck to team food panda.

title: Great app indeed
review:
I never used to order food online bcoz there were no good services. This app is so easy and wonderful nowadays I am regularly ordering food online. Great keep it up. 
One suggestion the visibility of radio button to accept terms and conditions is poor many a time I miss it. Improve it's visibility.

title: Unprofessional Is Being Kind
review: In short, you will not get your food. You will wait, but nothing arrives. When you contact them they will tell you a canned response about there being a technical glitch, but you know its a lie to cover up their incompetence. When you get text messages, emails, and the app all showing your order being accepted, processed, and being delivered, yet a mysterious glitch is the cause? Then they just say sorry we cannot deliver your order. Avoid unless you like your time being wasted and ending up hungry.

title: Makes take out easy
review: My boyfriend and I are currently in staying abroad in Singapore and use this app at least 3x a week. Great variety of restaurants, only a few hiccups with an item being incorrect or delivery taking longer than stated, but that's the nature of ordering take out in general. Makes it easy to access places we normally wouldn't eat due to distance.

title: Easy to use, decent English speakers!
review: Love that it offers some English menus! Easy-to-use site to order delicious food; however they need to change to a map or street address system because roads are very long and you could be 1 block away from getting a lot more options of restaurants just because of the road name, not the distance from the restaurant. It's very annoying!

title: Easy, efficient
review: App is pretty straight forward--> pick restaurant, pick food, pay, delivered. Does as advertised. Uses text messages instead of app notifications for updates which is fine. They're good about giving you discounts if food delivery isn't on time.

title: Extremely Easy to Use with Great Offers!
review: The only app we use for delivery in Bangkok! Extremely easy to use, very intuitive - great one touch payment system and some great offers as well. Been using the app for approx a year and a half now and no complaint so far.

title: If you are hungry don't go for it.
review: I have ordered two times using the app. Both time food was delivered after 2 hours. It is not acceptable to deliver food 2 hours later. Either they don't communicate with the restaurants in time or restaurants don’t take their order seriously. But, whatever it is, overall experience is worst. I will prefer to call the restaurants directly. There is a delivery charge included in most of the restaurants if I use foodpanda, but if I call them directly, they deliver it for FREE and IN TIME.
developerResponse:

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.

title: Terrible
review: I used this while in Singapore on business for easy ordering. One hour after my order was placed I received an automated text saying "Good news, the restaurant has confirmed your order and will deliver in about 75 min." So about 2 hours after I order my pizza arrives nearly room temperature. (was supposed to be 1 hour) I paid with my visa online and found out after it arrived the receptionist was also charged the full price which she paid in cash. TL:DR 48 dollars for one cheese pizza that took 2 hours and arrived cold.

title: RUBBISH BROKEN APP
review: The app never works the way it should. It keeps on hanging after you actually place an order, then after they deliver the food, then it says delivered. Totally rubbish. Used to work well, now it's been wonky for months on end. Just couldn't be bothered. I am just waiting for another competitor to come their way, to do it better, then I will switch immediately! Only still using this crappy app because I have no other choice, need to eat right? Oh and the service is questionable too.

title: Atrocious customer service
review: If anything goes wrong, don't expect their customer service to help with the problem (or even understand what the problem is). I sent them an email through the app and never received a response. When I referred to the email in a chat with customer service, they said I emailed the wrong country service and they never received it. Didn't matter either way because they were unable & unwilling to help with the issue anyway.

title: Easy to use
review: Great app for when I'm too lazy to go out! Just open and choose where you want to eat and have the food come within the next hour! And it tells if if places are closed to make sure you don't order from there

title: A lifesaver
review: This app has kept me from going hungry twice now. I have ordered from restaurants very close to my home and had the food arrive in around 30 min. I imagine it would take longer if the restaurant was farther away, but it's worked great for me so car.

title: Great app
review:
Overall the app is super easy to use and navigate. What would make it better, and this isn't on the app but more of the restaurants. They should use more pictures to show off their food.
The app could then allow us to zoom in on them to get a better look at what we are ordering.

title: Great in KL
review: I'm from the US and only come to visit in KL every few months. I use food panda almost everyday for either lunch or dinner and it works great. Sometimes there's a delay but you get the notifications and good arrives generally hot and ready to eat. The riders are professional and friendly.

title: Changed delivery area
review: Worked great the first time- ordered Mexican food and arrived with no problems. Went to order again a couple weeks later, and the company called to say they do not deliver to our area any more. Bad form!!! Why??? We have no car living in Bangkok and the easiest way to get delivery is through this service. Totally disappointed. How do you just all of the sudden change your delivery area to exclude current customers??? And only by 6 streets. Really bad business.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-19T07:18:52Z'}

title: It's when things go wrong you see true colors
review: And in the case of Foodpanda there was an immediate response and action by taking full accountability when a meal was late, not charging for it and a voucher on top, letter from CEO etc. Very fast to move on 'customer first' thinking. Tq

title: Unreliable
review: I have ordered food on the app way many times and most times the food is not delivered on time and I was not informed immediately when the restaurant would not take my order on multiple occasions. Can improve communication and notifications when there is a delay or a cancellation immediately so that we can make other arrangements.

title: Awesome but...
review:
Hey, Foodpanda!

I just wanted to let you guys know that there's a glitch in your app. I'm using the iOS version and there doesn't seem to be a "house number" field in the address section. Hard to deliver food to a customer without a house number! Please get on that as soon as possible!

Otherwise, you guys are awesome! ❤️

title: Great when it works. But not lately
review:
The last four times I've called food panda (3 months), I've been called back immediately to inform me that "our system is down, and you need to call the restaurant yourself."

It's not worth the hassle. I'm deleting the app, and I'll be sure to let everyone I know that their business should be taken elsewhere. 

Also, restaurants often disappear, never to be seen again.

title: Great experience for hungry people :)
review:
I've used Food Panda for a number of occasions. Usually when I'm too tired to cook :) it's convenient and tasty. My order was late only once and customer service was quick to pick up the slack.

I'll be ordering again!

title: This app is like my dream come true
review: Is there anything better than ordering food by smartphone?  I don't think so!  I love this app.  I am sorry that we're moving to an out of the way neighborhood where we won't be able to use Foodpanda as much anymore.

title: Awesome and Convenient
review: I use this app for my lunch and dinner. For home and office delivery. It is great that we know the exact time of the delivery via the app. It is quite accurate. Food delivered in good condition. App interface is easy to use. Choice of restaurants is quite extensive. My go to app for food delivery.

title: Convenient & Easy. Lots of Food Choices!
review: I don't have to worry about ordering food and thinking about what to eat. It gives me a lot of choices with many types of restaurants. Highly recommended especially if you live in Jakarta.

title: Nice
review: Alright but don't order in the last few minutes because it takes minutes to process the offers.

title: Food was late and the bill was incorrect
review: I ordered from Edgware Road in Karachi, the estimate time was 55 minutes but the order came in one and a half hour. Moreover on the app the bill came out to be 3000 rupees and that's the confirmation I got from Food Panda on email but the bill that came with the food was 4000 rupees and the delivery guy said Food Panda had old prices on the menu!

title: This app made me fat af
review:
Seriously the most addicting food app
The restaurants are too good
And the prices are too reasonable and I'm so lazy so it's so much easier than having to relocate my body to find food somewhere 
I need to delete this app and go to a detox center ASAP

title: Great App
review: In Asia apps like this are great because some times the food here can be like a hit and run car crash. I used this app more than ones and it's very good. The problem is the restaurants are limited and not the best quality in general. In any way food panda is the best way to go at night in your room. Dr SD.

title: Great and best Apps although still need to improve!
review: I love using Foodpanda. Very efficient, effective and useful. Easy to use and quick but sometime, outlets are closed even it's within opening hours. I just don't get it. I love using it.

title: App works fine, delivery service consistently disappointing
review:
More often than not, my delivery orders arrive well past the 'guaranteed' 1 hour delivery mark. The food is already cold, mangled from the journey, and not particularly appetizing. The company should really address their local delivery set up, as this is a big turn off. 

I use this app exclusively in Hong Kong by the way, and cannot comment on other countries service.

title: Horrible
review:
This app is garbage. I've used it for over a year and over the last 5 months it has really gone downhill. I have placed orders on restaurants numerous time without receiving a confirmation from the restaurant or Food Panda then when I go to cancel it after receiving no confirmation for 20-30 minutes I can't because the restaurant won't return my money. 

I will never use this app again and will only order food through Deliveroo.

title: Spawn of Satan!!!
review: This app is the scourge of all apps. It is the very spawn of Satan. I have absolutely ZERO interest in it at all and it is constantly trying to direct me off of Facebook! Half the time it is when I'm trying to watch a video and so I have to cancel the redirect dialog box and start the video over again! Because this app is SO obnoxious, and it apparently cannot be blocked, I will NEVER give Panda another penny of my business (Panda used to be one of my favorite places).
developerResponse:
{'id': 11437136, 'body': 'Hey JFyhuhiuyt1gh, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

We aim to provide all our customers with the best service possible. Our team is working hard to address this issue and we want to assure you that we truly appreciate your support.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.', 'modified': '2019-10-24T05:37:35Z'}

title: Easy to use
review: I'm using foodpanda in Malaysia now and it is very convenient. East to use, fast delivery and covering most of the restaurants around. The delivery fee is RM5 most of the time, but it's totally worth it when you can't go out or having a lazy day.

title: Quick and Easy to Use
review: Finding a restaurant, placing an order, and paying through the app was extremely simple and quick. Will definitely continue to use Foodpanda's app.

title: Can't imagine take out without this app!
review: As a regular customer of take out from different outlets, Foodpanda has opened up more restaurants and cuisines that were otherwise not available considerations.

title: Great app and great for families
review: I love everything about this app except the fact that I cannot save favorite restaurants. I would love to add restaurants to a favorite section somewhere. Otherwise I love it and look forward to many more orders!

title: Easy and convenient
review: Use at least two times a week. Works very well. Love the fact you can pay cash and don't have to use a credit card.

title: Bad experience
review: I made my first order on the app, but after about 30 minutes, I never received confirmation, so I called foodpanda-- apparently my order was canceled for reasons that did not make much sense. Of course, they had already charged my credit card, but not called or informed me otherwise that my order would not be filled.  Overall, bad service, extremely poor execution, and I am really disappointed.

If you would like to get in touch with us directly, please contact us via our live chat support for an immediate response.
', 'modified': '2019-10-19T07:39:32Z'}

title: Great App!
review: This is a great app for ordering food. I have used it several times now and it is very easy to use. Great service. They always text confirming order after you place it . I defiantly recommend!

title: Good service!
review: I've used panda app so many time as I'm a person who doesn't like to cook! It's very convenient. Once, the delivery was 1.30 hour late they called me and offered a complimentary to me to pay half price!

title: Best  app for food orders
review: Love this app had my boyfriend download it as well because it's pretty awesome. The comfort of ordering food in our house with the list of amazing restaurants... it even helps you locate restaurants near you amazing!

title: Solid app
review:
A bit slow at times, but overall a decent app. Lots of filters and choices and other options, good job 👍
Btw, if you order directly from the restaurant, sometimes they have even cheaper deals/free shipping.

title: No hiccups so far
review: I have enjoyed the app, they deliver quickly and efficiently. Maybe the prices are a bit too steep but other than that they are working hard to satisfy.

title: Convenient
review: Works well especially when wanting to preorder food, but the interface needs work. Menu item names and descriptions are often cut off because the width is limited by the phone.

title: Terrible service when things go wrong
review:
It was decent for the first year or so but has gone steadily downhill here in Singapore with delivery estimates have no factual basis any more. 

They have now turned off phone support in favor of live chat which itself has a waiting line of 10-15 mins. Wonderful when your food is already 30 mins late. 

This is the last straw. Not using them ever again.

title: Disappointed!
review: The first time I used food panda they delivery my food after 1 hour 15 mins. This time aftter placing my oder. They called me and informed me that they have to cancel my order. It is because of they don’t have enough rider to deliver the food.! it is ridiculous a food delivery company doesnt have enough people to deliver the food. I talked to the operator, she is not helpful at all, non stop talking and never listen. So disappointed.

review: First time using. Menu is easy to navigate and selection quite wide. However, at the check out after giving me the TAC number, the window can't be closed, so I have no way of keying in the number. When I clicked Cash on Delivery, it says processing will take up to 5min, I waited more than 20min but it was still spinning and no confirmation. No choice but to cancel the order.

title: Simple and Effective
review: It's a very clean app that's easy to navigate. Auto locate feature makes restaurant choice easier. Hopefully more restaurants will sign up as the future of prepared food is to have it delivered to their customers home or office.

title: Love this app
review: Ever since I started using this app I've been staying home all day everyday. Everything arrives on time and tastes great. I don't even bathe myself anymore. Truly an amazing app. Recommend to anyone who is lazy like me.

title: Service
review: Their Service is Excellent. The food is always delivered on time. Didn't get disappointed once, I hope they will carry on their excellent service.

title: Good app
review: I currently live in Vietnam and I use this app on a regular basis. The app is really easy to use and the side functions such as reviews of restaurants from customers are really helpful. Customer service and feedback is excellent and overall it's a really useful app.

title: Best App for getting food delivered
review: I use this app a few times a week. Never have had any issues with it thus far. Receive a message when the order has been accepted and when it has arrived. Useful app.

title: Worsening service
review: Forgets some of the food half the time. Customer service is impossible to reach because they shut off the phone line. Suggest ordering cash on delivery and check food before you pay - only way to get them to fix something.

title: Best Food Delivery Service
review: One of the best if not the best food delivery services I know. Great service and the customer service reps are always willing to help if you need it. I would definitely recommend food panda!

title: Very good
review: The app is good. It's user friendly and the only issue I had was paying with a credit card. Once I contacted food panda they made adjustments to my account and now my card can be used and is on file. Easy to use the app!

title: Problem with the app
review: Can you please do a better job of filtering out businesses that are closed. I've gone through the trouble of selecting items for an order and then as I am about to select a payment method, find myself presented with a notification that indicates the restaurant is closed. This has happened to me multiple times, and it is always frustrating.

title: Useful app for expats
review: The app is very useful. It would be improved by allowing you to know open and close times of restos as well as being able to view a menu even if a resto is currently closed. Very good app though!

title: Sitting Bravo
review: I use this app in Thailand while I was sitting bravo. Can't really leave the apartment because I could get alerted so I got to have wonderful thai and Indian food brought right to my door. Only a four star because the timing on deliveries is usually longer.

title: Latest update has errors- service is good overall
review: I used this service many times over the last week and got great service and fast delivery.  However their last update won't even let you enter the app.  It just gives an error message when you  open.  It also looks like the last update erased all my past history and setup.  I am in Vietnam.

title: Not consistant
review: Ordered twice today. First it turned out that the restaurant I ordered from was closed & they forgot to take it off the list. Second time they called back to say that the delivery will be twice more expensive than indicated in the app, so I cancelled. Give 2 stars as I've had better luck with them in the past. Inconsistency is bad!

title: Great app
review: The main reason I choose Foodpanda over other delivery services is because of this app and how user friendly the interface is.

title: Does exactly what it needs to do
review: This is the only food delivery app that has gotten most everything right the first time. It has all the options for your personal food eccentricities/issues.

title: Tons of options
review: Tons of options to choose from.  Sometimes o feel a bit overwhelmed with so many restaurants to pick. They could improve the filter to include distance too.

title: Made life a lot easy !
review: Definitely , nice working app. Not too many glitches. Good interfacing and ofcourse , food is brought to you with the touch of a screen plus the time elapsed since order to delivery at your door step is great !

title: Amazing app
review: Beautiful app. Food delivery made really easy especially when ordering for more than 1 person. Some glitches which should be fixed soon. Also please optimize app for iphone 6 and 6 plus.

title: Works in Kuala Lumpur - Easy to Use
review: Much easier than other local delivery apps.  It just works and no errors.  Easy to creat an account.  I will follow up when the order arrives.

title: Service need significant improvement
review: Convenient app . Have used it only once and the delivery experience was terrible the guy was late by over 60min got lost was unable to understand directions when we offers to help give him landmarks and directions. Probably a new chap but it's highly unlikely that I would be using this service anything in the near future.

title: Food at your finger tips...
review: It's an easy App to order food online at the finger tips of a smart phone...very convenient...rate 4 stars as there is no card payment from hotels and FP should tie up hotels which provide Credit Card or Debit card.

title: Fantastic
review: Come home, book a meal and then spend Time with family. Life is so convenient. Hope you can offer healthy and gluten free menus soon. I am an advocate of juices and holistic food too.

title: Food Panda Philippines - No riders - orders regularly cancelled
review:
I've been lucky enough to have food panda work once for me. When it worked I thought, great here is an app that will deliver where other restaurants won't... Unfortunately that was a one time occurrence. 

On five separate occasions I've tried using this delivery service and everytime my order has been cancelled. There always seems to be a lack of drivers or too many orders for the company to process.

It basically has wasted 30min-1hr of my time just waiting for confirmations which never occurred. 

You might be better off ordering take out then taking an Uber... 

Hey Food Panda, you lame brah...

title: Major security issues
review: App is beyond buggy, which I can live with since it's a useful service. But yesterday while logged into "my" account, it showed someone else's address and still a different person's credit card information. Not comforting to know my information may be showing up in others' accounts, too!

title: Easy ordering process
review: A much improved version with an easy order interface and payment via credit card.

title: Review
review: In service point of view, this is just an awesome one. But initially this was without the delivery charge which was finally imposed. I would rather suggest to negotiate the delivery charge with the merchant instead of charging from the customer.

title: Nice and Convenient
review: This is a nice and convenient way to order food, however the restaurant database is not as large as I would expect.  Would be nice if menu items came with a brief description.  Right now, you only get a picture of the food item.

title: Very convenient
review: for when you're too tired or too lazy to go to eat. There's a good selection of restaurants and the delivery is usually pretty quick.

title: Worse service provider in chittagong
review:
Totally disgrace! 
Not professional service provider I must say.
Ordered some food today from dhaba chittagong restaurant. Late delivery and thats not it. I did't get the exact food I ordered. Some of them missing and after complaining they just have to say bloody sorry. But come on! i paid for them and just sorry is not enough. Be professional first!

title: For us, it's great.
review: For the menus with pictures or English translations, this is great. Overall, it works well. Would be nicer if all menus have translations. Then it would deserve a 5 star rating.

title: Super easy to use
review: As if FoodPanda could get easier, they made a mobile app that's super simple and easy to click through.

title: Just a little improvement
review: Wish I can save favorite restaurants , and filter by distance. otherwise good app easy to use

title: I order everyday!
review: I order almost everyday. They are mostly on time. I am aware that unforeseen events may occur that cause delay so I don't complain. They have never messed up my order. All in all, I'm quite impressed.

title: Great, no-nonsense, food discovery and delivery app
review: I use this in Pakistan and what a great app. Has all the menus entered correctly along with pricing, delivery rates and delivery timings. It's super convenient and great for finding new things around you to eat.

title: Always great!
review: When you just don't feel like going out. FoodPanda is a great delivery service with many restaurants to choose from.

title: Convenience & lots of promotion!!!
review: I just fall in love with this App. They have an enless list of restaurant to choosw from. No need to think what to eat for lunch/dinner. And alot of promotion for my budget wallet. With foodpanda, just order and enjoy.

title: Doesn't save credit card
review: The app doesn't save card information and it's inconvenient to fill up all the info every time I order. This happens even after clicking on 'Save my card' box. Please fix this issue!

title: Lack of support/ bad service
review: Uninstalling now. This will be the last time I'll use this app. They have a timeframe for delivery time but of all orders I made within the app it was never followed. Now I'm waiting for 2hrs already and counting. No one has arrived yet. Users don't even have the option to cancel or anything especially when you paid online.

title: Minor Improvement
review: I used it once, tried to use a second time and couldn't change the previously used phone no.

title: Very Usefull and Good
review: I often use this app...looking close and open Resturants..very easy...basicaly needed when you are very hungry and lazy like me, he he he...delevery Times depends on the Resturant and its Facility.....I like this app...use it, its good...

title: Fix it please
review: App crashes repeatedly. When trying to check out.

title: Payment bugs
review: Good app. Lots of selections. Great discounts. Payment process lets you down at times. Also, once order has been placed, the "My Orders" section takes ages to update. Suggest you allow SMS to your phone because that seems to work.

title: Great app wish they took US Cell numbers
review: I have unlimited text and data and no Indian cell... its tedious to get food panda to work involved getting another indian number and coordinating with friends... other then that great app.

title: It's like room service
review:
Great app must agree that opening and closing times would help 
App is very easy to use though happy ordering

title: needs improvement
review: Whenever there is a problem with an order it seems to take ages to resolve. also not being able to view restaurant menus when the rest is closed is dumb.

title: Good but ...
review: I'm Thai. I just try to use this app. This app is good but it has no cancel button. I see this app promoted in facebook, so i try using this app. I accidentally order food from a restaurant in thailand. I dont want to order but i dont know how to cancel. After 1hour, food come to my home TT

title: Easy to use
review: Easy interface. However review section is not easy to access

title: Very good!!
review: We use food panda on a weekly basis. Quick convenient and staff always able to help with any problems. Good selection of restaurants.

title: Useful and simple
review:
Good app, but not all restaurants there and one thing is missing images of meals...
Would be better with them

title: WORST TRAVEL APP
review: I had such a hard time with that terrible app.I ordered food from Burger King through this app and it didn't arrive even after being delayed for nearly two hours,and after calling food panda's staff they simply told me that one of the sandwiches I ordered is not available... I was literally shocked to the point that I replied cancel my order and closed the line. WORST FIRST TRAVEL APP I DOWNLOAD

title: Great work so far
review: This is a great app for finding and buying takeout. Some improvements would make it even better - description of different dishes.- accepting all credit cards.

title: Waste!
review:
Con job..dont order especially when you are hungry..call the restaurant after reading on zomato or what ever else..these people are just time pass folks.

Call center is in delhi, customer and supplier in bangalore. I made three calls to supplier and two calls to delhi to check status because no acknowledgement of order comes.

Basically crap!

title: Still needs work
review: This app doesn't allow you to set a delivery time. Otherwise, it seems to work ok.

title: This app is very good!
review:
I don't know what I'd do without it abroad! It makes it easy to browse different types of restaurants nearby. It also keeps me from getting lost. The deliveries are usually close to on time and the food is delicious. Works well in Thailand! I'll continue to find new and interesting things to eat!
(There should be a way to favorite some restaurants)

Sincerely,

Happy in Chiang Mai

title: Great app and plenty of restaurant options!
review: Seamless ordering for those of us that are lazy and want food delivered to our doors.  Haven't had any issues with it so far.

title: Useful but can be better
review: Fast and good, if only there were pics of the food

title: Poor!
review:
First time ordering in Singapore. The app says delivery in 30 mins but after ordering it says 70 mins. 

I check with the chat at 40mins to complain and they say that there is a technical error so they don't even know when the food will arrive (or even ordered!)

Ridiculous and a waste of my time waiting for the food. Never again.

title: Worst Service
review: Their website left out one meal in the order to the restaurant, but I paid the full amount for 2 burgers. Then, when only 1 arrived, they told me I only ordered 1 even though the rider told me the total for 2 burgers and my receipt was for 2. Their system is ineffective. Their customer service was not helpful. I'm still waiting for my 2nd burger.

title: Speed up please
review: The loading time, especially in the orders section could use a lot more brushing up since now it takes forever to display, if it even decides to. So please fix that. Otherwise it's pretty ok

title: Crap service and useless
review: Trying to order few times from the app, but they said they only serve the delivery at surrounding area of the resto. So whats the point of using this service if the resto itself can deliver around its area? Useless app and service. Gojek is not far from this app. They are not ready. title: Good app
review: Overall its a good app and the delivery service is the fastest and most reliable in HK (so far anyway).   Minor suggestion for the app: if a restaurant is closed, still show the menu and the opening time.

title: Best app
review: I use this all the time. Better than any website, super easy and convenient, especially for foreigners in tbilisi

title: Simple interface, good options and great customer service!
review:
I use it so often.. it's quite good.

Best part is that it is backed by a quick and efficient customer service!

title: Reliable services
review: Have been using the app for a while and found to be very useful.

title: Life saver.
review: I love love love this app. It's a life saver. But I will say it's a little silly to pay 60 as delivery charge when I'm ordering from across the street. I wish delivery fee depended on the actual distance and wasn't fixed.

title: Easy peasy
review: Signed in and made my first order in Tbilisi. I'll change my review if it doesn't work out, but I'm impressed so far!

title: App always crashing
review: If I could, I'd give it 0 star.  So far, I'm not impressed by the food panda app.  Almost every time I try to get on the app to place an order, the site is down.  And the few times I am able to get on the site, there are problems with the merchants and my orders get declined. Then followed by the app crashing yet again.

title: Speed is the only issue
review:
Good, user friendly interface.
Could be faster.
Should accept international credit cards too.

title: Smooth and quick
review: Very smooth process of ordering food. The tips and hints were right there.

title: Very well put together and easy to use
review:
Menu s are well made

Navigating the site is very easy and idiot proof

Well made software

title: A very helpful app
review: Highly recommend this everyone. It's a very helpful app to have. The selection of restaurants and the service is excellent for Dhaka, Bangladesh.

title: A wide array of restaurants at your fingertips
review: The app is pretty easy to use and there are restaurants to match any taste. I particularly like the fact that they let you know what you ordered recently.

title: Order made easy!
review: Love this app! Esp useful for those lazy bums like me. My only suggestion (or hope?) is to see more restaurants added to my area.

title: Working good now.
review: In the beginning there were some massive fails in this service, I've not experienced any problems in a long while. Everything is working smoothly and I get the food fast.

title: Amazing
review: I would highly recommend Food Panda as it is an easy and intuitive way of ordering food.

title: Very easy to use
review: Great app. I used to apply online on my computer but this is even easier.

title: Excellent app and service
review: My family loves this app and we use it at least twice a week.

title: Sky touching delivery cost!!!
review: The delivery cost is so so so high. The delivery cost should have been calculated by how far the delivery location is from the restaurant instead of that the closer ones to the restaurant need to pay the same as the furthest ones. This is so unfair and ridiculously disgusting and even the furthest one should not need to pay that much for delivery!!!

title: Convenient
review: Convenient and efficient way to order food. Great customer service.

title: Great, But No Pics
review: Love the app, easy to use, good service, just wish it had pictures.  I know...can go to restaurant website, but that's counterproductive. Will use again.

title: Good service
review: Good delivery service. Many choice of food offer from different restaurants. Hope i can choose different restaurants in one order.

title: Unbelievably poor service
review: Although the app seems handy, the service is terrible in HK. Food takes at least an hour, arrives cold, and the orders are frequently incorrect/missing items. Customer service is nonexistent. Use Deliveroo instead in Hong Kong if you want to save trouble.

title: Love the service
review: Its getting better keep it up and hope more restaurant in future☺️

title: Last update made me hate the app
review: Was the best app till I download last update too many errors.

title: Best Delivery Service
review: This is an amazing way of fulfilling our wish of eating food anytime and anyplace. This is great and fast too. I'd love to use this more times. Good job FoodPanda.

title: Very efficient app
review: Love the app is very well designed and works perfect. I hope they can add lots of more restaurants in my area.

title: User-friendly and very helpful!
review: This app saved me from all the akward talks that I hate. Plus, they deliver really quickly! This app is a blessing!

title: Amazing and Cool App
review: This provides convenience to each and everyone when it comes to food ordering. Good job Rocket Internet! Way to go!

title: Simple, fast and easy!
review: Don't change this version. Works flawless.

title: FP is a lifesaver!
review: Amazing app! No longer need to get out of the house to get food! Food is within one click away!

title: Everything good but...
review: App cannot choose delivery time as website does

title: Hungry
review: Best food app till date, could be a bit faster but works fine for me!

title: Handy
review: Works fine for me. But i agree with the others about its lack of user friendliness

title: Horrible service
review: They take no more responsibility than taking your money and passing the order to the vendor. That is not just the reason such apps exist. It is your responsibility if the vendor takes 2 hours for what was a promised 30 min delivery (that too after I called your customer service twice).

title: Best customer service
review: Food panda u won my heart by providing the best customer service i appreciate that quickest response time and highly trained staff with humble nature A+

title: iPad Support Needed!!
review: Really need this app on my iPad, but it just crashes. Please make this app compatible for iPad, and you will have my 5 stars.

title: Can't live without Food Panda
review: Love this app. We have food panda delivery almost weekly. It's a necessity when you don't have the time to cook or plan out a meal or want to venture out in the rain.

title: Good Service bad timing system
review: Good service by the deliverer. But they should start time counting when we place the order, not after the vendor gives consent.

title: Can't live without it
review: Never had a problem. Thanks!

title: Easy to use
review: Way easier interface than the website.

title: Super efficient, super easy
review: I love food panda, easy to use intuitive app and usually very quick and efficient delivery!

title: It does not allow to change the language
review: The app seems to be ok, but the language is automatically set when the country is chosen and does not allow to change it to any other.. I live in Azerbaijan and I do not speak or understand Azeri, so technically I don't understand anything in the app..
developerResponse:

title: Worst customer service EVER
review: Their customer service is absolutely horrendous. After Gourmet Union Burger got my order wrong (they sent chili fries instead of chili), I called to get the right item redelivered--when Foodpanda talked to the restaurant, they said the chili always comes with fries, which is total bs. I've ordered from them a dozen times before and it's always been just chili, not French fries with a dollop of chili. If they changed the menu, then they should revise the description to chili fries, not chili. My issue though is not with the restaurant, it's with the fact that FoodPanda sided with the restaurant, even though my order history clearly shows that I've ordered the same thing from them dozens of times before (why would I all of a sudden say the order is wrong if it wasn't?), and at first refused to give me a refund OR redelivery. Seriously what kind of customer service is that? Oh you got the wrong order? Sorry, we're just going to take your money and leave you hungry, AND waste your time repeating to you what the problem is as if I didn't already know. I asked to speak to their manager, who apparently wasn't there, which explains why it sounds like a monkey circus in their call center, so they said they'd return my call later. Three hours later, nothing, so I called them back, and after arguing for half an hour, they finally said they'd refund the money for the chili. Is it really supposed to be this difficult? I'm switching to Deliveroo or whatever other service there is, because FoodPanda does not give a toss about their customers, and will do everything they can to not refund you your money if the order is wrong. Their delivery men are also ALWAYS SUPER CREEPY. Seriously, worst customer service ever.

title: Review
review: ডেলিভারী সিস্টেম খুবই নিম্মমানের। সাইকেলের হাতলে যেভাবে ঝুলিয়ে খাবার পরিবহন করা হয়- এতে কিছু কিছু খাবার নস্ট হয়ে যায়। একবার দোকান থেকে খাবার দেয়া হলো ট্রে তে করে। রাইডার সেটা নিয়ে এলো পিঠে করে- ভেতরের সব খাবার উলটপালট হয়ে গেল। KFC চিকেন বাকেট এর মুখ খোলা খোলা থাকে। সেক্ষেত্রে অন্তত প্যাকেট এর মুখটা বন্ধ করা প্রয়োজন। কিন্তু রাইডার মুখ খোলা প্যাকেট সাইকেলের হাতলে ঝুলিয়ে নিয়ে এলো- রাস্তার সমস্ত ধুলা খাবারে মিশে গেল। কোন chiller box ছাড়াই আইসক্রিম বহন করে। খাবারের গুনগত মান ঠিক রাখার জন্য ব্যবস্থা না নিলে জনপ্রিয়তা ধরে রাখা যাবে না। আমি প্রচুর খাবার অর্ডার করি। কিন্তু ঠেকায় না পড়লে foodpanda ব্যবহার করি না। তবে ঢাকায় প্রচলিত অন্যান্য সার্ভিসের তুলনায় foodpanda অনেক এগিয়ে।ধন্যবাদ।
