title: Dezamăgitor
review:
Foodpanda România de toată jena. 
Înțeleg ca un anumit restaurat nu poate sa îmi accepte comanda ca e prea aglomerat, dar nu înțeleg cu voi puteți sa îmi trimiteți notificare ca îmi preia comanda, ca o prepara și e aproape gata sa îmi fie livrata, ca lucrătorul e la colt și peste doua minte alta notificare ca "sorry, e prea aglomerat, nu va putem prelua comanda"
Asta e a patra oara când pățesc, de fiecare data am semnalat problema și nu sunt singurul utilizator care pățește. Nu au nicio intenție sa remedieze problema. Cool.
Nota: - infinit pentru seriozitate

title: Ridiculous Login Method
review:
Few years ago, I signup with a different email and my number.

Now, I’m unable to order anything on my new account because I doesn’t let me add my number. It says, “the number is already in use”. 

Now when I try login to my account with old email, I says forgot password. It's not emailing me reset password link.

Dear designers and developers, please fix this issue. If you identify user accounts with phone number then send verification code to let your system update phone number.

Learn from Facebook and other apps. If you are trying to do something like Creem and Uber then let them login using phone number not email.

title: A nightmare for customers
review: Its 12:30am and now i m starving just because of food-panda.My order got cancelled just because the rider didn't want to deliver it to my address.After waiting 1 hour he told me his duty time is over and he can only deliver it to his desired place.i and told him i’m sending someone to pick up the order but then he cancelled the order and switched off his number-now i have to starve. Because all the restaurants are closed.Not only me but everyone is facing this same problem.i strongly recommend everyone not to use food panda in bangladesh.they don't care about the consumers.

title: IOS app doesn’t have “My Favorites”!
review: IOS version doesn’t have “My Favorites” function, and some restaurants can be found on Android version of the app only! I wonder why?  “My favorites” is a very basic function, please include this for iPhone users!

title: Dr. Ye-Ming Wu
review:
你們給我的優惠劵看得到，又用不到！
前三次免運費，也是不給用，像詐騙集團！
這要是在美國🇺🇸，早就被吿到倒了（商業詐欺）！
還在這裡問「之前」和「之後」的截圖？
有誰可以回去昨天拿截圖？又是詐騙集團手冊教的嗎？
從你們的內部控管，就應該可以看到我是第一次使用者，
連續四次想要下單，看得到「優惠卷」，加上去後，
付款時你們app就直接就把它消失，不讓我可以使用，
最後，我得原價購物，送餐還遲了10分鐘！

title: Coupon redeem issue
review: First after the coupon redeem and the shop cancel the order, you can’t use the same coupon again. Second, the Coupon redeem process is not intuitive when the agent issue an one time coupon. It is easy to associate the Newly issued coupon with customer account and allow the coupon to be select in check out. Customers do not need to snapshot the code and manually enter...

title: 100% of the time late 🤬
review:
Always late, Never on time. It’s a pity that the app looks so awesome but the service is shi***. I have never ever had a order show up less then 15 minutes late. Literally it’s 15 to 1hr late every single time no later close the restaurant is to my condo. I could literally walk to the restaurant, order, wait for the food, get the food, walk home, eat the food, and then food panda order would arrive 30 minutes after that. 

What makes it even worse it that it seems all the best restaurants in Bangkok use them instead of grab. Very frustrating!!!

title: Adds
review: The amount of adds you put on youtube ruins my experience with you, theres a limit to video adds..but in every video?. I will stop using your services and move to alternatives if you dont fix your Youtube addrolls not gonna lie extremely sick of it. youre service is also sub-par might switch to uber eats.

title: Service is unusable
review: The app itself is intensely frustrating to use. Things that you enter in are very likely to disappear if you switch apps or take a moment to long to consider your options. Forms that are filled out are basically temporary. Then forget about using it if you have a US phone number, because you never receive the confirmation code. This service is a joke.

title: Can’t register or login with app
review:
Login / Create account always tells me my username or password is wrong when I’m trying to make an account.

In the end, I made an account with website instead, then tried to login with app. 

Same problem. Same error message. Doesn’t give me the option to login and thinks I’m trying to create an account.

The app was obviously not tested properly. 

I still ordered. Wonder if the food will be on time as it’s just literally next door.

title: No refund on out of stock items
review:
Same day 2 orders the restaurants could not complete the order. I received and email that I would be refunded. That was in May 9 2019. I have contacted customer service 2x via email with screenshots and until now, no reply. No refund. Food Panda just kept my cash.

UPDATE: I just got a developer reposonce via my email because of this post. Clearly they didn’t read it- they advised me in the email to contact them directly. I HAVE ALREADY DONE THAT 2 times via email and 2 times via live chat!

review:
Your service is horrible.
It’s worst experience ever, I got 3 times wrong orders. 
and now 11/9/2019 
I placed order at 8:27 PM, and I waited 39 min, and instead of getting my food, I got a message that my order has been cancelled.
Why on earth you waited 39 min to understand that the restaurant " ran out of an item(s) you chose”.
I will delete the app and will never ever use it again and will do my best to make my fiends not use it as well.

title: Much improved, getting close to perfection
review:
One year I wrote a scathingly negative review of FoodPanda. Recently I started to use it again and am impressed with how much it has improved. Payment methods and order tracking has improved and works smoothly. Their delivery back end and overall management obviously works better now because orders almost always come on time. I’m giving them 4 stars, but I want to give them 4 and a half. Most people will probably give them 5, but there are some things I think she should add or improve:
[1] Address adding and deleting and selecting is still not working quite right. Weird stuff happens when I create an address from browser then try to use it in the app. You need to do some more detailed test cases. I’m not going to give you the test cases for you. Let me just say that there are definitely bugs.
[2] Note to driver is still a part of address. There should be an additional “note” that can be added for a single order, separate from the address. Like “oh hey bring change for 500” or “today you need to use this code on the gate”
[3] wishlist: real time approximate location of driver
[4] rating driver, rating single delivert, rating restaurant, rating a particular meal - one or all or a combination of those

title: Force to App
review:
I try to access the website and it automatically opens the App. The app is locked out of landscape mode so, although I am reading landscape mode it will not read correctly. Also, It forces me to decide whether or not to accept updates, EVERY TIME.
This is a royal pain in the butt when I am trying to overpay for delivery of a meal. Not my idea of service by any stretch of the imagination. Get real IT.

title: Decent service, poorly designed app.
review:
Foodpanda is the only game in town when it comes to grubhub-style food delivery in chiang mai. So I use it frequently, but it has a number of design flaws which seem to be obvious things to fix in testing. 

the awful paypal integration is a good illustration of the developers' negligence. first off, you need to select your preferred form of payment for each transaction. then you need to authenticate inside a web form (not one that can access saved system passwords) each time. from there (since i use a complex secure password managed by my OS) i have to go into settings to copy it and paste it in. however when i highlight the password entry field, it attempts to auto fill my *foodpanda* password. so i need to tap the field, hit a key to activate the incorrect auto fill, then delete the whole thing and paste in the correct password. THEN upon submitting the form, the app asks if i want to update my *foodpanda* password with the paypal password i just entered, so then i hit No. only after that is payment set up. however if they integrated paypal correctly, you could literally authenticate once (using password auto fill correctly) and never enter your paypal info into the app again. 

this is basic stuff that's already been done correctly by thousands of other developers. foodpanda makes plenty of revenue so i really see no excuse other than developer negligence.

other problems with the app include:
- wildly inaccurate delivery estimation times
- no way to contact the driver (or get info about the driver) through the app
- inability to use out-of-country phone numbers in the contact info
- a map display that frequently breaks (stops displaying order status info) and requires reset of the app
- automatically adds food to your cart with a single tap but makes it require many taps to remove food from your cart, resulting in lots of accidental additions which then need to be corrected.
- some menu items have a detail view open by default when you tap them; for others a tap simply adds it to the cart and the detail view can only be accessed from the checkout screen.
- when reordering a previous order, special notes to the restaurant (e.g. "no mayo") are either omitted or invisible to the user
- many restaurants simply disregard special notes / requests completely. it's a guessing game whether order notes will have any effect.
- feedback systems (for restaurants and individual orders) are very difficult to find and even harder to figure out how to use. as a result there are almost no reviews posted for most restaurants, assuming you even know where to look for them.
- the app displays frequent intrusive advertisements which are displayed *every time* the app regains screen focus, regardless of whether the user is able to take advantage of the promotion (for example, i might see a full screen ad giving me a new customer discount code which i can't use, every single time i navigate back to the app from somewhere else on my phone). very similar to how Grab does it.

and these are just the things i can think of off the top of my head as i write this in a hurry. please foodpanda, you could be a good app. these are basic design problems you're ignoring, and they've really piled up. thanks for reading.

title: WORST SERVICE EVER
review:
System did not send me a verification SMS so I could not complete my order either via App or online. Customer service via FB Messenger didn't reply until 2 hours later and said I would have received a PHONE CALL with verification code which I clearly didn't. Then the SMSes finally came through, all 10 of them, at 318AM. So not only did I not get my dinner, I got woken up in the middle of night thinking it was some big emergency given the number of messages in such a short span. 

Thanks Food Panda, officially the worst e-commerce transaction EVER.

title: Works, but will hopefully get even better
review:
Many aspects of this app and service are really handy.  
I appreciate the order confirmation status and estimated delivery time.
However, I wish the way to search for restaurants was more intuitive.  It is a bit clunky as a student from University Malaya.  I live on the border of section 16/17/14 of Petaling Jaya and also Bangsar South and Bangsar.  It would be nice to search restaurants by radial proximity, but as it is, I need to do 2-4 separate searches to find all the food options around me.
